Name: Holista, Lactozyme 250, Lactaze Enzyme, 60 Chewable Tablets
Description:
• Holista Lactozyme 250 mg is Lactase Enzyme helps prevent the symptoms of lactose intolerance and assists in the digestion of dairy products.
  • Lactose intolerance is the inability to digest lactose (milk sugar), caused by the lack of lactase, the enzyme responsible for breaking down lactose in the digestive tract.
  • Assists in the digestion of dairy products.
  • Lactase converts lactose into an easily digestible form by replacing the body’s missing enzyme, thereby effectively relieving the uncomfortable symptoms of diarrhea, gas and bloating that result from lactose intolerance.
Free From:
  • Contains no artificial colours, preservatives, or sweeteners; no dairy, sugar, wheat, gluten, yeast, soy, egg, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, or GMOs.
How To Use:
  • Recommended adult dose: chew 1–2 tablets just before consuming dairy products or any food containing lactose or as directed by a health care practitioner.
  • Lactase Enzyme must be taken each time you consume a lactose-containing food, as the enzyme will only work on the food just consumed.
  • Depending on the food you are eating and how much lactose it has in it, coupled with your sensitivity to lactose, you may need 2 tablets at a time, but no more than 6 per day.
  • For prolonged use, consult a health care practitioner
Caution & Warnings:
  • Consult a health care practitioner if symptoms persist or worsen
  • Consult a health care practitioner prior to use if you have diabetes
  • Headaches, heartburn, bloating and hypersensitivity (e.g., allergy) have been known to occur, in which case discontinue use
  • Keep out of the reach of children
Ingredients: Each Chewable Tablet Contains:
  • Lactase Enzyme 250 mg
None medicinal Ingredients:
  • Mannitol
  • hydroxypropylcellulose
  • natural flavour
  • stearic acid
  • vegetable grade magnesium stearate (lubricant)
  • citric acid
  • purified stevia leaf extract

Taking other medicines

  • Gastrointestinal complaints such as eructation, fishy smell and taste, nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain and diarrhea.

Name: Dorofen 40 Capsules
Description:
• A joint is where two bones meet and connected with muscles to cause movement
  • The bones' heads are protected by elastic articular cartilage to act as shock absorbing cushion and reduce the friction during movement
  • The joint cavity is filled with synovial fluid which reduce friction between the two cartilages during movement
  • There is a balance between wear and tear inside the cartilage in normal condition as our bodies produce glucosamine which is the building block of the articular cartilage to maintain and repair the damage inside the cartilage due to movement
  • By aging, obesity and other factors, the amount of endogenous glucosamine produced in our bodies tends to decrease, hence the balance between wear and tear inside the cartilage will be negatively affected and osteoarthritis will be the end result
  • Provides your body with the biological active isomer " Alpha - D - Glucosamine " which is the building block of the articular cartilage
  • Increases the synthesis of synovial fluid which keeps the mobility of your joints, reduces morning stiffness and crepitus during movement
Product Features:
  • Improves peripheral circulation which helps reduce pain during movement
  • Restores the balance between wear and tear inside the cartilage
  • Treats the underlying cause of osteoarthritis which is deficiency of endogenous glucosamine
  • Has a strong safety profile on long term use
  • safe for patients suffering from peptic or duodenal ulcer
  • Has a simple dosage regimen
How to use:
  • 1 Capsule three times daily after meals from 4 to 6 week followed by long term once daily dose / Consult your physician.
Caution & Warnings:
  • Avoid using Dorofen if you are allergic to glucosamine or Ginkgo Biloba leaf extract
  • Patients on anti-coagulants should consult their physician before using Dorofen

  • Duration of therapy depends only on the nature, intensity and the course of your disease.

  • Most commonly, improvement of patient's condition and relieve of symptoms is observed after about 4 weeks since the beginning of treatment.
Caution & Warnings: Do not take Prosmetto™:
  • If you are allergic (hypersensitive) to any of the active substances or any of the other ingredients of Prosmetto™.

  • Prosmetto™ relieves complaints related to prostate gland hypertrophy without subsiding it, and hence, it dose not cure the disease.

Taking other medicines
  • Talk to your doctor, pharmacist, or health care provider if you are taking any other medications.

  • Not applicable.as Prosmetto™ is used only in men.

  • Resveratrol is produced by plants Science has shown Resveratrol to possess a fascinating spectrum of pharmacologic properties enabling it to assist greatly with human health and beauty.
  • VERATOL™ is known to have a lot of health benefits:
  • VERATOL™ helps combat all signs of aging including wrinkles, sagging skin, dark spots, crow's feet, etc...

  • Veratol is to be taken one to two capsules per day for at least 3 months.
Warnings & Caution :
  • Do not take Veratol,If you are allergic (hypersensitive) to the active substance resveratrol or to any of the other ingredients of Veratol™.
  • Taking other medicinesThe probable interaction with blood thinners should be taken into consideration.
  • Patients taking blood thinning medications such as aspirin, warfarin, or clopidogrel should inform their doctor that they are taking resveratrol. Additionally, patients should always inform their health care providers of any dietary supplements or over-the-counter medications they use.
  • Medications changed by the liver [Cytochrome P450 3A4 (CYP3A4) substrates] interacts with resveratrol. Some medications changed by the liver include lovastatin, ketoconazole, Itraconazole, Fexofenadine, Triazolam, and many others.
  • Pregnancy and breast-feedingDo not take resveratrol supplements or excessive amounts of natural foods containing resveratrol while pregnant or breast-feeding. There is a lack of research in this area to prove safety.

Name: JP Vitamin D3 1000 IU 60 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:
  • The ideal way to obtain your daily requirements of vitamin D.
Major Role of Vitamin D.
  • Vitamin D promotes calcium absorption in the gut and maintains adequate serum calcium and phosphate concentrations to enable normal mineralization of bone and to prevent hypocalcemic tetany.
  • It is also needed for bone growth and bone remodeling by osteoblasts and osteoclasts.
  • Without sufficient vitamin D, bones can become thin, brittle, or misshapen
  • Vitamin D sufficiency prevents rickets in children and Osteomalacia in adults
  • Together with calcium, vitamin D also helps protect older adults from osteoporosis
Vitamin D other roles in the body:
  •  Including modulation of cell growth.
  •  Neuromuscular and immune function.
  •  Reduction of inflammation.
  •  Many genes encoding proteins that regulate cell proliferation, differentiation, and apoptosis are modulated in part by vitamin D.
Vitamin D deficiency
  • Nutrient deficiencies are usually the result of dietary inadequacy, impaired absorption and use, increased requirement, or increased excretion.
Vitamin D deficiency can occur:
  • When usual intake is lower than recommended levels over time.
  • When exposure to sunlight is limited
  • When the kidneys cannot convert 25(OH)D to its active form.
  • When absorption of vitamin D from the digestive tract is inadequate
Groups at Risk of Vitamin D Inadequacy
  • In some groups, dietary supplements might be required to meet the daily need for vitamin D.
  • Breastfed infants
  • Older adults
  • People with limited sun exposure
  • People with dark skin
  • People with inflammatory bowel disease and other conditions causing fat mal-absorption
  • People who are obese or who have undergone gastric bypass surgery
    How to use:  
  • Take one (1) Softgel capsule daily with food
    Caution & Warnings:  
  • Do not take JP VITAMIN D3™ 1000 IU if you are allergic to vitamin D or any of other ingredients in the capsules.
  • This product contains soybean oil.
  • If you are allergic to soya, do not use this product.
  • Pregnant or lactating women, diabetics, hypoglycemics and people with known medical conditions and / or taking drugs should consult with physician prior to taking dietary supplements. If any adverse reaction occurs stop taking the product and consult your doctor.
Ingredients:
Nutritional Facts

Name: Fatlos Orlistat 120 mg 80 Capsules
Description:
Fatlos is a medicine used for obesity management including weight loss and weight maintenance when used with a reduced-calorie diet. It is also indicated to reduce weight regain after weight loss.
Fatlos inhibits the absorption of 25-30% from dietary fats by reversible inhibition of gastrointestinal lipases. It exerts its therapeutic activity in the lumen of the stomach and small intestine
    How to use: Therecommended dose is one capsule with each main meal ( immediately before, during or up to 1 hour  after the meal ) up to 3 times a day. If a meal is missed or contains no fat, the dose of Orlistat should be omitted. Caution & Warnings: The effect of Orlistat results in an increase in faecal fat as early as 24 to 48 hours after dosing. Name: JP Omega 3 Fish Oil 567 mg 60 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:

  • Omega-3 fatty acids are considered essential fatty acids:
  • They are necessary for human health but the body cannot make them.
  • Omega-3 fatty acids can be found in fish, such as salmon, tuna, and halibut, other seafood including algae and krill, some plants, and nut oils.
  • Also known as polyunsaturated fatty acids (PUFAs), Omega-3 fatty acids play a crucial role in brain function, as well as normal growth and development and it may reduce the risk of heart disease.
  • Omega-3 fatty acids reduce inflammation and may help lower risk of chronic diseases such as heart disease, cancer, and arthritis.
  • Omega-3 fatty acids are highly concentrated in the brain and appear to be important for cognitive (brain memory and performance) and behavioral function.
  • Infants who do not get enough Omega-3 fatty acids from their mothers during pregnancy may be at risk for developing vision and nerve problems.
  • Symptoms of Omega-3 fatty acid deficiency include fatigue, poor memory, dry skin, heart problems, mood swings or depression, and poor circulation.

Ashwag™ capsules is a product contains Powdered of Ashwagandha Root Extract in hard gelatin capsules. Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera) is herbal Ayurvedic medicine, or traditional medicine from India. In Hindi, the term Ashwagandha is a combination of the words ashva (horse) and gandha (smell) – meaning "the smell of a horse". Ashwagandha is an Adaptogen Ashwagandha promotes balance in the body. Name: True Honey Manuka Honey 400+ Mgo - 375 Gm Squeezy Bottle
Description:
product Overview:
  • True Honey Manuka Honey 400+ Mgo 375 Gm Squeezy Bottle
Product Description:
  • The True Honey Co. Manuka Honey with 400+MGO (methylglyoxal) and 13+ UMF (Unique Manuka Factor) packed in an easy-to-squeeze bottle to kickstart your wellness journey with all the health benefits of manuka honey.
  • Manuka honey has antioxidant, healing, antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties to support better everyday well-being.
  • The True Honey Co. Manuka Honey is sourced from pristine New Zealand forests so remote, the only way in is via helicopter. Methylglyoxal (MGO) content in the manuka honey which sets it apart from other honeys and contributing to its unique profile.
  • Dihydroxyacetone (DHA) and methylglyoxal (MGO) are unique carbohydrate metabolites of manuka honey. Dihydroxyacetone (DHA) is found in the nectar of the mānuka flower and bees gather this nectar and fly to hives and this DHA is slowly converted into MGO over time. High levels of DHA indicate a long shelf life. The process of maturing each drop of Manuka honey takes years to get that perfection of high rated Manuka honey. The antibacterial property of manuka honey protects the body against damage caused by bacteria and supports better everyday wellbeing.
  • The True Honey Co. Manuka honey is designed to seamlessly integrate into your daily life. Each 375g bottle provides 75 servings, perfect for adding a dash of natural sweetness to meals, snacks, drinks, and everything in between.
  • Whether on the breakfast table, in the pantry, or on the benchtop, this squeezy bottle makes maintaining a healthy routine simple, beneficial, and, most importantly, delicious. It’s designed for ease of use by everyone, from little hands to grown-ups, making wellness both fun and fuss-free.

How to use: Portion: One teaspoon.
  • Enjoy one teaspoon of Manukora Manuka honey, three times per day for optimal results.
  • For a refreshing and nutritious post-workout drink, mix one teaspoon of Manukora honey into a glass of cool water.
  • Substitute your usual sweeteners with Manukora to potentially reduce your intake of added sugars and benefit from its prebiotic properties, which may support gut health.
  • For a delicious and nutritious twist on your breakfast or snacks, incorporate Manukora honey into your yogurt, cereals, or smoothies. This versatile ingredient not only enhances flavor but also provides a natural source of energy and potential immune support.
  • To preserve the honey's unique flavor and beneficial properties, always close the cap firmly after enjoying.
Caution & Warnings:
  • Not suitable for children under 12 months.
  • Ideal storage: below 25°C (77°F) and out of direct sunlight.

Name: Nepro High Protein Liquid Vanilla Flavor 220 Ml
Description:
Product Description:

Nepro High Protein Liquid is a nutritional supplement in delicious vanilla flavor. It is used as the sole source of nutrition or nutritional supplement for patients with chronic or acute kidney disease who are on haemodialysis or continuous ambulatory peritoneal dialysis (CAPD). It is also suitable for patients with low electrolyte, low volume enteral feed. It is packed with 28 vitamins and minerals including vitamin B3 and B6 that helps to produce energy and reduce tiredness. It is an energy-dense liquid that contains about 1.8 kcal/ml of energy. Also, it is rich in calories about 401 kcal per bottle. It is a healthy lipid blend with low phosphorus and potassium. Nepro HP is a complete renal nutrition that is used for oral and tube feeding. It is a medicinal liquid that contains modified micronutrient levels and a slow-release carbohydrate blend, which may aid the control of blood glucose levels.

  • Nepro HP Liquid is ideal for patients on dialysis
  • It is a dietary supplement to fulfill the nutritional requirement
  • It is also suitable for malnourished, non-dialyzed CKD patients with elevated protein needs
  • It contains higher protein of about 17.82g per bottle
  • It helps to replace the protein lost during dialysis and meets nutrition needs
  • The liquid contains monounsaturated fatty acids and omega-3 fatty acids
  • It can be used for oral or tube feeding
  • It contains a low glycemic index (GI) - 34
  • It is a lactose-free and gluten-free drink
  • It is suitable for vegetarians

Nutritional Information:

Nutrition  Value per 220 ml
Energy (kj) 1655 kj
Energy (kCal) 396 kCal
Protein 17.8 g
Fiber 2.77 g
Fructooligosaccharides 1.85 g
How to use:
  • Shake the bottle before use
  • For oral consumption, refrigerate the bottle and serve chill
  • Open immediately prior to use
  • Once opened, the unused product should be stored in the refrigerator only
  • If not consumed within 24 hrs, discard the unused product
  • For tube feeding, store the bottle at room temperature only
  • Attach the container with Abbott Nutrition giving set
  • Adjust the flow rate to meet the patients’ tolerance
Caution & Warnings:
  • To be used under medical supervision.
  • Use the recommended dosage by your physician and/or dietitian.
  • Patients should not make any addition to the feed without consulting their doctor.
  • Keep it in a cool, dry place.
  • Do not store it under direct sunlight.
  • It is suitable for people with diabetes provided that routine glucose checks are performed.
  • Suitable for people on dialysis only
Ingredients:

Water, Maltodextrin, Vegetable Oils (high oleic sunflower oil, canola oil), Caseinates (calcium caseinate, magnesium caseinate, sodium caseinate), milk protein isolate, sucrose, glycerin, fructooligosaccharides, Minerals (potassium citrate, sodium citrate, calcium citrate, magnesium chloride, magnesium sulfate, ferrous sulfate, zinc sulfate, cupric sulphate, manganese sulphate, potassium iodide, chromium chloride, sodium molybdate, sodium selenite), soy lecithin, flavouring, choline chloride, cellulose, I-carnitine, Vitamins (ascorbic acid, niacinamide, calcium pantothenate, pyridoxine hydrochloride, thiamine hydrochloride, riboflavin, vitamin E vitamin A palmitate, folic acid, biotin, phylloquinone, Vitamin D3, cyanocobalamin), taurine, sodium carboxymethyl cellulose

Name: Nupo Diet Shake Caffe Latte 12 Servings
Description:
Product Description :
  • Nupo Diet is a diet developed to achieve fast, safe, and efficient weight loss.
  • The Nupo diet consists of 6 Nupo Diet products per day.
  • This gives you a minimal amount of calories as well as all the necessary nutrients, vitamins, and minerals that your body needs. With the Nupo diet, you replace all yourmealswith 6 Nupo Diet products per day for a period of up to 8 weeks.
  • The Nupo diet gives you approx. 800 calories per day and is therefore considered a Very Low-Calorie Diet (VLCD).
  • The NUPO Diet consists ofNupo Diet Shakes, Meals, andSoups.
How To Use:
  • Add water and 1 sachet of Nupo in a shaker.
  • See amount of water on each sachet. Shake thoroughly.
  • Drink cold when consuming shakes.
  • Heat up, either in a microwave or in a pot, when consuming soups or meals.
  • Mix and match all 6 servings per day.
  • It is important to follow the instructions for use.
Cautions And Warnings :
  • People who are allergic to any of the components of this product are not allowed to take it, in addition to pregnant and lactating women, children, those under the age of 18, the obese, those suffering from heart disease or metabolic disorders, or the elderly, except with the advice of a specialist physician.
  • The product may cause headache, dizziness or coldness, hunger, lack of attention, and more or less frequent visits to the toilet.
  • The symptoms or side effects that you will experience can occur with any strict diet, but these symptoms are not limited to the Nupo diet.
Ingredients :
  • SOYprotein, skimmedMILKpowder, maltodextrin, polydextrose,SOYlecithin, vegetable oil (soy), freeze-dried coffee (4,5%), minerals (potassium citrate, potassium chloride, calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid, sodium chloride, magnesium citrate, zinc sulphate, ferric pyrophosphate, manganese sulphate, cupric sulphate, potassium iodide, sodium selenite, sodium molybdate) and vitamins (L-ascorbic acid, nicotinamide, DL-alpha-tocopheryl acetate, D-pantothenate, calcium, riboflavin, pyridoxine hydrochloride, thiamin mononitrate, beta-carotene, pteroylmonoglutamic acid, phylloquinone, D-biotin, ergocalciferol, cyanocobalamin), flavouring, thickeners: cellulose gum (E466), xanthan gum (E415);MILKprotein, psyllium husk powder (0,1%), sweetener: sucralose (E955).

  • The 20 amino acids are the building blocks of protein. 12 of these amino acids can be made in the body so are referred to as non-essential amino acids, whilst the other 8 are known as essential amino acids as they must be supplied in the diet.

Name: O.R.S Sport Hydration Tabs - 20 Effervescent Tablets
Description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION : •Adds a low-calorie electrolyte mix to water for fast, effective hydration. •Informed Sport certified formula based on the World Health Organisation oral rehydration solution. •With added magnesium and vitamin D to reduce fatigue and support muscle recovery. •Light tasting with natural flavours and free from artificial preservatives. HOW TO USE: Maximum 2 tablets/day. To maintain the body’s fluid level, prepare a solution of 1 tablet per 500ml of water. Drink 500ml before, during and after exercise. INGREDIANTS: Dextrose Monohydrate (Glucose Syrup); Citric Acid; Acidity Regulator [Sodium Bicarbonate]; Magnesium Carbonate; Potassium Chloride; Sodium Chloride; Anti-Caking Agent (Maize Starch); Natural Orange Flavouring (Maltodextrin, Dextrin, Flavouring Preparations, Natural Flavouring Substances); Sweetener (Sucralose); Colour (Beetroot Juice Concentrate); Cholecalciferol (Sucrose, Acacia, Corn Starch, Medium Chain Triglycerides, Silicon Dioxide, Vitamin D3, DL-Alpha-Tocopherol); Riboflavin. CAUTION & WARNINGS: Maximum Dosage: 2 tablets/day. Taking more than the recommended daily intake may be harmful. Food supplements should not be used to replace a well-balanced diet.  
  • Manufacturer: ORS
  • Product form: Tablets
  • Ingredients: Balanced electrolytes
Categories: Shop By Goal > Sports and Fitness, Shop By Goal > Sports and Fitness > Sports Performance

Name: Sis Go Hydro Berry 20 Tablets
Description:
Product Description:
  • Hydro is designed to ensure you are effectively hydrated to produce your best performance.
  • As an effervescent tablet that readily dissolves in plain water, it represents a highly practical approach (simply drop one tablet in your 500 ml water bottle) without the calories.
  • Hydro meets your sodium requirements at a specific concentration (30mmol/L) that is scientifically proven to produce superior hydration compared with water alone
Product Features:
  • SIMPLY DROP IN WATER TO PROVIDE A HIGH-ELECTROLYTE DRINK
  • HIGH IN SODIUM TO HELP PROMOTE HYDRATION
  • WHEN HYDRATION IS REQUIRED WITHOUT THE ADDED CALORIES
How to use:
  • Add 1 SiS GO Hydro tablet to 500ml of water and let it dissolve.
  • Once prepared consume within 24 hours.
  • Do not consume more than 4 tablets per day.
Ingredients:
  • Citric Acid, Electrolytes 37% (Sodium Bicarbonate, Sodium Chloride, Calcium Carbonate, Potassium Chloride, Tricalcium Phosphate, Magnesium Carbonate), Sorbitol, Inulin, Colour (Beetroot Red), Natural Flavouring, Elderberry Powder (2.3%), Starch, Sweetener (Sucralose), Vitamins (Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Riboflavin, Thiamin)
  • Manufacturer: SIS

Name: Agiolax Granules 250 gm
Description:
Sennoside, Ispagula Granules What Sennoside, Ispagula Granules is used for:
  • It is a stimulant laxative of plant origin.
Do not use in: 
  • Patients with abnormal stenoses in the gastrointestinal tract, ileus, diabetes mellitus that is difficult to control, acute inflammatory intestinal diseases eg, Crohn's disease, ulcerative colitis, appendicitis, abdominal pain of unknown cause, severe dehydration with water and electrolyte losses, children <10 years.
Warnings and Precautions:
  • Use for longer periods may worsen any existing bowel sluggishness.
  • The preparation should be used only if constipation cannot be remedied by a change in diet or with the aid of bulking agents.
  • When it is taken by adult incontinent persons, prolonged contact of the skin with the feces should be avoided by changing the sanitary towels.
Possible Side Effects:
  • Stop using the product and seek immediate medical attention if you develop throat tightness or swelling of the eyes, face, lips or tongue, feel faint, or have difficulty breathing. Stop using the product if you develop hives or itching of the face or body.
Other medicines and Sennoside, Ispagula Granules:
  • In cases of chronic use or abuse, the loss of potassium can potentiate the effect of cardiac glycosides and influence the action of antiarrhythmics. Loss of potassium can be enhanced in combination with certain diuretics, cortisone or cortisone-like substances (adrenocortical steroids) and liquorice roots.
  • The absorption of concurrently administered drugs from the gastrointestinal tract into the blood stream can be delayed. A reduction of the insulin dose can be required in insulin-dependent diabetics.
How to use Sennoside, Ispagula Granules:
  • Adults and Children >10 years: 1-2 tsp/sachets after the evening meal.
  • The individually correct dose is the lowest dose required to achieve a soft-formed stool.
  • Do not take more than 2 tsp/sachets in a day.
  • Without medical advice, it should not be taken over a longer period.
  • Please consult a healthcare practitioner for use beyond 7 days.
  • The granules should be swallowed whole with an abundant amount of liquid i.e., ¼ L. When taking other medication, wait ½-1 hr. before taking.
How to store Sennoside, Ispagula Granules:
  • Store below 30°C.
  • Manufacturer: Agiolax
  • Product form: Granules
  • Ingredients: Sennoside - Ispagula Granules

Name: A-Lax Tablet 30pcs
Description:
Senna, Rhubarb, Cascara tablets
 
What Senna, Rhubarb, Cascara tablet is used for:
  • This medicine is an herbal laxative aiding in relieving constipation.
Do not use Senna, Rhubarb, Cascara tablet:
  • Do not use for more than 10 days, contraindicated in Irritable Bowel Syndrome and diabetes.
Warnings and precautions:
  • Consult your doctor or pharmacist if you have an underlying medical condition, are taking any other medication or if symptoms persist.
Possible side effects:
  • Stop using the product and seek immediate medical attention if you develop throat tightness or swelling of the eyes, face, lips or tongue, feel faint, or have difficulty breathing. Stop using the product if you develop hives or itching of the face or body.
Other medicines and Senna, Rhubarb, Cascara tablet:
  • Moderate Interaction: Be cautious with this combination
  • Digoxin (Lanoxin) interacts with SENNA
  • Senna is a type of laxative called a stimulant laxative. Stimulant laxatives can decrease potassium levels in the body.
  • Low potassium levels can increase the risk of side effects of digoxin (Lanoxin).
  • Water pills (Diuretic drugs) interacts with SENNA
  • Senna is a laxative. Some laxatives can decrease potassium in the body. "Water pills" can also decrease potassium in the body.
  • Taking senna along with "water pills" might decrease potassium in the body too much.
  • Warfarin (Coumadin) interacts with SENNA
  • Senna can work as a laxative. In some people senna can cause diarrhea.
  • Diarrhea can increase the effects of warfarin and increase the risk of bleeding.
  • If you take warfarin do not to take excessive amounts of senna.
How to use Senna, Rhubarb, Cascara tablet:
  • One tablet once or twice daily or as recommended by doctor.
How to store Senna, Rhubarb, Cascara tablet:

Name: Bio-Garlic 300 mg 60 Tablets
Description:
Product Description:

  • Highly concentrated and standardized garlic extract
  • Contains 300 mg of dehydrated garlic powder per tablet, of which 4.7mg is the active mother substance alliin
  • Enteric coated (i.e. the tablet passes through the stomach intact and is only released in the intestine)
  • Helps to maintain the healthy function of the heart and blood vessels
  • Contributes to the normal functioning of the immune system
  • Supports the body's resistance against temporary stress
  • One tablet per day is a sufficient intake
  • Manufactured under Danish pharmaceutical control

What Is Biogarlic

  • Bio-Garlic consists of tablets with highly concentrated, garlic. One tablet contains 300 mg of dried garlic powder, standardized for content of the amino acid alliin Bio-Garlic is produced in a way that preserves the active ingredients and their enzyme activity from the fresh garlic.
  • When alliin comes into contact with the enzyme alliinase, the substance allicin is formed, which gives garlic its characteristic odor. This process takes place already in your mouth when you chew on fresh garlic.
  • The Bio-Garlic tablets are coated which means that they do not dissolve in the stomach. Only when the tablets are ingested and fully disolved in the intestine, the garlic enzyme alliinase is activated and converts the alliin to allicin, hereby reducing the risk of garlic breath significantly.
  • Furthermore the delayed dissolution of the tablet means that the alliin and alliinase content are not broken down and inactivated in the stomach.

How to use:

  • 1 tablet daily, unless otherwise advised. Preferably during / after a meal as a whole take.
  • Do not exceed the recommended daily dosage.

Ingredients:

  • microcrystalline cellulose,
  • methacrylate copolymer,
  • talc
  • polyethylene glycol,
  • silicon dioxide,
  • magnesiumsalt of fatty acids.

Ingredient

Name: Jp Maca 500 Mg 50 Capsule
Description:
Product Description:
  • JP Maca™, is a dietary supplement contains Maca Root extract powder 500 mg.
  • Maca (Lepidium meyenii, peruvianum, root) is a Peruvian tuberous plant that grows high in the Andean Mountains, that belongs to the tuberous plants of the Brassicaceae family.
  • Partly because of its effect on energy, stamina, libido and vitality, maca has also been dubbed ‘Peruvian ginseng’, or ‘ginseng of the Andes’.
  • The maca is the only edible plant able to survive during extreme weather conditions and at altitudes of between 3,000 and 4,000 meters.
  • The roots of the plant are extremely nutritious and for thousands of years have been eaten during almost every meal by the local population.
  • The rich nutritional value of this tuberous plant means that Maca is considered to be an adaptogenic plant.
  • Maca is also used in traditional medicine by both men and women to treat gender and hormone-relat[1]ed disorders.
  • Maca can potentially be used for perimenopausal and postmenopausal symptoms, premenstrual syndrome (PMS), libido and potency disorders, fertility problems and disrupted hormonal homeostasis.
How to use:
  • Take JP Maca™ 500 mg capsules, exactly as directed in this leaflet.
  • You should check with your pharmacist or physician if you are not sure.
As a dietary supplement:
  • Adults 18 years and older, should take 1 capsule daily with or after meals.
  • Consult a health care practitioner for use beyond 3 months.
  • For Menopausal and post-menopausal women only: Consult a health care practitioner for use beyond 6 weeks.
Caution & Warnings:
  • Do not take JP Maca™ - If you are allergic (hypersensitive) to maca root extract or any of the other ingredients of JP Maca™.
Taking other medicines Consult your health care professional/doctor, prior to use:
  • If you have high blood pressure, if you are taking antidepressants or blood thinners, if you suffer from any psychological disorder and/or condition such as frequent anxiety or depression.
  • Talk to your doctor, pharmacist, or health care provider if you are taking any other medications.
  • Pregnancy and breast-feeding Consult a health care professional or pharmacist prior to use if you are pregnant of breastfeeding.
Ingredients:
  • Each capsule contains 500 mg of Maca Root powder.
Other Ingredients:
  • Colloidal Silicon Dioxide, Magnesium Stearate and Cellulose.
  • Manufacturer: Eva
  • Ingredients: Maca Extract

  • Marnys® salmon oil is a natural source of omega-3 fatty acids, it is also a source of natural vitamin e, which helps protect cells from oxidative stress resulting from stress.
  • Salmon oil is rich in Omega-3 fatty acids: eicosapentaenoic (EPA) and docosahexaenoic (DHA).

  “Free From” Information:
Colorant Free
Preservative Free
Artificial Flavors Free
Product Features :  
  • The presence of natural vitamin E is of vital importance in the membranes of the retina cells (where the highest amount of the body DHA is concentrated), as it protects against oxidation and maintains the concentration of DHA.
  • MARNYS® SalmonOil is free from artificial preservatives, coloring, flavoring, and yeast.
  • MARNYS® analyses marine oils in accordance with strict international standards of pureness and freshness, guaranteeing that salmon oil properties are non-toxic.
Keep Healthy Levels of Omega-3 Because :    Keep Heart-Healthy :
  • Research shows that the addition of omega-3 fatty acids as in salmon oil to your diet can significantly lower lipid concentrations in patients with high cholesterol and triglyceride levels.
Anti-Inflammatory Action :
  • Research has extensively proven the anti-inflammatory effects of omega-3s.
  • Whether for reducing inflammation in critically ill patients or for inflammatory diseases like rheumatoid arthritis, salmon oil capsules can provide relief.
Helpsfor Depression:
  •  Research suggests that the EPA and DHA components in salmon oil could have an antidepressant effect.
  • Scientific reviews support the use of salmon oil in cases of depression alongside regular antidepressant therapies.
Boost Brain Power :
  • Studies indicate that omega-3 may have the potential to support learning, intelligence, and memory while preventing cognitive decline.
  • This means it could be helpful in the prevention of neurodegenerative diseases.
Stay in Shape : 
  • While not specifically singled out until now, fish oil could be responsible for boosting weight loss when combined with a healthy diet and active lifestyle.
  • This effect of salmon oil is still being studied, but it does seem promising.
For Skincare and Eyesight :
  • There is evidence to suggest that salmon oil may be helpful in treating skin conditions like photoaging, skin cancer, allergy, inflammation, wound healing, and hyperpigmentation.
  • It can also be good for preventing glaucoma and dry eyes and supporting general eye health.
Good for the Nerves :
  • In diseases such as Multiple Sclerosis where the fatty protective myelin sheath of the nerves is lost, the components in salmon oil can help in the remyelination of the nerves.
How to use:
  • Take 1 to 2 capsules per day, preferably after main meals.

Name: JP Omega 3 Fish Oil 567 mg 30 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:

  • Omega-3 fatty acids are considered essential fatty acids:
  • They are necessary for human health but the body cannot make them.
  • Omega-3 fatty acids can be found in fish, such as salmon, tuna, and halibut, other seafood including algae and krill, some plants, and nut oils.
  • Also known as polyunsaturated fatty acids (PUFAs), Omega-3 fatty acids play a crucial role in brain function, as well as normal growth and development and it may reduce the risk of heart disease.
  • Omega-3 fatty acids reduce inflammation and may help lower risk of chronic diseases such as heart disease, cancer, and arthritis.
  • Omega-3 fatty acids are highly concentrated in the brain and appear to be important for cognitive (brain memory and performance) and behavioral function.
  • Infants who do not get enough Omega-3 fatty acids from their mothers during pregnancy may be at risk for developing vision and nerve problems.
  • Symptoms of Omega-3 fatty acid deficiency include fatigue, poor memory, dry skin, heart problems, mood swings or depression, and poor circulation.

Omega 3 has a lot of health benefits as:

Name: Thiotacid Alpha Lipoic Acid 300 mg 30 Tablets
Description:
Product Description:
  • Alpha-lipoic acid is a natural product is a natural nutrient synthesized in the liver. Yeast, liver, kidney, spinach, broccoli, and potatoes are good sources of alpha-lipoic acid. It is also made in the laboratory for use as medicine.
  • Alpha-lipoic acid is most commonly used for nerve pain in people with diabetes (diabetic neuropathy). Pain sensations may be described as numbness, hot, burning, throbbing, shooting, stabbing, sharp, cramping, and needles. 
  • It is also could be used in non-diabetic neuropathic pain, such as low back pain, & sciatica. 
How does it work?
  • Alpha-lipoic acid seems to help prevent certain kinds of cell damage in the body, and also restores vitamin levels such as vitamin E and vitamin C. There is also evidence that alpha-lipoic acid can improve the function and conduction of neurons in diabetes.
  • Alpha-lipoic acid is used in the body to break down carbohydrates and to make energy for the other organs in the body.
  • Alpha-lipoic acid seems to work as an antioxidant, which means that it might provide protection to the brain under conditions of damage or injury. The antioxidant effects might also be helpful in certain liver diseases.
Product Features: Possibly Effective for:
  • Nerve pain in people with diabetes(diabetic neuropathy) and non-diabetic neuropathy. Taking 600-1800 mg of alpha-lipoic acid by mouth seems to improve symptoms such as burning, pain, and numbness in the legs and arms of people with diabetes. It may take 3 to 5 weeks of treatment for symptoms to improve.
Cautions & Warnings:
  • People taking alpha-lipoic acid by mouth might get a rash.
  • Consult your doctor if you are:pregnant,lactating,diabetic.
  • Keep out of reach of children.
How To Use: All doses should be prescribed by doctors first:
  • For nerve pain in people with diabetes (diabetic neuropathy): 600-1800 mg of alpha-lipoic acid per day for 4 weeks, Then for 12 – 16 weeks on 600mg/day.
  • For nerve pain in people with non-diabetic neuropathy ( Sciatica & low back pain): 600 – 1800 mg of alpha-lipoic acid per day for 6 -12 weeks. 
  • It should be taken on an empty stomach.
  • Manufacturer: Thiotacid
  • Product form: Tablets
  • Ingredients: Alpha Lipoic Acid

Name: Medex Omega 3 Junior 140 ml Liquid
Description:
Product Description:
  • Honey syrup with omega-3 fatty acids, which are of key importance for the brain, vision, heart, and immune system development
  • The syrup is a source of DHA and EPA, which are in the optimal 5:1 ratio (similar to breast milk), and children consume 250 mg of DHA and 50 mg of EPA in a daily dose.
  Product benefits:
  • Medex Omega-3 Junior 140 Ml Syrup contains DHA and EPA, which are of key importance for the brain, vision, heart and immune system development, and which improve cell function
  • The syrup has a honey base (contains 74% of honey) enriched by pear and lemon juice, giving it an excellent taste, and is complete without the unpleasant smell of fish
  • A daily dose of the syrup contains 250 mg of DHA, which is also the daily dose recommended by the EFSA, and 50 mg of EPA with regular daily intake.
  • DHA and EPA omega-3 unsaturated fatty acids contained in this syrup are in the optimal 5:1 ratio (similar to breast milk)
  • Added vitamins A, B12, C, D, and E which are important for the growth and development of children, the nervous system, and together with omega-3 fatty acids have a supportive effect
  • Added folic acid
  • No preservatives, colorants, artificial flavours, and sweeteners
Product Features:   Who is the Medex Omega-3 Junior Syrup intended for? 
  • Children in the phase of intensive growth 1 to 14
  • Children who do not consume sufficient quantities of omega-3 fatty acids through diet
  • The syrup is also intended for children who refuse to eat a certain food group.
  • Pregnant and nursing mothers to meet their higher demand for nutrients
Why do we need Omega-3 fatty acids?
  • We need THREE kinds of Omega-3 fatty acids: EPA, DHA, ALA.
  • Mostly we all get enough ALA but the problem is EPA (eicosapentaenoic acid) and DHA (docosahexaenoic acid), but the majority of European countries have lower daily consumption of Omega-3 fatty acids than advised:
  • Many health professionals recommend 250-1000 mg/day.
  • In Europe, this intake on average is significantly under 500 mg.
Why do EPA and DHA omega-3 fatty acids matter?
  • Significantly lowers the risk of coronary heart disease
  • DHA is the most abundant Omega-3 fatty acid for your brain. It is literally "food for thought„.
  • The body’s highest concentration of DHA is found in the retina of the eye, which means it is an important nutrient for eye health
  • Roles of vitamins included in the syrup:
  • Vitamin A contributes to ensuring iron metabolism and to the maintenance of normal vision
  • Vitamin B12 contributes to the function of the immune system, to the normal psychological function, to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue, and contributes to normal red blood cell formation
  • Vitamin C contributes to the function of the immune system, to the normal psychological function, and contributes to the normal function of the immune system
  • Vitamin D contributes to the maintenance of healthy bones and teeth and to the normal function of the immune system. The Omega-3 junior syrup contains vitamin D in its natural D3 form (cholecalciferol), which absorbs well into the body
  • Folate contributes to normal blood formation. It also contributes to the normal psychological function and to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue, which is particularly important for children who are already in kindergarten and school
Benefits of honey as a base for syrups:
  • Honey does not give just great taste and thick texture, it is a living thing
  • It has antimicrobial action in the oral cavity - contains certain enzymes that have an antimicrobial effect, it also contains short antimicrobial bee peptides and flavonoids from plants
  • Essential oils in honey have a beneficial effect on the respiratory system
  • On top, honey is a natural preservative, so no artificial one is needed
How to use:
  • Children over one year of age: 1 teaspoon (5 ml) once a day
  • Pregnant or nursing women: 2 x 5 ml (10 ml) consumed three times a day
Caution & Warnings:
  • In case of oversensitivity to any ingredient, the product should not be consumed
Ingredients:
  • 75 % honey, concentrated pear juice, fish oil, concentrated lemon juice, natural orange, lemon, and rosemary flavors, vitamin C,
  • Emulsifier: polysorbate 20 (E 432), vitamin E (α-tocopheryl acetate), vitamin A (retinyl palmitate), folic acid, vitamin D, vitamin B12.

Name: JP Melatonin 5 Mg 60 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:
  • JP MelatoninTM 5mg contains the active substance melatonin. JP MelatoninTM 5mg can be used for the treatment of jetlag in adults.
  • Jetlag can be recognized by sleep disturbances, daytime tiredness, fatigue, mild mental impairment, irritability, and digestive system disturbances experienced after flying.
  • How JP MelatoninTM 5mg works: Melatonin is a hormone produced by the body that synchronizes body’s biological day
  • The biological rhythm can be disturbed by traveling across time zones. This is known as a jet crossing across time zones.
  • This is known as jet lag. The symptoms and their severity vary between individuals but are generally worse and last longer. The more time zones are crossed,
  • JP MelatoninTM 5mg can help restore day-and-night night rhythm and reduce the symptoms
  • You must talk to a doctor if you do not feel better or worse after 5 days.
JP MelatoninTM helps improve sleep quality related to:
  1. Primary insomnia (insomnia which is not due to some secondary cause)
  2. Age-related insomnia
  3. Jetlag
  4. Shift work
  5. Post-traumatic brain injury
  6. Neurodegenerative disorders
How to use:
  • Take JP MelatoninTM soft gel capsules exactly as directed in this leaflet.
  • The recommended dose is one capsule taken daily by mouth, after food, 1-2 hours before bedtime.
  • This dosage may be continued for up to thirteen weeks.
Cautions and Warnings:
  • Do not take JP MelatoninTM soft gel capsules if you are allergic (hypersensitive) to the active substance Melatonin or to any of the other ingredients in JP MelatoninTM soft gel capsules.
Taking other medicines:
  • Tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are taking, have recently taken, or might take any other medicines. These medicines include:
  • Fluvoxamine (used for the treatment of depression and obsessive-compulsive disorder), psoralens (used in the treatment of skin disorders, e.g., psoriasis), cimetidine (used in the treatment of stomach problems such as ulcers), quinolones and rifampicin (used in the treatment of bacterial infections), estrogens (used in contraceptives or hormone replacement therapy), and carbamazepine (used in the treatment of epilepsy)
  • Adrenergic agonists and antagonists (such as certain types of medicines used to control blood pressure by constricting blood vessels, nasal decongestants, and blood pressure-lowering medicines), opiate agonists and antagonists (such as medicinal products used in the treatment of drug addiction), prostaglandin inhibitors (such as nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory medicines), antidepressant medication, tryptophan, and alcohol
  • Benzodiazepines and non-benzodiazepine hypnotics (medicines used to induce sleep such as zaleplon, zolpidem and zopiclone)
  • Thioridazine (for the treatment of schizophrenia) and imipramine (for the treatment of depression)
Pregnancy and breast-feeding:
  • Do not take JP MelatoninTM 5mg if you are pregnant, think you may be pregnant, are trying to become pregnant, or are breast-feeding.
  • Ask your doctor or pharmacist for advice before taking this medicine.
Driving and using machines:
  • Melatonin may cause drowsiness.
  • If you are affected, you should not drive or operate machinery.
  • If you suffer from continued drowsiness, then you should consult your doctor.
Ingredients:
  • Each soft gel capsule contains 5mg of melatonin.
  • Manufacturer: Jp
Categories: Shop By Goal > General Health, Shopping by vitamins > Melatonin, Shop By Goal > General Health > Sleep and Relaxation

  • It is available in ready-to-drink single-dose liquid vials that are easy to administer and can be mixed with food and beverages.
  • It restores the balance of the good bacteria in the intestines and gently treats and prevents tummy upsets caused by a disturbance in the natural friendly bacteria in the intestines.
  • This imbalance can lead to diarrhea, abdominal pain, and an increase in the air in the intestine (bloating)
  • It works by restoring the balance of the good bacteria in the intestines and gently treating and preventing tummy upsets caused by a disturbance in the natural friendly bacteria in the intestines.
  • This imbalance can lead to diarrhea, abdominal pain, and an increase in the air in the intestine (bloating).
  • This intestinal bacterial bacteria (flora) constitutes a real defensive barrier against harmful bacteria.
  Normal flora balance disturbance may occur due to:
  • Frequent use of antibiotics and antiprotozoal medications.
  • Intestinal infections
  • Food  Poisoning and disorders
  • Changes in diet
  • Enterogermina® contains Bacillus clausii; a friendly bacteria usually present in the intestine that restores the health of tiny tummies from the age of one-month-old.

Name: Linex Baby 1 Billion Probiotics 10 Sachets
Description:
Product Description:
  • Linex baby is a probiotic intended for use in infants and children below 12 years of age to support the balance and function of useful intestinal microflora.
  • The balance of the good bacteria in the intestines gently treats and prevents abdominal upsets caused by a disturbance in the natural friendly bacteria in the intestines.
  • This imbalance can lead to diarrhea, abdominal pain, and an increase in the air in the intestine (bloating).
  • This intestinal bacterial bacteria (flora) constitutes a real defensive barrier against harmful bacteria.
Normal flora balance disturbance may occur due to:
  • Frequent use of antibiotics and antiprotozoal medications.
  • Intestinal infections
  • Changes in diet
  • Linex baby contains Lactic acid bacteria “ Bifidobacterium animalis, lactis (BB-12), (Good bacteria) which help safely to support the balance and function of useful intestinal microflora.
  • Linex baby made in Slovenia and can be given without prescription.
How to use:
  1. Linex Baby is intended for oral use only, and should not be taken together with hot beverages.
  2. Open the sachet and empty its content into a glass of water, juice, or milk. The powder can also be mixed with food for infants.
  3. If you give Linex Baby to your child concomitantly with antibiotics it is recommended to use it not earlier than three hours after administration of the antibiotic.
Dosage 
  • Infants and children up to 2 years of age: one sachet once a day.
  • Children aged 2 to 12 years: one sachet one to two times a day (for instance, in the morning and in the evening).
  • You can give Linex baby to your child until symptoms improve.
  • If diarrhea does not improve after two days of treatment with Linex Baby, please consult your doctor.
Caution & Warnings:
  • Don’t give Linex baby to a child, if he/she is allergic (hypersensitive) to active substance or any of the other ingredients of Linex baby.
  • Before the start of therapy the parents should consult a physician:
  • if the child's body temperature exceeds 38 °C,
  • if they notice occult blood or mucus in the child’s stool,
  • if diarrhea lasts for more than two days,
  • if the child has intense diarrhea accompanied by dehydration and loss of body weight,
  • if diarrhea is accompanied by intense abdominal pain,
  • if the child has diarrhea and other chronic diseases (e.g. diabetes, cardiovascular diseases) AIDS) or immunodeﬁciency states (e.g. HIV infection).
Ingredients:
  • Each sachet of powder for oral suspension contains not less than 1 x 10⁹ colony forming units (CFU) of lyophilized lactic acid bacteria Biﬁdobacterium animalis subsp. lactis (BB-12).
  • The other ingredients: maltodextrin

Name: Dorofen 90 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:
  • A joint is where two bones meet and connected with muscles to cause movement
  • The bones' heads are protected by elastic articular cartilage to act as shock absorbing cushion and reduce the friction during movement
  • The joint cavity is filled with synovial fluid which reduce friction between the two cartilages during movement
  • There is a balance between wear and tear inside the cartilage in normal condition as our bodies produce glucosamine which is the building block of the articular cartilage to maintain and repair the damage inside the cartilage due to movement
  • By aging, obesity and other factors, the amount of endogenous glucosamine produced in our bodies tends to decrease, hence the balance between wear and tear inside the cartilage will be negatively affected and osteoarthritis will be the end result
  • Provides your body with the biological active isomer " Alpha - D - Glucosamine " which is the building block of the articular cartilage
  • Increases the synthesis of synovial fluid which keeps the mobility of your joints, reduces morning stiffness and crepitus during movement
Product Features:
  • Improves peripheral circulation which helps reduce pain during movement
  • Restores the balance between wear and tear inside the cartilage
  • Treats the underlying cause of osteoarthritis which is deficiency of endogenous glucosamine
  • Has a strong safety profile on long term use
  • safe for patients suffering from peptic or duodenal ulcer
  • Has a simple dosage regimen
How to use:
  • 1 Capsule three times daily after meals from 4 to 6 week followed by long term once daily dose / Consult your physician.
Caution & Warnings:
  • Avoid using Dorofen if you are allergic to glucosamine or Ginkgo Biloba leaf extract
  • Patients on anti-coagulants should consult their physician before using Dorofen
Ingredients:
Nutritional Facts
Serving Size: 1 Capsule

Servings Per Container: 90
Ingredient Concentration
Alpha-D-Glucosamine Sulfate 500 mg
Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract 50 mg

Name: Omipure Omega 3 1000 mg 28 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:
  • Omipurecontains highly purified omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids.
  • Omipurebelongs to a group of so called reducers of cholesterol and triglycerides.
Omipureis used:
  • Together with other medicines for treatment after a heart attack.
  • To treat certain forms of increased triglycerides (fats) in the blood after changes to the diet have not worked.
How to use:
  • Always takeOmipureexactly as your doctor has told you. You should check with your doctor or pharmacist if you are not sure.
  • Swallow the capsules with a drink of water.
  • You may take the capsules at meal times to help reduce gastro-intestinal side effects.
  • Your doctor will decide how long you should take this medicine.
Dose after a heart attack
  • The usual dose is one capsule a day.
  • Dose to treat high blood triglyceride levels (high levels of fat in the blood or hypertriglyceridemia)
  • The usual dose is 2 capsules a day, as recommended by a doctor.
  • If the medicine is not working well enough at this dose, your doctor may increase this to 4 capsules a day.
Cautions and warnings:
  • Do not takeOmipureIf you are allergic (hypersensitive) to the main ingredient or any of the other ingredients of Omipure.
  • Take special care withOmipure:
  • If you are due to have or have had surgery recently.
  • If you have had a trauma recently.
  • If you have a kidney problem.
  • If you have diabetes which is not controlled.
  • If you have problems with your liver. Your doctor will monitor any effectsOmipuremay have on your liver with blood tests.
  • If you are allergic to fish.
  • If any of the above applies to you, talk to your doctor or pharmacist before taking this medicine.
UsingOmipurewith other medicines
  • If you are using a medicine to stop blood clotting in your arteries, such as warfarin you may need extra blood tests and your usual dose of your blood thinning medicine may have to be changed.
  • Please tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are using or have recently used other medicines including medicines obtained without prescription.
TakingOmipurewith food or drink
  • You should take the capsules at meal times. This is to help lower the chances of side effects that affect the area in and around the stomach (the gastro-intestinal area).
Use in elderly
  • UseOmipurewith care if you are over 70 years.
Use in children
  • Children should not take this medicine.
Pregnancy and breast-feeding
  • You should not take this medicine if you are pregnant or breast-feeding, unless your doctor decides it is absolutely necessary.
  • Ask your doctor or pharmacist for advice before using any medicine.
Driving and using machines
  • This medicine is not likely to affect you being able to drive or use any tools or machines.
  • Important Information about some of the ingredients
Omipuremay contain soya-bean oil. If you are allergic to peanut or soya, do not use this medicinal product. Ingredients:
  • Each capsule contains 1000 mg of Omega-3-acid ethyl esters 90, which contains eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA) ethyl ester (460 mg) and docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) ethyl ester (380 mg).
Excipients (non-medicinal ingredients):
  • Capsule core: Alpha-tocopherol, as an antioxidant
  • Capsule shell: Gelatin, glycerol, purified water, medium-chain triglycerides, lecithin (soya)
  • Manufacturer: Omipure
  • Ingredients: Omega 3

Name: Thiotacid Thioctic Acid 600 mg Alpha Lipoic Acid 30 Caplets
Description:
Product Description:
  • Alpha-lipoic acid is a natural product synthesized in the liver. Yeast, liver, kidney, spinach, broccoli, and potatoes are good sources of alpha-lipoic acid. It is also made in the laboratory for use as medicine.
  • Alpha-lipoic acid is most commonly used for nerve pain in people with diabetes (diabetic neuropathy). Pain sensations may be described as numbness, hotness, burning, throbbing, shooting, stabbing, sharpness, cramping, and needles.
  • It could also be used for non-diabetic neuropathic pain, such as low back pain and sciatica.
How does it work?
  • Alpha-lipoic acid seems to help prevent certain kinds of cell damage in the body and also restore vitamin levels such as vitamin E and vitamin C. There is also evidence that alpha-lipoic acid can improve the function and conduction of neurons in diabetes.
  • Alpha-lipoic acid is used in the body to break down carbohydrates and to make energy for the other organs in the body.
  • Alpha-lipoic acid seems to work as an antioxidant, which means that it might provide protection to the brain under conditions of damage or injury. The antioxidant effects might also be helpful in certain liver diseases.
Product Features: Possibly effective for:
  • Nerve pain in people with diabetes (diabetic neuropathy) and non-diabetic neuropathy
  • Taking 600–1800 mg of alpha-lipoic acid by mouth seems to improve symptoms such as burning, pain, and numbness in the legs and arms of people with diabetes.
  • It may take 3 to 5 weeks of treatment for symptoms to improve.
Cautions and Warnings:
  • People taking alpha-lipoic acid by mouth might get a rash.
  • Consult your doctor if you are pregnant, lactating, or diabetic.
  • Keep out of reach of children
How to use: All doses should be prescribed by doctors first.
  • For nerve pain in people with diabetes (diabetic neuropathy): 600–1800 mg of alpha-lipoic acid per day for 4 weeks. Then for 12–16 weeks on 600mg
  • For nerve pain in people with non-diabetic neuropathy (sciatica and low back pain): 600–1800 mg of alpha-lipoic acid per day for 6–12 weeks.
  • It should be taken on an empty stomach.
  • Manufacturer: Thiotacid
  • Ingredients: Alpha Lipoic Acid

Name: JP Co-Q10 100 mg 30 Capsules
Description:
Product description:
  • The natural fuel for all body organs to help maintain normal functions.
  • The powerful antioxidant that protect the body from all early aging signs.
  • Coq10 is a fat-soluble, vitamin-like substance with double function:
  • cellular energy: found in every cell of your body & involved in the production of cellular energy for the different membranes of the body organ.
  • anti-oxidant defense: the only endogenously synthesized lipid soluble antioxidant, protect the body from damage of free radicals.
  • the coq10 concentration in the tissues decreases with age. If we set the level of coq10 in the heart at the age of 20 as 100%, this level will have dropped to 42.9% by the age of 80.
Indications:
  • powerful mitochondrial bioenergetics.
  • in sports nutrition, to increase endurance, improve stamina & athletic performance and minimize time for recovery after training.
  • improving overall semen parameters in cases male infertility.
  • supportive treatment in cases of female infertility in relation of poly cystic ovary syndrome.
  • in cases of myopathy related to statin treatment for patients with hypercholesterolemia.
  • in the treatment of recurrent headache & migraine attacks
How to use:
  • Recommended dose may vary according to the need or case.
  • However, those who are older or suspect they have decreased levels due to illness or using statin medication may want to start supplementing with 100-200 mg of co-q10 per day for 2-3 weeks to reach maximum serum conc.
  • After that, 50-100 mg per day is a good maintenance dose.
  • The normal intake per normal person may reach 100 mg per day preferable in divided doses.
Caution & warnings:
  • Co-q10 may decrease the effectiveness of warfarin. Those taking warfarin should be aware of this possibility.
  • Because of lack of long term safety studies, pregnant women and nursing mothers should avoid co-q10tm supplements.
  • Consult your doctor if you are using any of the medicines that treat high blood pressure.

Name: Thiotacid Thioctic Acid 300 Mg Alpha Lipoic Acid 60 Tablets
Description:
Product Description:
  • Alpha-lipoic acid is a natural product is a natural nutrient synthesized in the liver. Yeast, liver, kidney, spinach, broccoli, and potatoes are good sources of alpha-lipoic acid. It is also made in the laboratory for use as medicine. 
  • Alpha-lipoic acid is most commonly used for nerve pain in people with diabetes (diabetic neuropathy). Pain sensations may be described as numbness, hot, burning, throbbing, shooting, stabbing, sharp, cramping, and needles. 
  • It is also could be used in non-diabetic neuropathic pain, such as low back pain, & sciatica. 
 
 
How does it work? 
 
  • Alpha-lipoic acid seems to help prevent certain kinds of cell damage in the body and also restores vitamin levels such as vitamin E and vitamin C. There is also evidence that alpha-lipoic acid can improve the function and conduction of neurons in diabetes. 
  • Alpha-lipoic acid is used in the body to break down carbohydrates and to make energy for the other organs in the body. 
  • Alpha-lipoic acid seems to work as an antioxidant, which means that it might provide protection to the brain under conditions of damage or injury. The antioxidant effects might also be helpful in certain liver diseases. 
    Product Features:     Possibly Effective for:  
  • Nerve pain in people with diabetes (diabetic neuropathy) and non-diabetic neuropathy. Taking 600-1800 mg of alpha-lipoic acid by mouth seems to improve symptoms such as burning, pain, and numbness in the legs and arms of people with diabetes. It may take 3 to 5 weeks of treatment for symptoms to improve. 
    Caution & Warnings:  
  • People taking alpha-lipoic acid by mouth might get a rash. 
  • Consult your doctor if you are: pregnant, lactating, diabetic. 
  • Keep out of reach of children. 
  How to use: All doses should be prescribed by doctors first:  
  • For nerve pain in people with diabetes (diabetic neuropathy): 600-1800 mg of alpha-lipoic acid per day for 4 weeks. Then for 12 – 16 weeks on 600mg. 
  • For nerve pain in people with non-diabetic neuropathy ( Sciatica & low back pain): 600 – 1800 mg of alpha-lipoic acid per day for 6 -12 weeks. 
  • It should be taken on an empty stomach.
  • Manufacturer: Thiotacid
  • Product form: Tablets
  • Ingredients: Alpha Lipoic Acid

  • This is twice the concentration of natural fish oils and they help to maintain the heart function and are important in many other functions of the body.
  • so you can keep doing what you love with a healthy heart.
 
  • Research over the last 20 years has investigated the association between increased consumption of long-chain omega-3 fatty acids and a variety of health conditions.
  • Benefits include a lot of aspects mainly reduced heart disease risk factors.
Product Features:      Keep Heart-Healthy :
  • Research shows that the addition of omega-3 fatty acids as in salmon oil to your diet can significantly lower lipid concentrations in patients with high cholesterol and triglyceride levels.
Anti-Inflammatory Action :
  • Research has extensively proven the anti-inflammatory effects of omega-3s.
  • Whether for reducing inflammation in critically ill patients or for inflammatory diseases like rheumatoid arthritis, salmon oil capsules can provide relief.
Helps for Depression:
  •  Research suggests that the EPA and DHA components in salmon oil could have an antidepressant effect.
  • Scientific reviews support the use of salmon oil in cases of depression alongside regular antidepressant therapies.
Boost Brain Power :
  • Studies indicate that omega-3 may have the potential to support learning, intelligence, and memory while preventing cognitive decline.
  • This means it could be helpful in the prevention of neurodegenerative diseases.
Stay in Shape : 
  • While not specifically singled out until now, fish oil could be responsible for boosting weight loss when combined with a healthy diet and active lifestyle.
  • This effect of salmon oil is still being studied, but it does seem promising.
For Skincare and Eyesight :
  • There is evidence to suggest that salmon oil may be helpful in treating skin conditions like photoaging, skin cancer, allergy, inflammation, wound healing, and hyperpigmentation.
  • It can also be good for preventing glaucoma and dry eyes and supporting general eye health.
Good for the Nerves :
  • In diseases such as Multiple Sclerosis where the fatty protective myelin sheath of the nerves is lost, the components in salmon oil can help in the remyelination of the nerves.

Name: JP Melatonin 5 mg 100 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:
  • JP Melatonin™ 5mg contains the active ingredient melatonin with 5mg per each soft-gel capsule.
  • JP Melatonin™ 5mg can be used for treatment of Jet-lag in adults.
  • Jet-lag can be recognized by sleep disturbances, daytime tiredness, fatigue, disturbances, daytime tiredness, fatigue, mild mental impairment, irritability and digestive system disturbances experienced after flying.
  • How JP Melatonin™ 5mg works: Melatonin is a hormone produced by the body that synchronizesbody’s biological day.
  • The biological rhythm can be disturbed by travelling across time zones. This is known as a jetting across time zones.
  • This is known as a jet lag. The symptoms and their severity vary between individuals but are generally worse last longer, the more time zones are crossed.
  • JP Melatonin™ 5mg can help restore day-and-night night rhythm and reduce the symptoms of disturbed sleep patterns.
  • You must talk to a doctor if you do not feel better or worsen after 5 days.
  • JP Melatonin™ Helps improve sleep quality related to:
  • Primary insomnia (insomnia which is not due to some secondary cause)
  • Age-related insomnia
  • Jet lag
  • Shift work
  • Post-traumatic brain injury
  • Neuro-degenerative disorders
      How to use: Take JP Melatonin™ soft-gel capsules exactly as directed in the product leaflet. The recommended dose is one capsule taken daily by mouth, after food, 1-2 hours before bedtime. This dosage may be continued for up to thirteen weeks.     Caution & Warnings:   Do not take JP Melatonin™ soft-gel capsules, If:
  • You are allergic (hypersensitive) to the active substance Melatonin or to any of the other ingredients of JP Melatonin™ soft-gel capsules.
  • Taking other medicines:
Tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are taking, have recently taken or might take any other medicines. These medicines include: - Fluvoxamine (used for the treatment of depression and obsessive-compulsive disorder), Psoralens (used in the treatment of skin disorders e.g. psoriasis), Cimetidine (used in the treatment of stomach problems such as ulcers), Quinolones and Rifampicin (used in the treatment of bacterial infections), Estrogens (used in contraceptives or hormone replacement therapy) and Carbamazepine (used in the treatment of epilepsy). - Adrenergic agonists/antagonists (such as certain types of medicines used to control blood pressure by constricting blood vessels, nasal decongestants, blood pressure lowering medicines), opiate agonists/antagonists (such as medicinal products used in the treatment of drug addiction), Prostaglandin inhibitors (such as Non-steroidal Anti-inflammatory medicines), antidepressant medication, tryptophan and alcohol. - Benzodiazepines and Non-benzodiazepine hypnotics (medicines used to induce sleep such as Zaleplon, Zolpidem and Zopiclone) - Thioridazine (for the treatment of schizophrenia) and Imipramine (for the treatment of depression).
  • Pregnancy and breast-feeding:
Do not take JP Melatonin™ 5mg if you are pregnant, think you may be pregnant, trying to become pregnant or breast-feeding. Ask your doctor or pharmacist for advice before taking this medicine.
  • Driving and using machines:
Melatonin may cause drowsiness. If you are affected, you should not drive or operate machinery. If you suffer from continued drowsiness, then you should consult your doctor     Ingredients:   Each soft-gel capsule contains 5mg Melatonin. Other Ingredients are: Polyethylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Gelatin, Glycerol, Sorbitol Solution 70% , Titanium Dioxide and Purified Water.

Description:

  • When exposed to sexual stimulation, a chemical reaction takes place between sex
  • hormones and their neuroreceptors in the brain’s erection nerve centers which in turn sends signals through the nerves feeding the penis
  • As a result of these nerve signals, arteries dilate and increase blood flow to the spongy tissue in penis
  • The spongy tissue expands to receive the blood and valves in the penile veins close to trap the blood inside the penis
  • This produces an increase in the blood pressure inside the penis and causes an erection
  • By aging, chronic diseases (Diabetes, Hypertension , Hypocholesteremia) and by chronic medication; sex hormone neuroreceptors loose it's sensitivity to testosterone resulting in insufficient libido upon sexual stimulation
  • Without sufficient libido, erection is not possible

  • Gentaplex has a triple effect on sexual activity (restores libido, enhances erection and increases frequency of sexual intercourse)
  • Gentaplex treats the root cause of erectile dysfunction; deficient libido
  • Gentaplex is characterized by its long-lasting effect and does not require a dose immediately before intercourse
  • Gentaplex is easy to use and safe for long term use
  • Gentaplex is safe for cardiac patients and those on nitrates therapy unlike other products
  • Gentaplex Restore Your Happy Moments
How to use:
  • 1 Capsule three times daily after meals from 1 up to 3 months followed by long term once daily dose / Consult your physician
  • In average most cases feel improvement in sexual activity within 4 to 6 weeks
  • In some cases, the patient may need 8 up to 12 weeks till improvement
  • The duration of treatment depends on the age of the patient, if the patient has chronic diseases and use chronic medications or not, the patient life style (obesity and smoking have a negative impact on sexual activity while light sports can help)
Caution & Warnings:

Name: Bioserv La Belle 30 Bottles (2 Pcs Starter Dose)
Description:
Product description:  
  • La belle® contains 10 g hydrolyzed collagen type 1 (verisol®) in each bottle.
  • La belle® is a drink. It works from the inside out to rebuild and strengthen the collagen matrix below the skin’s surface, boost natural levels of hydration and reduce fine lines and wrinkles.
  • Drinking la belle® daily results in firmer, youthful and healthier looking skin. It reduces fine lines and wrinkles and repairs connective tissue, so you’ll also benefit from stronger, healthier and faster-growing hair and nails.
  • La belle’s ingredients work to achieve the best possible anti-ageing results for your skin. La belle’s formula work to help your body rebuild and strengthen the collagen matrix.
  • The collagen in la belle® has a low molecular weight enabling rapid absorption and transportation to where it is needed.
  • The collagen fibers formed, strengthen the collagen matrix in the dermis. Collagen improves skin elasticity by increasing the density of fibroblasts (the cells responsible for rebuilding connective tissue), and improves skin hydration and reduces fine lines and wrinkles.
  • Drinking la belle® also stimulates the body’s own natural collagen production. When the body senses collagen in the blood stream, it stimulates the production of fibroblasts reinforcing the collagen matrix.
Ingredients:
  • La belle® contains the following high-quality ingredients:
  • Verisol®: hydrolyzed collagen type 1 contained in la belle is sourced from halal bovine source. Each bottle contains 10 g hydrolyzed collagen type1.
  • Vitamin c: essential for natural collagen formation and maintaining the collagen matrix.
  • Biotin: stimulate hair and nail growth.
  • Vitamin a: promotes a healthy skin.
  • Vitamin e: anti-oxidant, nourish the skin and hair cells.
  • Zinc: anti-oxidant, promotes healthy hair, nails, and skin.
  • Natural cherry flavor.

Product benifits
  • After using la belle®, you can expect the following results:
  • After 4 to 6 days skin becomes softer and more hydrated.
  • After 10 to 14 days skin becomes more uniform, smoother, radiant and glowing.
  • Between 2 to 4 weeks skin starts to appear firmer and fuller with a noticeable reduction in fine lines and wrinkles.
  • After the 4 to 6 weekly the improvements continue.
  • Individual results will vary but, with continued daily use, your skin will continue to improve.
  • The appearance of your skin will continue to improve for as long as you use la belle®. If you stop taking la belle® for a short period e.g. Over a weekend, results will be maintained. However, if you stop completely, your skin will begin to slowly lose the benefits you have gained.
  • Individual results may vary depending on genetics and lifestyle. Factors such as smoking, sunlight, diet, including sugar and alcohol consumption, stress and lack of sleep all play an important part in your health and your skin’s appearance.
  • 30% of your body is made up of connective tissue or collagen, which is not only found in your skin, but also in your joints, hair and nails.
  • The collagen in la belle® is highly bio-available enabling the body to repair and renew connective tissue.
  • Healthier, stronger and faster-growing hair and nails.
  • An improvement in the appearance of cellulite
How to use:
  • La belle® is suitable for both male and female adults (over 18 years) who want to do the very best for their skin.
  • For best results, it is recommended that you drink one bottle each morning before breakfast.
  • La belle® does not have to be stored in the fridge, but it tastes better chilled.

Name: Osterra Calcium 1500 Mg Vitamin D 800 IU 30 Tablets
Description:
Product Description:
  • Osterra is a supplementary source of Calcium and Vitamin D3 which both are essential for healthy bones and teeth and helps in case of osteoporosis
How to use: Adults and elderly:
  • Adjunctive therapy in osteoporosis and Calcium and vitamin D deficiency
  • One tablet once or twice daily through oral route “The tablets should be swallowed with water”
Caution & Warnings:
  • During long-term treatment, serum calcium levels should be followed, and renal function should be monitored through measurements of serum creatinine.
  • Monitoring is especially important in patients on concomitant treatment with cardiac glycosides or diuretics and in patients with a high tendency to calculus formation.
  • In case of hypercalcemia or signs of impaired renal function the dose should be reduced, or the treatment discontinued.
  • OSTERRA® Tablets should be used with caution in patients with hypercalcemia or signs of impaired renal function and the effect on calcium and phosphate levels should be monitored.
  • The risk of soft tissue calcification should be taken into account.
  • In patients with severe renal insufficiency, vitamin D in the form of cholecalciferol is not metabolized normally and other forms of vitamin D should be used
  • During concomitant treatment with other high dose sources of vitamin D and/or medications or nutrients (such as milk) containing calcium, there is a risk of hypercalcemia and milk-alkali syndrome* with subsequent kidney function impairment.
  • In these patients' serum calcium levels should be followed and renal function should be monitored.
  • OSTERRA® Tablets should be used with caution in immobilized patients with osteoporosis due to the increased risk of hypercalcemia.
Ingredients:
  • OSTERRA FC TAB CALCIUM CARBONATE 1500MG/ 800IU VITAMIN D3

  • Product form: Tablets
  • Ingredients: Calcium

Name: Osterra Calcium 500 Mg Vitamin D 400 IU 30 Tablets
Description:
Product Description:
  • OSTERRA is a supplementary source of Calcium and Vitamin D3 which both are essential for healthy bones and teeth and helps in case of osteoporosis.
How to use: Adults and elderly:
  • Adjunctive therapy in osteoporosis and Calcium and vitamin D deficiency.
  • One tablet once or twice daily through oral route “The tablets should be swallowed with water”
Caution & Warnings:
  • During long-term treatment, serum calcium levels should be followed, and renal function should be monitored through measurements of serum creatinine.
  • Monitoring is especially important in patients on concomitant treatment with cardiac glycosides or diuretics and in patients with a high tendency to calculus formation.
  • In case of hypercalcemia or signs of impaired renal function the dose should be reduced, or the treatment discontinued.
  • OSTERRA® Tablets should be used with caution in patients with hypercalcemia or signs of impaired renal function and the effect on calcium and phosphate levels should be monitored.
  • The risk of soft tissue calcification should be taken into account.
  • In patients with severe renal insufficiency, vitamin D in the form of cholecalciferol is not metabolized normally and other forms of vitamin D should be used
  • During concomitant treatment with other high dose sources of vitamin D and/or medications or nutrients (such as milk) containing calcium, there is a risk of hypercalcemia and milk-alkali syndrome* with subsequent kidney function impairment.
  • In these patients' serum calcium levels should be followed and renal function should be monitored.
  • OSTERRA® Tablets should be used with caution in immobilized patients with osteoporosis due to the increased risk of hypercalcemia.
Ingredients:
  • OSTERRA FC TAB CALCIUM CARBONATE 500MG/ 400IU VITAMIN D3

How To Use:
  • Adults including elderly: 1-2 tablets (300-600mg) daily.
  • Pregnant women: (During the third trimester and also during lactation) 3-4 tablets (0.9-1.2g) daily.

  • For oral administration.
Cautions & Warnings:
  • Calcium Lactate Tablets BP should not be taken for long periods without medical advice.
  • Careful monitoring of blood levels and urinary calcium excretion is necessary, particularly when high dose calcium therapy has been used, especially in children.
  • Treatment should be suspended if calcium blood levels exceed 2.625-2.75mmol/litre (105-110mg/litre) or if urinary calcium excretion exceeds 5mg/kg.
  • Calcium salts should be administered with care to infants with hypokalaemia, as elevation of serum calcium levels may further reduce serum potassium levels.
  • Calcium salts should be administered with caution to patients with impaired renal function, cardiac disease, or sarcoidosis.

  • Vitacal Tablet is used In special populations like elderly, pregnancy, breast feeding who need vitamin D and calcium supplements.
How To Use:
  • Take this medicine as your doctor has advised you.
  • To be taken 1-2 tablets daily according to diagnosis.
  • Take it preferably after the evening meal.
Cautions & Warnings:
  • You are allergic to vitamin D, calcium or any other ingredients of this medicine, do not take in this case
  • Do not take it if you have high level of calcium or vitamin D in blood, high level of calcium in urine, kidney stones or are bed ridden

  • You are suffering from malabsorption
  • You have kidney problems or blood cancer
  • You are taking any other product containing vitamin D or calcium
