Name: Ferplex 40 mg 20 Drinkable Vials
Description:
Product Description:
  • Treatment of iron deficiency and iron deficiency anemia: latent or overt iron deficiency anemia in children and adults, secondary to chronic blood loss, pregnancy; breast-feeding.
How to use:
  • Adults: 1 to 2 vials a day (equivalent to 40-80 mg of Fe3+), in 2 administrations, preferably before food.
  • Children: Take 1.5 ml/kg/die from a vial (equivalent to 4 mg/kg/die of Fe3+), in 2 administrations, preferably before food.
  • Drink the solution out of the vial or dilute it in natural water.
  • Duration of treatment: the treatment must be carried on until total recovery of normal iron stores (usually for 2-3 months).
  • Maximum daily dose: clinical trials on the product effectiveness and tolerability were made administering the product at the above specified dosage levels (adults: 1600 mg/day - Children: 1.5 of ml/kg/day of iron proteinsuccinylate); no data about clinical efficacy and tolerability of higher dosages of the product are available.
Caution & Warnings:
  • No particular warnings are required about risks of tolerance or addiction.
  • The treatment should not exceed 6 months, unless in case of persisting bleeding, menorrhagia or pregnancy.
  • Any disease possibly underlying iron deficiency or iron deficiency anemia must be ascertained and properly treated.
  • As the product contains milk proteins, it must be used with caution in patients suffering from milk-protein intolerance, who may have allergic reactions.
  • Ferplex vials contain sorbitol, therefore patients with rare hereditary fructose intolerance must not take this medicine.
  • Ferplex vials contain parabens (methyl-p-hydroxybenzoate sodium salt, propyl-p-hydroxybenzoate sodium salt) that may cause delayed allergic reactions.
Ingredients:
Nutritional Facts
Serving Size: 15 ml

Servings Per Container: 20
Ingredient Concentration
 Iron proteinsuccinylate      800mg (equivalent to 40 mg         of Fe3+)

Name: Vitacal 60 Tablets
Description:
Product Description:
  • Vitacal Tablet is used to prevent & treat vitamin D and calcium deficiency in the elderly.
  • Calcium: It is essential for functioning of like nerve, muscles, cells and bone strength.
  • Vitamin D3: It increases the absorption of calcium and phosphorous from the intestine. It is crucial for bone strength. Due to lack of vitamin D, you may experience fractures, muscle pain, weakness.
  • This medicine works by slowing down the process of old bone growth, which provides the bone-forming cells time to reconstruct a healthy bone. This medicine helps to maintain the bone structure.
  • Vitacal is also used to treat osteoporosis patients who are at risk of vitamin D and calcium deficiency
  • Vitacal Tablet is used In special populations like elderly, pregnancy, breast feeding who need vitamin D and calcium supplements.
How To Use:
  • Take this medicine as your doctor has advised you.
  • To be taken 1-2 tablets daily according to diagnosis.
  • Take it preferably after the evening meal.
Cautions & Warnings:
  • You are allergic to vitamin D, calcium or any other ingredients of this medicine, do not take in this case
  • Do not take it if you have high level of calcium or vitamin D in blood, high level of calcium in urine, kidney stones or are bed ridden
  • You are suffering from tissue calcification (deposit of calcium in body tissues)
  • You are suffering from malabsorption
  • You have kidney problems or blood cancer
  • You are taking any other product containing vitamin D or calcium
  • You have high levels of cholesterol, then caution is needed
  • Never take thyroid medicine and this product together.

Name: Feroton 5 Intravenous Ampoules
Description:
Product Description:
  • Feroton is a form of the mineral iron used for intravenous injection.
  • Iron is important for many functions in the body, especially for the transport of oxygen in the blood.
  • Feroton  injection is used to treat iron deficiency anemia in people with kidney disease. It is usually given with another medication to promote the growth of red blood cells (such as Aranesp, Epogen, or Procrit).
  • This medication is not for treating other forms of anemia not caused by iron deficiency.
  • Feroton  injection may also be used for other purposes not listed her.
How to use:
  • Use Feroton  as directed by your doctor. Check the label on the medicine for exact dosing instructions.
  • Feroton  is usually administered as an injection at your doctor's office or clinic. Ask your doctor or pharmacist any questions you may have about Feroton .
  • If you miss a dose of Feroton , contact your doctor right away.
  • Ask your health care provider any questions you may have about how to use Feroton .
  • Feroton c can be given in 3 different ways: ? Slow injection into your vein – 1 to 3 times per week. ? As an infusion (drip) into your vein – 1 to 3 times per week. ? During dialysis – it will be put into the venous limb of the dialyzer.
Caution & Warnings:
  • Feroton  is not recommended for use in children. "

Name: JP Melatonin 5 Mg 60 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:

JP MelatoninTM 5mg contains the active substance melatonin. JP MelatoninTM 5mg can be used for the treatment of jetlag in adults.
Jetlag can be recognized by sleep disturbances, daytime tiredness, fatigue, mild mental impairment, irritability, and digestive system disturbances experienced after flying.
How JP MelatoninTM 5mg works: Melatonin is a hormone produced by the body that synchronizes body’s biological day
The biological rhythm can be disturbed by traveling across time zones. This is known as a jet crossing across time zones.
This is known as jet lag. The symptoms and their severity vary between individuals but are generally worse and last longer. The more time zones are crossed,
JP MelatoninTM 5mg can help restore day-and-night night rhythm and reduce the symptoms
You must talk to a doctor if you do not feel better or worse after 5 days.

JP MelatoninTM helps improve sleep quality related to:

Primary insomnia (insomnia which is not due to some secondary cause)
Age-related insomnia
Jetlag
Shift work
Post-traumatic brain injury
Neurodegenerative disorders

How to use:

Take JP MelatoninTM soft gel capsules exactly as directed in this leaflet.
The recommended dose is one capsule taken daily by mouth, after food, 1-2 hours before bedtime.
This dosage may be continued for up to thirteen weeks.

Cautions and Warnings:

Do not take JP MelatoninTM soft gel capsules if you are allergic (hypersensitive) to the active substance Melatonin or to any of the other ingredients in JP MelatoninTM soft gel capsules.

Taking other medicines:

Tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are taking, have recently taken, or might take any other medicines. These medicines include:
Fluvoxamine (used for the treatment of depression and obsessive-compulsive disorder), psoralens (used in the treatment of skin disorders, e.g., psoriasis), cimetidine (used in the treatment of stomach problems such as ulcers), quinolones and rifampicin (used in the treatment of bacterial infections), estrogens (used in contraceptives or hormone replacement therapy), and carbamazepine (used in the treatment of epilepsy)
Adrenergic agonists and antagonists (such as certain types of medicines used to control blood pressure by constricting blood vessels, nasal decongestants, and blood pressure-lowering medicines), opiate agonists and antagonists (such as medicinal products used in the treatment of drug addiction), prostaglandin inhibitors (such as nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory medicines), antidepressant medication, tryptophan, and alcohol
Benzodiazepines and non-benzodiazepine hypnotics (medicines used to induce sleep such as zaleplon, zolpidem and zopiclone)
Thioridazine (for the treatment of schizophrenia) and imipramine (for the treatment of depression)

Pregnancy and breast-feeding:

Do not take JP MelatoninTM 5mg if you are pregnant, think you may be pregnant, are trying to become pregnant, or are breast-feeding.
Ask your doctor or pharmacist for advice before taking this medicine.

Driving and using machines:

Melatonin may cause drowsiness.
If you are affected, you should not drive or operate machinery.
If you suffer from continued drowsiness, then you should consult your doctor.

Ingredients:

Each soft gel capsule contains 5mg of melatonin.

Vitamins & Supplements

Name: JP Omega 3 Fish Oil 567 mg 30 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:
Omega-3 fatty acids are considered essential fatty acids:
They are necessary for human health but the body cannot make them.
Omega-3 fatty acids can be found in fish, such as salmon, tuna, and halibut, other seafood including algae and krill, some plants, and nut oils.
Also known as polyunsaturated fatty acids (PUFAs), Omega-3 fatty acids play a crucial role in brain function, as well as normal growth and development and it may reduce the risk of heart disease.
Omega-3 fatty acids reduce inflammation and may help lower risk of chronic diseases such as heart disease, cancer, and arthritis.
Omega-3 fatty acids are highly concentrated in the brain and appear to be important for cognitive (brain memory and performance) and behavioral function.
Infants who do not get enough Omega-3 fatty acids from their mothers during pregnancy may be at risk for developing vision and nerve problems.
Symptoms of Omega-3 fatty acid deficiency include fatigue, poor memory, dry skin, heart problems, mood swings or depression, and poor circulation.
Omega 3 has a lot of health benefits as:
 As Dietary Supplement for Healthy Heart and cardiovascular system.
 For pregnancy health.
 For Anti-inflammatory action.
 Baby retina & eye sight development.
How to use:
The recommended daily dosage is single four capsules single dose daily or as two capsules given twice daily

In patients who exhibit hypersensitivity to any component of this supplement .

Description:

Prima K2™ is the first product in KSA providing Vitamin K2 as Menaquinone-7 (MK-7) 100 microgram, for Promoting Bone Health & Protecting Cardiovascular Health.
Prima K2™ contains vitamin K2 which is a sub-group of vitamin K family.
Vitamin K2 consists of a series of structures known as menaquinones, abbreviated with MK-x.
Prima K2™ is used as a Dietary Supplement to support the vitamin K deficiency which contributes to the maintenance of bone health.
The prevalence of osteoporosis and osteopenia is increasing in Saudi Arabia.
Poor consumption of Vitamin K2 means 30 % inactive proteins and higher risk of Osteoporosis, Fractures, arterial stiffness and calcification.
As a result of this, Vitamin K2 started to be considered as an auxiliary product for preventing osteoporosis.
Prima K2™ Helps increase bone mass & reducing bone resorption.
Prima K2™ improves hip bone strength in postmenopausal women.
Prima K2™ has a synergistic effect with Calcium & Vitamin D3 to:
Help protect from Bone Loss & Fractures.
Help promote Bone mineralization, Density & Bone Health.
Prima K2™ is safe and effective in treating age related and post-menopause bone loss and fractures.
Prima K2™ helps Protect from Arterial calcification & stiffness. And helps Promoting Arterial Flexibility & Cardiovascular Health.

How to use:

As a dietary supplement, adults take one soft gel capsule daily after meal.
If you take more Prima K2™ than you should
An overdose of Prima K2™ is unlikely to cause serious or life-threatening symptoms.
There are no reported cases of overdose of vitamin K2 and appears to have no toxicity issues.
If you forget to take Prima K2™
Do not take extra dose of Prima K2™ to make up the missed dose.

Caution & Warnings:

Do not take Prima K2™:

If you are allergic (hypersensitive) to the active substance vitamin K2 or to any of the other ingredients of Prima K2™.
Prima K2™ should not be used for people less than 19 Years old.

Taking other medicines:

If you take Coumadin, Heparin, or another anti-coagulant you should consult your physician before taking vitamin K2 supplements.

Pregnancy and breast-feeding:

Tell your doctor if you are pregnant before using this product.
Consult your doctor before breast-feeding.

Driving and using machines:

Be careful while driving or operating machinery until you know how Prima K2™ affects you.
However, Prima K2™ is not expected to affect your ability to drive a car or operate machinery.
Prima K2™ is Generally Safe when used in normal recommended doses with no recorded side effects.

Ingredients:

Each soft gel capsule contains the active substance vitamin K2 100 mcg (as Menaquinone -7).
The other ingredients are Sunflower oil, Gelatin, Glycerol, Caramel Liquid, Titanium dioxide and Purified water.

Name: Marnys Salamon Oil Omega 3 & Vitamin E 60 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:
Marnys® salmon oil is a natural source of omega-3 fatty acids, it is also a source of natural vitamin e, which helps protect cells from oxidative stress resulting from stress.
Salmon oil is rich in Omega-3 fatty acids: eicosapentaenoic (EPA) and docosahexaenoic (DHA).
Salmon is the species that provides the largest amount of EPA and DHA fatty acids: for 3 ounces served salmon provides 1.0 to 1.8 g of DHA + EPA.
“Free From” Information:
Colorant Free
Preservative Free
Artificial Flavors Free
Product Features :
The presence of natural vitamin E is of vital importance in the membranes of the retina cells (where the highest amount of the body DHA is concentrated), as it protects against oxidation and maintains the concentration of DHA.
MARNYS® SalmonOil is free from artificial preservatives, coloring, flavoring, and yeast.
MARNYS® analyses marine oils in accordance with strict international standards of pureness and freshness, guaranteeing that salmon oil properties are non-toxic.
Keep Healthy Levels of Omega-3 Because :
Keep Heart-Healthy :
Research shows that the addition of omega-3 fatty acids as in salmon oil to your diet can significantly lower lipid concentrations in patients with high cholesterol and triglyceride levels.
Anti-Inflammatory Action :
Research has extensively proven the anti-inflammatory effects of omega-3s.
Whether for reducing inflammation in critically ill patients or for inflammatory diseases like rheumatoid arthritis, salmon oil capsules can provide relief.
Helpsfor Depression:
 Research suggests that the EPA and DHA components in salmon oil could have an antidepressant effect.
Scientific reviews support the use of salmon oil in cases of depression alongside regular antidepressant therapies.
Boost Brain Power :
Studies indicate that omega-3 may have the potential to support learning, intelligence, and memory while preventing cognitive decline.
This means it could be helpful in the prevention of neurodegenerative diseases.
Stay in Shape :
While not specifically singled out until now, fish oil could be responsible for boosting weight loss when combined with a healthy diet and active lifestyle.
This effect of salmon oil is still being studied, but it does seem promising.
For Skincare and Eyesight :
There is evidence to suggest that salmon oil may be helpful in treating skin conditions like photoaging, skin cancer, allergy, inflammation, wound healing, and hyperpigmentation.
It can also be good for preventing glaucoma and dry eyes and supporting general eye health.
Good for the Nerves :
In diseases such as Multiple Sclerosis where the fatty protective myelin sheath of the nerves is lost, the components in salmon oil can help in the remyelination of the nerves.
How to use:
Take 1 to 2 capsules per day, preferably after main meals.

Product Description:

Melatonin Gummies by Holista will Improve your sleep quality and support a healthy sleep cycle.
These gummies of melatonin will help you get restful sleep to stay energized and focused after you wake up.
Each gummy contains 1 mg of sleep-promoting melatonin.
Melatonin is a hormone responsible for maintaining the body's circadian rhythm and internal clock that affects sleep, other hormones, and various bodily functions. Taking melatonin may help reduce snoozing time, start the sleep cycle and improve sleep quality in terms of duration and depth.
Melatonin gummies are a great choice for those who work long shifts, struggle with jet lag after long flights, or those who have trouble sleeping in general.

How to use:

chew 2 gummy daily at or before bedtime

To achieve best results you should :

Go to sleep in a quiet, comfortable place away from sources of disturbance.
Dim the lighting as much as possible in the sleeping area.
Refrain from electronics two hours before bedtime.
Take a warm bath before going to bed.
Get a light head massage before bed to reduce stress

Caution & Warnings:

don't use this products if you are pregnant or breastfeeding. don't drive or use heavy machines after consuming

Do not take alcohol, or any products that cause drowsiness.
Do not leave gummies within the reach of children.
Do not use Melatonin Gummies when pregnant or breastfeeding.
If you suffer from sleep disturbances for more than a month, consult a doctor.
You should consult your doctor before using melatonin if you suffer from cardiovascular disease or any of the chronic diseases.

How to Achieve the Best Results

Take it with food.
Take it at bedtime.
For all uses consult a physician for use beyond 4 weeks.

Caution & Warnings :

Consult a physician prior to use if you have cardiovascular, immune, liver, or any disease.
Consult a physician prior to use if you are taking steroids or blood thinners, medications for seizure or blood pressure.

Avoid taking alcohol or products that increase drowsiness.

Name: JP Melatonin 5 mg 100 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:

JP Melatonin™ 5mg contains the active ingredient melatonin with 5mg per each soft-gel capsule.
JP Melatonin™ 5mg can be used for treatment of Jet-lag in adults.
Jet-lag can be recognized by sleep disturbances, daytime tiredness, fatigue, disturbances, daytime tiredness, fatigue, mild mental impairment, irritability and digestive system disturbances experienced after flying.
How JP Melatonin™ 5mg works: Melatonin is a hormone produced by the body that synchronizesbody’s biological day.
The biological rhythm can be disturbed by travelling across time zones. This is known as a jetting across time zones.
This is known as a jet lag. The symptoms and their severity vary between individuals but are generally worse last longer, the more time zones are crossed.
JP Melatonin™ 5mg can help restore day-and-night night rhythm and reduce the symptoms of disturbed sleep patterns.
You must talk to a doctor if you do not feel better or worsen after 5 days.
JP Melatonin™ Helps improve sleep quality related to:
Primary insomnia (insomnia which is not due to some secondary cause)
Age-related insomnia
Jet lag
Shift work
Post-traumatic brain injury
Neuro-degenerative disorders

How to use:

Take JP Melatonin™ soft-gel capsules exactly as directed in the product leaflet.

The recommended dose is one capsule taken daily by mouth, after food, 1-2 hours before bedtime.

This dosage may be continued for up to thirteen weeks.

 

Caution & Warnings:

Do not take JP Melatonin™ soft-gel capsules, If:

You are allergic (hypersensitive) to the active substance Melatonin or to any of the other ingredients of JP Melatonin™ soft-gel capsules.
Taking other medicines:

Tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are taking, have recently taken or might take any other medicines. These medicines include:

- Fluvoxamine (used for the treatment of depression and obsessive-compulsive disorder), Psoralens (used in the treatment of skin disorders e.g. psoriasis), Cimetidine (used in the treatment of stomach problems such as ulcers), Quinolones and Rifampicin (used in the treatment of bacterial infections), Estrogens (used in contraceptives or hormone replacement therapy) and Carbamazepine (used in the treatment of epilepsy).

- Adrenergic agonists/antagonists (such as certain types of medicines used to control blood pressure by constricting blood vessels, nasal decongestants, blood pressure lowering medicines), opiate agonists/antagonists (such as medicinal products used in the treatment of drug addiction), Prostaglandin inhibitors (such as Non-steroidal Anti-inflammatory medicines), antidepressant medication, tryptophan and alcohol.

- Benzodiazepines and Non-benzodiazepine hypnotics (medicines used to induce sleep such as Zaleplon, Zolpidem and Zopiclone)

- Thioridazine (for the treatment of schizophrenia) and Imipramine (for the treatment of depression).

Pregnancy and breast-feeding:

Do not take JP Melatonin™ 5mg if you are pregnant, think you may be pregnant, trying to become pregnant or breast-feeding. Ask your doctor or pharmacist for advice before taking this medicine.

Driving and using machines:

Melatonin may cause drowsiness. If you are affected, you should not drive or operate machinery. If you suffer from continued drowsiness, then you should consult your doctor

 

Ingredients:

Each soft-gel capsule contains 5mg Melatonin.

Other Ingredients are:

Polyethylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Gelatin, Glycerol, Sorbitol Solution 70% , Titanium Dioxide and Purified Water.

Name: Holland And Barrett Vitamin B12 500 Mcg 100 Tablets
Description:
Product Description:

Vitamin B12 can be found naturally in animal products like meat and dairy, as the animals obtain it from the soil or are often supplemented with it themselves.
You can also find it in fortified vegan food like plant milk, breakfast cereals, fake meats, and yeast extracts.
However, quite a lot of people find themselves deficient in B12 - you may be susceptible to low vitamin B12 status if you follow a vegan or plant-based diet - and long-term deficiency symptoms can be very severe and sometimes dangerous.
Vitamin B12 supports normal energy-yielding metabolism: when vitamin B12 starts to drop, your energy levels tend to follow suit.
Providing your body with enough vitamin B12 will help your body have the energy to tackle any day.
Vitamin B12 supports red blood cell synthesis: red blood cells help to deliver oxygen to all of our body tissues. The body needs vitamin B12 to make red blood cells.
Vitamin B12 supports healthy nervous system function: good levels of vitamin B12 help to keep your nervous system nice and healthy.
Vitamin B12 supports healthy psychological function
500µg dose of vitamin B12 in tablet form
Contributes to energy-yielding metabolism & reduction of tiredness & fatigue

How to use:

Take 1 Tablet per day, preferably with a meal.
Do not exceed stated dose

Caution & Warnings:

Food supplements must not be used as a substitute for a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.
If you are pregnant, breastfeeding, taking any medications, or under medical supervision, please consult a doctor or healthcare professional before use.
Discontinue use and consult a doctor if adverse reactions occur. Keep out of reach of children.
Do not use it if the seal under the cap is broken or missing.

Name: Jp Nervan 500 Mcg 30 Tab
Description:
Product Description:

Nervan™ contains the active substance Methylcobalamin, Methylcobalamin is the methyl form of cobalamin obtained from hydroxycobalamin, either by chemical manipulation in the laboratory or in the body as a natural process.
Cyano- and hydroxocobalamin are considered the storage or transport forms of cobalamin, while methylcobalamin and deoxyadenosylcobalamin are the active forms involved in enzymatic reactions.
Methylcobalamin is involved specifically in the normal metabolism of folate and the consequent maintenance of normal homocysteine serum levels.
Nervan™ is used as Dietary supplement

How to use:

Take two tablets daily.

Caution & Warnings:

Do not take Nervan™ If you are allergic (hypersensitive) to Methylcobalamin or any of the other ingredients of Nervan™ .
Taking other medicines Consult your doctors If you are taking Medicines considered to reduce the absorption of vitamin B12 include alcohol, aminosalicylic acid, chloramphenicol, colchicine, metformin, neomycin, and proton pump inhibitors. Pregnancy and Lactation Methylcobalamin is compatible with pregnancy and lactation at usual dosage.
Important information about some of the ingredients of Nervan™ This medicine also contains lactose (which is a sugar).
If you have been told by your doctor that you have an intolerance to some sugars, contact your doctor before taking this medicinal product.

Ingredients:

Each Film Coated tablet contains 500 mcg of Methylcobalamin

Other ingredients are:

Lactose Monohydrate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Hydroxypropyl methyl cellulose, Pregelatinised starch, Talc, Colloidal silicon dioxide, Magnesium stearate, Polyvinyl alcohol, Titanium dioxide, Talc, Macrogol / PEG and Purified water.

Name: Essential Vitamin D3 1000 IU 60 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:
Essential Vitamin D3 Is Dietary Supplement Capsules That Contain Vitamin D3.
Vitamin D and its other forms are extremely important for our bones, teeth, and Immunity as the Vitamin is responsible for regulating the metabolism of calcium in our bodies.
Cholecalciferol is vitamin D3. Vitamin D helps your body absorb calcium.
Cholecalciferol is used as a dietary supplement in people who do not get enough vitamin D in their diets to maintain adequate health. Cholecalciferol may also be used for many purposes in terms of medication.
Product Features:
Prevents Osteoporosis :
Important for keeping bones strong and preventing the bone disease osteoporosis.
Vitamin D helps your intestines absorb calcium from the food.
For Stronger Immunity :
Enhances body's immune functions through vitamin D receptors located on the most immune system cells
This helps to fight infections and viruses.
Strengthens Bones and Teeth :
Both by helping your body absorb calcium and by supporting muscles needed to avoid weakness.
During Pregnancy & lactation :
During pregnancy and lactation, mothers require significant amounts of calcium to pass on to the developing fetus and suckling neonate, respectively.
Frequent Fatigue :
Excessive fatigue and tiredness may be a sign of vitamin D deficiency.
This has a severe negative effect on the quality of life.
 Mood Swings Probability:
Common symptoms of nutritional deficiencies (such as vitamin D deficiency) include irritability, mood swings, fatigue & depression.
Keep normal vitamines and minerals levels to avoid this.
 Hairloss Problems  :
Hair loss can occur when your body lacks the recommended amount of vitamin D.
Vitamin D deficiency has been linked to alopecia, also known as spot baldness, and a number of other health conditions
 Obesity  and Vit D Shortage:
There is an increased risk of vitamin D deficiency in people who are considered overweight or obese based on their body mass index (BMI) measurement.
How to use:
One capsule daily preferably with meals
Or, as prescribed by the doctor.
Caution & Warnings:
Keep out of reach of children
If any adverse reaction occurs stop taking the product and consult your doctor.
Pregnant or lactating women, diabetics, hypoglycemics, and people with known medical conditions and/or taking drugs should consult a physician prior to taking dietary supplements
Vitamin-D Deficiency Causes :
When usual intake is lower than recommended levels over time.
When exposure to sunlight is limited
When the kidneys cannot convert 25(OH)D to its active form.
When absorption of vitamin D from the digestive tract is inadequate

Evit is a naturally powerful antioxidant with guaranteed efficacy & results against aging signs, infertility problems, skin, hair & nail problems.

The intake of natural vitamin E products helps against collagen cross-linking and lipid peroxidation, which are both linked to the aging of the skin.

 Male & Female Infertility:
Significantly improves sperm motility & protects against sperm morphology defects by free radicle, along with improving sexual hormones production.
For Eye Health :
Evidence from other studies suggests that the alpha-tocopherol form of vitamin E, along with lutein and zeaxanthin, may decrease the risk of cataracts.

The recommended daily dosage is one capsule daily with water.

In cases of Dysmenorrheal pain: one capsule daily, 2 days before menstruation, then one capsule during the first 3 days of the period.

Caution & Warnings:
Keep out of reach of children
If any adverse reaction occurs stop taking the product and consult your doctor.
Persons with high blood pressure should ﬁrst seek the advice of a doctor.

Name: Folic Acid 5 mg 20 Tablets
Description:
Product Description:
To Treat Folate deficiency anaemia or increased use of folate in the body as in pregnancy
Folic acid, also known as folate and folacin from dietary sources, helps support normal functioning of the nervous system and plays a critical role in the proper development of a baby’s nervous system.
Taking a prenatal vitamin with the recommended 400 micrograms (mcg) of folic acid before and during pregnancy can help prevent birth defects of your baby's brain and spinal cord.
Folic acid has also been suggested to reduce your risk of: Pregnancy complications, Heart disease, Stroke.
How to use:
5 mg a day for 4 months, which may be increased up to a maximum of 15 mg a day.
Caution & Warnings:
Do not take Folic Acid tablets and tell your doctor if you have:
An allergy (hypersensitivity) to folic acid or any of the other ingredients in the tablets(see section 6)
An untreated vitamin B12 deficiency such as in certain anaemias and lifelong vegetarians
Pernicious anaemia (a form of anaemia caused by lack of vitamin B12 ) or another condition caused by vitamin B12 deficiency
A malignant (cancerous) disease.

Name: Folicum 1 mg 20 Tab
Description:
Vitamin B9, also called Folate or Folic acid, is effective in the treatment of folate deficient megaloblastic anemia, as may be seen in anaemia's of nutritional origin or increased utilization, as in pregnancy or lactation.Once daily with a meal.Contraindications: Hypersensitivity to Folic Acid.
Precautions: Folic Acid alone is an improper therapy in the treatment of pernicious Anaemia and other megaloblastic Anaemias where Vitamin B12 is deficient.
Caution should be exercised when administering Folic Acid to patients who may have folate dependent tumours.
Plasma concentration of antiepileptic drugs like phenobarbital, phenytoin and primidone are possibly reduced in presence of Folic Acid.
Keep the package tightly closed in a cool dry place below 25°C protected from light.
Do not use the drug after the expiry date printed on the package.Each tablet contains Folic Acid 1mg.
Other ingredient: Maize starch (dried) , Microcrystalline cellulose , Colloidal silicon dioxide , Spray-dried Lactose , Talc (fine powder) , Stearic acid.

Name: Vidal Vitamin D3 1000 IU 90 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:
Vidal Vitamin D3 is a vitamin that helps you obtain your body's requirements of vitamin D.
Vitamin D and its other forms are extremely important for our bones, teeth, and Immunity as the Vitamin is responsible for regulating the metabolism of calcium in our bodies.
Vitamin D helps your body absorb calcium.
Used as a dietary supplement in people who do not get enough vitamin D in their diets to maintain adequate health.
Enhances body's immune functions to fight infections and viruses
Product Features:
Prevents Osteoporosis :
Important for keeping bones strong and preventing the bone disease osteoporosis.
Vitamin D helps your intestines absorb calcium from the food.
For Stronger Immunity :
Enhances body's immune functions through vitamin D receptors located on the most immune system cells
This helps to fight infections and viruses.
Strengthens Bones and Teeth :
Both by helping your body absorb calcium and by supporting muscles needed to avoid weakness.
During Pregnancy & lactation :
During pregnancy and lactation, mothers require significant amounts of calcium to pass on to the developing fetus and suckling neonate, respectively.
Frequent Fatigue :
Excessive fatigue and tiredness may be a sign of vitamin D deficiency.
This has a severe negative effect on the quality of life.
 Mood Swings Probability:
Common symptoms of nutritional deficiencies (such as vitamin D deficiency) include irritability, mood swings, fatigue & depression.
Keep normal vitamines and minerals levels to avoid this.
 Hairloss Problems  :
Hair loss can occur when your body lacks the recommended amount of vitamin D.
Vitamin D deficiency has been linked to alopecia, also known as spot baldness, and a number of other health conditions
 Obesity  and Vit D Shortage:
There is an increased risk of vitamin D deficiency in people who are considered overweight or obese based on their body mass index (BMI) measurement.
How to use:
One capsule daily preferably with fatty meals
the maintenance dose should be adjusted by your doctor or pharmacist
Or, as prescribed by the doctor.
Caution & Warnings:
Keep out of reach of children
If any adverse reaction occurs stop taking the product and consult your doctor.
Pregnant or lactating women, diabetics, hypoglycemics, and people with known medical conditions and/or taking drugs should consult a physician prior to taking dietary supplements
Vitamin-D Deficiency Causes :
When usual intake is lower than recommended levels over time.
When exposure to sunlight is limited
When the kidneys cannot convert 25(OH)D to its active form.
When absorption of vitamin D from the digestive tract is inadequate

Name: Ferosac 100 mg 5 Intravenous Ampoules
Description:
Product Description:
Ferosac is a form of the mineral iron.
Iron is important for many functions in the body, especially for the transport of oxygen in the blood.
Ferosac injection is used to treat iron deficiency anemia in people with kidney disease. It is usually given with another medication to promote the growth of red blood cells (such as Aranesp, Epogen, or Procrit).
This medication is not for treating other forms of anemia not caused by iron deficiency.
Ferosac injection may also be used for other purposes not listed her.
How to use:
Use Ferosac as directed by your doctor. Check the label on the medicine for exact dosing instructions.
Ferosac is usually administered as an injection at your doctor's office or clinic. Ask your doctor or pharmacist any questions you may have about Ferosac.
If you miss a dose of Ferosac, contact your doctor right away.
Ask your health care provider any questions you may have about how to use Ferosac.
Ferosac can be given in 3 different ways: ? Slow injection into your vein – 1 to 3 times per week. ? As an infusion (drip) into your vein – 1 to 3 times per week. ? During dialysis – it will be put into the venous limb of the dialyzer.
Caution & Warnings:
Ferosac is not recommended for use in children. "

Name: Fortimferrum P 30 Sachets
Description:
Product Description:

Fortiferrum P is an iron supplement designed to address iron deficiency, particularly for pregnant and lactating women. Here's a breakdown of the information:
Fortiferrum P is an innovative and effective supplement containing liposomal iron (ferric pyrophosphate) for high bioavailability and absorption.

It also includes folic acid, vitamins, and fiber suitable for:

Iron deficiency
Folic acid deficiency
Situations like pregnancy and lactation (breastfeeding)

How to Use:

Adults and adolescents:

Take 1 sachet daily.

Pregnant women:

Follow WHO recommendations of 30-60mg of iron daily and folic acid.
Consult your doctor for specific dosage during pregnancy.

Directions:

You can take the contents of the sachet directly by mouth.
Alternatively, dissolve the powder in water or juice for consumption.

Benefits and Advantages:

Liposomal Iron: This form of iron is claimed to be more bioavailable and easier for your body to absorb compared to traditional iron supplements. This can help reduce the risk of gastrointestinal side effects commonly associated with iron.
Folic Acid: This B vitamin is crucial for fetal development and helps prevent neural tube defects in newborns.
Vitamins and Fiber: The presence of additional vitamins and fiber may support overall health and digestion.

Warnings and Precautions:

Consult a doctor before using Fortiferrum P if you have any underlying health conditions or are taking other medications.
Excessive consumption of iron can be harmful.

Name: Ferinject Iron 1 Vial For Injection
Description:
Product Description:
Ferinject is used to treat iron deficiency when oral iron is not effective enough, you cannot tolerate oral iron, or your doctor decides you need iron very quickly to build up your iron stores.
Ferinject is an antianaemic preparation, a medicine that is used to treat anaemia. It contains iron in the form of an iron carbohydrate.
Iron is an essential element required for the oxygen-carrying capacity of haemoglobin in red blood cells and of myoglobin in muscle tissue. Moreover, iron is involved in many other functions necessary for maintenance of life in the human body.
How to use:
Your doctor will decide how much Ferinject to give you, how often you need it and for how long.
Your doctor will perform a blood test to determine the dose you need. Your doctor or nurse will administer Ferinject undiluted by injection, during dialysis, or diluted by infusion:
You may receive up to 20 mL of Ferinject, corresponding to 1,000 mg of iron, once aweek directly into the vein.
If you are on dialysis, you may receive Ferinject during a haemodialysis session via the dialyser.
By infusion, you may receive up to 20 mL of Ferinject, corresponding to 1,000 mg of iron, once aweek directly into the vein.
Because Ferinject is diluted with sodium chloride solution for the infusion, it may have a volume of up to 250 mL and appear as a brown solution.
Ferinject will be administered in a structure where immunoallergic events can receive appropriate and prompt treatment. You will be observed for at least 30 minutes by your doctor or nurse after each administration.
Caution & Warnings:
Keep Ferinject out of the sight and reach of children.
Do not use Ferinject after the expiry date which is stated on the label. The expiry date refers to the last
day of that month.
Store in the original package in order to protect from light. Do not store above 30° C. Do not freeze.
Once the Ferinject vials have been opened, they should be used immediately. After dilution with sodium chloride solution, the diluted solution should be used immediately

Description:
ًWatch on Youtube جي بي اوميجا ٣ .. لصحتك

Product Description:

  • Omega-3 fatty acids are considered essential fatty acids:
  • They are necessary for human health but the body cannot make them.
  • Omega-3 fatty acids can be found in fish, such as salmon, tuna, and halibut, other seafood including algae and krill, some plants, and nut oils.
  • Also known as polyunsaturated fatty acids (PUFAs), Omega-3 fatty acids play a crucial role in brain function, as well as normal growth and development and it may reduce the risk of heart disease.
  • Omega-3 fatty acids reduce inflammation and may help lower risk of chronic diseases such as heart disease, cancer, and arthritis.
  • Omega-3 fatty acids are highly concentrated in the brain and appear to be important for cognitive (brain memory and performance) and behavioral function.
  • Infants who do not get enough Omega-3 fatty acids from their mothers during pregnancy may be at risk for developing vision and nerve problems.
  • Symptoms of Omega-3 fatty acid deficiency include fatigue, poor memory, dry skin, heart problems, mood swings or depression, and poor circulation.

Omega 3 has a lot of health benefits as: 

  •  As Dietary Supplement for Healthy Heart and cardiovascular system.
  •  For pregnancy health.
  •  For Anti-inflammatory action.
  •  Baby retina & eye sight development.

Name: D-Seul Vitamin D 2000 I.U 10 ml Oral Solution Drops
Description:
D-Seul 50000 I.U 20 Soft Gelatin Capsules

Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol)

1. What D-Seul® is and what it is used for

Pharmacotherapeutic group:

D-Seul® contains cholecalciferol (vitamin D3).

Vitamin D3 can be found in some foods and is also produced by the body when skin is exposed to sunlight.

Vitamin D3 helps the kidneys and intestine absorb calcium and it helps build bones.

Therapeutic indications:

D-Seul® is used:

To prevent vitamin D deficiency when there is a significant risk of deficiency or an increased demand for vitamin D.
With other medicine to treat certain bone conditions, such as thinning of the bone (osteoporosis).
To treat vitamin D deficiency that has been confirmed by laboratory tests.

2. How to take D-Seul®:

Always take this medicine exactly as your doctor or pharmacist has told you.
Check with your doctor or pharmacist if you are not sure.
The capsules should be swallowed whole with water.
You should take D-Seul® preferably together with a large meal to help your body absorb the vitamin D.
Prevention (Prophylaxis) vitamin D deficiency in children (018-):
4001000- IU/DAY (up to 4000IU/DAY) (duration varies according to cases)
25000 IU/ every 6 to 8 weeks

Prevention (Prophylaxis) vitamin D deficiency in adults:

Up to 2000IU/day
Up to 25000IU/month
Treatment of vitamin D deficiency in children:
Up to 2000IU/day for 6 weeks followed by maintenance dose.
Treatment of vitamin D deficiency in adults:
Up to 50000IU/week for up to 8 weeks followed by maintenance dose.
Follow-up measurements should be made approximately three to four months after initiating maintenance therapy to confirm that the target level has been achieved.

Use in children:

D-Seul® S.G Capsules are not recommended for children under 12 years for all strengths except D-Seul® 50,000IU not recommended for use in under 18 years

a. If you take more D-Seul® than you should

If you or your child take more medicine than prescribed, stop using this medicine and contact your doctor. If it is not possible to talk to a doctor, go to the nearest hospital emergency department and take the medicine package with you.

The most common symptoms of overdose are: nausea, vomiting, excessive thirst, the production of large amounts of urine over 24 hours, constipation and dehydration., high levels of calcium in the blood (hypercalcaemia and hypercalciuria) shown by lab test.

b. If you forget to take D-Seul®

Take the forgotten dose as soon as possible. Then take the next dose at the correct time. However, if it is almost time to take the next dose, do not take the dose you have missed; just take the next dose as normal. Do not take a double dose to make up for a forgotten dose. After that, take the next capsule in accordance with the instructions given to you by your doctor. If you have any further questions on the use of this medicine, ask your doctor or pharmacist.

c. If you stop taking D-Seul®

If you have any further questions on the use of this medicine, ask your doctor or pharmacist.

3. What you need to know before you take D-Seul®:

a. Do not take D-Seul® if

If you are allergic to vitamin D3 or any of the other ingredients of this medicine.
If you have high levels of calcium in your blood (hypercalcaemia) or urine (hypercalciuria)
If you have kidney stones (renal calculi)
If you have serious renal impairment
If you have high levels of vitamin D3 in your blood (hypervitaminosis D)
If you have pseudohypoparathyroidism (disturbed parathyroid hormone metabolism)
If you are pregnant for highest strength D-Seul® 50000IU S.G. Capsules.
If you are under 18 years of age for highest strength D-Seul® 50000IU S.G. Capsules
If any of the above applies to you, talk to your doctor or pharmacist before taking D-Seul®.

b. Take special care with D-Seul®

Talk to your doctor or pharmacist before taking D-Seul®:
Are undergoing treatment with certain medicines used to treat heart disorders (e.g., cardiac glycosides, such as digoxin);
Have sarcoidosis (an immune system disorder which may cause increased levels of vitamin D3 in the body).
Are taking medicines containing vitamin D3, or eating foods or milk enriched with vitamin D3.
Are likely to be exposed to a lot of sunshine whilst using D-Seul®.
Take additional supplements containing calcium. Your doctor will monitor your blood levels of calcium to make sure they are not too high whilst you are using D-Seul®.
Have kidney damage or disease. Your doctor may want to measure the levels of calcium in your blood or urine.
Children
This medicine is not suitable for use in children under 12 years for all strengths except D-Seul® 50,000IU not suitable for use in under 18 years

c. Taking other medicines, herbal or dietary supplements

Tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are taking, have recently taken or might take any other medicines. This is especially important if you are taking:
Medicines that act on the heart or kidneys, such as cardiac glycosides (e.g., digoxin) or diuretics (e.g., bendroflumethazide). When used at the same time as vitamin D3 these medicines may cause a large increase in the level of calcium in the blood and urine.
Medicines containing vitamin D3 or eating food rich in vitamin D3, such as, some types of vitamin D3-enriched milk.
Actinomycin (a medicine used to treat some forms of cancer) and imidazole antifungals (e.g., clotrimazole and ketoconazole, medicines used to treat fungal disease). These medicines may interfere with the way your body process vitamin D3.
The following medicines because they can interfere with the effect or the absorption of vitamin D3:
Antiepileptic medicines (anticonvulsants), barbiturates,
Glucocorticoids (steroid hormones such as hydrocortisone or prednisolone). These can decrease the effect of vitamin D3.
Medicines that lower the level of cholesterol in the blood (such as cholestyramine, or colestipol)
Certain medicines for weight loss that reduce the amount of fat your body absorbs (e.g. orlistat)
Certain laxatives (such as liquid paraffin).
Concomitant use of phenytoin or barbiturates may reduce the effect of vitamin D since the metabolism increases.
Glucocorticoid steroids may increase vitamin D metabolism and elimination. During concomitant use, it may be necessary to increase the dose of vitamin D.
Simultaneous treatment with ion exchange resins such as cholestyramine or laxatives such as paraffin oil may reduce the gastrointestinal absorption of vitamin D.

d. Taking D-Seul® with food and drink

D-Seul® Soft Gelatin Capsules should be swallowed whole with water, preferably together with a large meal to help your body absorb the vitamin D.

e. Pregnancy and breast-feeding

If you are pregnant or breast-feeding, think you may be pregnant or are planning to have a baby, ask your doctor or pharmacist for advice before taking this medicine. These formulations can be used during pregnancy but only if you have been diagnosed with vitamin D deficiency and following the advice of your doctor.

The high strength formulation D-Seul® 50,000 is not recommended for use in pregnant and breastfeeding women.

f. Driving and using machines

D-Seul® should not affect your ability to drive or operate machinery. There is limited information on the possible effects of this medicine on your ability to drive. However, it is not expected that it would affect your ability to drive or operate machinery.

4. Possible side effects:

Like all medicines, this medicine can cause side effects, although not everybody gets them. Stop taking D-Seul® S.G Capsules and seek immediate medical help if you experience symptoms of serious allergic reactions, such as:
Swollen face, lips, tongue or throat
Difficult to swallow
Hives and difficulty breathing.
Side effects with D-Seul® S.G Capsules may include:
Uncommon (may affect up to 1 in 100 people):
Too much calcium in your blood (hypercalcaemia). Symptoms include: nausea, vomiting, lack of appetite, constipation, stomach ache, bone pain, extreme thirst, a need to pass more water than usual, muscle weakness, drowsiness and confusion, too much calcium in your urine (hypercalciuria).
Rare (may affect up to 1 in 1,000 people):
Skin rash (pruritus, urticaria)
Itching.
Hives

5. How to store D-Seul®

Keep out of the reach and sight of children.
Do not store above 30oC, protect from light.
Do not use D-Seul® after the expiry date (Exp. Date) which is stated on the outer pack. The expiry date refers to the last day of that month.
Do not use D-Seul® if you notice description of the visible signs of deterioration.
Medicines should not be disposed of via wastewater or household waste. Ask your pharmacist how to dispose of medicines no longer required. These measures will help to protect the environment.

6. Further information

a. What D-Seul® Capsules contains:

The active substance is: Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol).
D-Seul® 2,000IU S.G. Capsules: Each soft gelatin capsule contains 2000 IU equivalent to 50 μg Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol).
D-Seul® 5,000IU S.G. Capsules: Each soft gelatin capsule contains 5000 IU equivalent to 0.125 mg Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol).
D-Seul® 10,000IU S.G. Capsules: Each soft gelatin capsule contains 10000 IU equivalent to 0.250 mg Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol).
D-Seul® 50,000IU S.G. Capsules: Each soft gelatin capsule contains 50000 IU equivalent to 1.25 mg Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol).
The other ingredients are:
D-Seul® 2,000IU S.G. Capsules: Arachis oil, Butylhydroxyanisole, Gelatin, FD & Blue No 1, Glycerin & purified water.
D-Seul® 5,000IU S.G. Capsules: Arachis oil, Butylhydroxyanisole, Gelatin, Ariavit quinoline yellow, Glycerin & purified water.
D-Seul® 10,000IU S.G. Capsules: Arachis oil, Butylhydroxyanisole, Gelatin, Red No 33, Glycerin & purified water.
D-Seul® 50,000IU S.G. Capsules: Arachis oil, Butylhydroxyanisole, Gelatin, Blue No 1, Glycerin & purified water.

b. What D-Seul® looks like and contents of the pack

Soft Gelatin Capsules

Physical Description:

D-Seul® 2,000 IU S.G Capsules: Greenish blue oval soft gelatin capsules. Contains pale yellowish oily liquid.
D-Seul® 5,000 IU S.G Capsules: Yellow oval soft gelatin capsules contains pale yellowish oily liquid.
D-Seul® 10,000 IU S.G Capsules: Pinkish red oval soft gelatin capsules contains pale yellowish oily liquid.
D-Seul® 50,000 IU S.G Capsules: Blue oval soft gelatin capsules contains pale yellowish oily liquid.
D-Seul® S.G. Capsules packed in HDPE jars with PP screw cap with induction sealing foil. With desiccant bag (silica gel granules) labeled with adhesive label in a carton box with a multi folded leaflet.

Pack size: D-Seul® is available in the pack size of 30 S.G. Capsules for all strengths except D-Seul® 50,000IU S.G. Capsules the pack sizes 8, 12 & 20 S.G. capsules are available.

When oral iron preparations are ineffective or cannot be used.
Where there is a clinical need to deliver iron rapidly.

How to use:

Monitor carefully patients for signs and symptoms of hypersensitivity reactions during and following each administration of Monofer.
Monofer should only be administered when staff trained to evaluate and manage anaphylactic reactions is immediately available, in an environment where full resuscitation facilities can be assured.
The patient should be observed for adverse effects for at least 30 minutes following each Monofer injection (see section 4.4).
Each IV iron administration is associated with a risk of a hypersensitivity reaction. Thus, to minimize risk the number of single IV iron administrations should be kept to a minimum.

Caution & Warnings:

Parenterally administered iron preparations can cause hypersensitivity reactions including serious and potentially fatal anaphylactic/anaphylactoid reactions.
Hypersensitivity reactions have also been reported after previously uneventful doses of parenteral iron complexes.
The risk is enhanced for patients with known allergies including drug allergies, including patients with a history of severe asthma, eczema, or other atopic allergy.
There is also an increased risk of hypersensitivity reactions to parenteral iron complexes in patients with immune or inflammatory conditions (e.g. systemic lupus erythematosus, rheumatoid arthritis).
Monofer should only be administered when staff trained to evaluate and manage anaphylactic reactions is immediately available, in an environment where full resuscitation facilities can be assured.
Each patient should be observed for adverse effects for at least 30 minutes following each Monofer injection. If hypersensitivity reactions or signs of intolerance occur during administration, the treatment must be stopped immediately. Facilities for cardiorespiratory resuscitation and equipment for handling acute
anaphylactic/anaphylactoid reactions should be available, including an injectable 1:1000 adrenaline solution. Additional treatment with antihistamines and/or corticosteroids should be given as appropriate.

Ingredients:

Ferric Derisomaltose 100 MG/ML

Vitamins & Supplements

Name: Carlson Baby'S Super Vitamin D3 400 Iu (10 Mcg) - 90 Drops
Description:
Product Overview:
Carlson Baby’s Super Vitamin D3 400 IU (10 mcg) is a high-quality supplement designed to support infants’ bone health, healthy teeth, immune support, cardiovascular health, muscle health, and overall growth and development.
Product Description:

Breast milk and formula are excellent nutrient sources for babies but often don’t provide enough vitamin D. And while many of us rely on the sun to help our bodies produce vitamin D, sun exposure isn’t recommended for babies younger than 6 months. Vitamin D promotes healthy growth and development; helps our bodies absorb calcium and phosphorus; and supports teeth, bone, and muscle health.

The American Academy of Pediatrics recommends that infants receive 400 IU of vitamin D3 daily. To make sure your baby is receiving enough vitamin D, a daily supplement may be a great option. Baby’s Super Daily® D3 provides 400 IU (10 mcg) of vitamin D3 in a single, convenient, unflavored drop. Place a drop in your baby’s bottle, or use it while breastfeeding.

Product Features:
Bone Health: Supports strong and healthy bones.
Healthy Teeth: Promotes the development of healthy teeth.
Immune Support: Enhances immune function.
Cardiovascular Health: Supports heart health.
Muscle Health: Aids in muscle function.
Growth & Development: Essential for overall growth and development.
How to Use:
Infants through 12 months of age: Give one drop daily or as directed by your healthcare professional.
Place a drop in your baby’s bottle, or use it while breastfeeding.
Refrigerate after opening and use within 100 days.
Cautions & Warnings:
Store at room temperature before opening.
Keep out of reach of children.
Consult a doctor if your child has any allergies to fish or fish products.
Ingredients:
Vitamin D3 (cholecalciferol), medium chain triglycerides, natural tocopherols.

Vitamins & Supplements

The syrup also contains vitamins A, C, and E, which will contribute to the normal function of the immune system
Its formulation, which is rich in nutrients and protective substances helps to fight against oxidative stress
The syrup can also help with anemia
It strengthens your overall endurance
Product Features:
Roles of Vitamins Included in the Syrup:
Vitamin A contributes to the function of the immune system and to the maintenance of normal vision
Vitamin C has a general and important role in the function of the immune system and contributes to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue
Vitamin E contributes to the protection of cells from oxidative stress
Who is the Medex Multivitamin Multivitamin Plus 150ml Syrup Intended for?
Those who want to regenerate blood, it will also help them with anemia
Those who have no appetite and are exhausted, experience a great burden (mental or physical).
Those who recover after illness and chemotherapy
When It Is Recommended to use the Medex Multivitamin Multivitamin Plus 150ml Syrup?
When you are not feeling well, with great mental and physical burden, during periods of stress
When you are on an improper diet (not enough fruits and vegetables)
When you are a smoker
Benefits of Honey as a Base for Syrups:
Honey does not give just great taste and thick texture, it is a living thing
It has antimicrobial action in the oral cavity - contains certain enzymes that have an antimicrobial effect, it also contains short antimicrobial bee peptides and flavonoids from plants
Essential oils in honey have a beneficial effect on the respiratory system
On top, honey is a natural preservative
Propolis and Royal Jelly – the beehive treasures:
In addition to honey, the syrup contains also propolis and royal jelly
Propolis has natural antibacterial, antiviral, antifungal, and anti-inflammatory properties
Propolis is often referred to as a natural antibiotic and disinfectant
Royal jelly has antioxidant & anti-inflammatory action, it also lowers total cholesterol and triglycerides and stimulates immunity
Reduces fatigue, and exhaustion increases resistance to stress
And much more positive effects on human health

The recommended daily dose is three teaspoons (15 ml), we recommend adults to take 1 spoon (5 ml) three times per day, best after a meal.

Name: Nhs Daily Gummy Multivitamins For Children 60 Gummies
Description:
Product Description:

Nhs Daily Gummy Multivitamins For Children 60 Gummies are a fun and easy way to help ensure your child gets essential vitamins and minerals they might not be getting enough of through diet alone.
These chewable gummies come in a variety of flavors and provide a range of vitamins and minerals to support a child's healthy growth and development.
This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

How To Use:

The recommended dosage for Nhs Daily Gummy Multivitamins For Children 60 Gummies is typically one gummy per day for children aged 4 and over.
It's important to follow the recommended dosage and not exceed it.
Advise your child to chew the gummy thoroughly before swallowing.

Caution & Warnings:

Talk to your doctor before giving this supplement to your child if they have any underlying health conditions, allergies, or are taking medications.
Keep out of reach of children. Gummy vitamins can be mistaken for candy and can be a choking hazard for young children.
Discontinue use and consult your doctor if your child experiences any adverse reactions.
This product is not a substitute for a balanced diet and healthy lifestyle.

Ingredients:

Various Vitamins and Minerals (e.g., Vitamin A, C, D, E, B vitamins, Zinc, Iodine) in child-appropriate amounts.
Other inactive ingredients such as sweeteners, flavorings, coloring agents, and gelling agents.

Name: Celsius Drink, Kiwi Guava, 355 Ml
Description:
Product Description:

Re-energize and quench your thirst with the deliciously tropical combination of kiwi and guava! Made with clinically proven ingredients, this carbonated flavor of CELSIUS has the perfect balance of flavor and energy that serves as an awesome pick-me-up for active lifestyles.

Ingredients:

GREEN TEA EXTRACT

The extract used contains a specific ratio of EGCG (epigallocatechin gallate) —the compound that scientists have found boosts your metabolism and helps your body burn more calories.

VITAMIN B

B-Vitamins are essential for energy production and they help regulate cell health as well as metabolism. They also help support your adrenal glands to help you recover from fatigue.

GUARANA SEED EXTRACT

Unlike most guarana drinks, CELSIUS uses the seeds (instead of the roots), which contain over twice the amount of caffeine than the average coffee bean.

VITAMIN C

Also known as an ascorbic acid, vitamin C is an essential nutrient that aids the immune system and helps with tissue repair and the enzymatic production of certain neurotransmitters.

GINGER ROOT

Ginger root has a wonderful spicy flavor, and it's known to help support the process of thermogenesis as well as create a positive effect on digestive systems.

CHROMIUM

Known to help control hunger, chromium is an essential trace mineral that normalizes blood sugar levels and helps enhance the metabolism of proteins, carbohydrates, and lipids.

Healthy Food

Manufacturer: Celsius

Name: Glucerna-Sr Liquid Milk Vanilla 200 Ml
Description:
Product Description:
Glucerna-Sr Liquid Milk Vanilla (For Diabetics) 200 ml 18c is a complete and balanced meal replacement product for diabetics.
This product is a fiber-enriched and reduced carbohydrate drink for those who have glucose intolerance.
Glucerna shakes are specialized for those who are trying to manage their blood sugar. Glucerna-Sr Liquid Milk Vanilla (For Diabetics) 200 ml 18c is formulated with a system that has a unique carbohydrate blend with maltodextrin.
This product helps one to be active during the daytime and reduce the pangs of hunger. Glucerna shakes can be used as a full or partial meal replacement as they can aid in weight and blood sugar control.
Product Features:
They are formulated with slow-burning carbs that are digested slowly so that blood sugar does not rise very quickly.
It contains fiber and a healthy monounsaturated fatty acid (MUFA) lipid system that controls the glycemic response.
The product is balanced, complete, and has low-calories that aids in weight management.
It helps in reduction of hypoglycemia if taken at bed-time.
It provides high- quality protein and is free of sucrose.
The product contains monounsaturated fatty acid lipid system, fiber, and slow energy releasing system.
Glucerna-Sr Liquid Milk Vanilla (For Diabetics) 200 ml 18c can be taken orally and also by tube-feeding.
Glucerna-Sr Liquid Milk Vanilla is enriched with high-quality protein, essential minerals, and vitamins.
The product is specially designed for type 2 diabetics; it is also recommended for pre-diabetics and type 1 diabetic.

The product should be stored a cool place and extreme temperatures should be avoided.

Glucerna products are to be used under medical supervision as they are part of a diabetic management plan.

Name: Quest Cheese Crackers, Cheddar Blast, 30g
Description:
Product Description:

Quest Cheese Crackers are a snack option designed to satisfy cravings for cheese crackers while adhering to a low-carb, high-protein diet (often associated with keto or low-carb lifestyles).
Each 30g serving packs in 10 grams of protein and only 5 grams of net carbs, offering a source of protein without the high carbs found in traditional cheese crackers.
They come in a variety of flavors, with Cheddar Blast being a popular option known for its strong cheddar cheese taste.

How To Use:

These cheese crackers are ready to eat on their own as a convenient snack.
You can also incorporate them into recipes for added protein and a salty, cheesy element.
Refer to the packaging for any specific serving size recommendations.

Warnings and Precautions:

While generally safe for most people, these cheese crackers may contain ingredients like milk or wheat that can cause allergic reactions for those with sensitivities.
It's a good idea to check the ingredients list before consuming, especially if you have any allergies or intolerances.
Due to the high protein content, excessive consumption may lead to bloating or discomfort, so moderation is key.

Ingredients:

The exact ingredients may vary slightly, but Quest Cheese Crackers,

Cheddar Blast, typically contain:

Protein Blend:This could include whey protein isolate, milk protein isolate, or other protein sources.
Cheese:Real cheese is likely used to provide the cheddar flavor and some protein.
Fiber:Often includes ingredients like inulin or other dietary fibers to promote satiety and digestive health.
Fats:May contain healthy fats like almond flour or coconut oil to add texture and improve taste.
Flavorings:These may include natural cheese flavors, salt, and other spices to enhance the cheddar cheese taste.

Name: Sis Beta Fuel Caffiene Nootropics Apple 60ml
Description:
Product Description:

EVIDENCE-BASED ENERGY GEL FOR PHYSICAL AND MENTAL POWER OUTPUT
Designed as a world-leading, whole-body energy source, our innovative Beta Fuel Dual Source Energy Gel + Nootropics combines a new ratio of carbohydrates with Cognizin® Citicoline to improve both your physical and mental performance.
Part of an entire fuelling solution range that includes drinks and chew bars, our Beta Fuel Dual Source Energy Gel + Nootropics is optimized with a brand new 1:0.8 ratio of 40g carbohydrate to enhance your mental and physical power output, increase your body's carbohydrate usage efficiency, and limit gastrointestinal discomfort to deliver a scientifically superior fuel.

Product Features:

Just like the Beta Fuel Energy Gel, our Nootropics Gel contains 40 grams of carbohydrates, with added nootropic substances that can enhance cognitive performance, giving you that mental lift you might need, especially at the latter phases of exercise.
The Beta Fuel Gel with Nootropics contains 1 gram of the amino acid L-taurine, 250 milligrams of Cognizin® to enhance information processing, and 200 milligrams of caffeine with 200 milligrams of L-theanine, the amino acid which has been shown to increase subjective feelings of alertness, while reducing feelings of ‘jitters’ that you get with the caffeine alone.

How to use:

Consume directly from packaging, a maximum of one serving per day.
Combine with other energy supplements from the Beta Fuel range to achieve hourly 80-120g carbohydrate intake

Caution & Warnings:

Don't Consume more than 1 Gel a day.

How to use:
Cold with Yoghurt
If you like it cold and want to eat it as a quick snack, mix it with your favorite yogurt and slurp.
Cold but with Milk
Pour the milk into the muesli. You can eat it right away. But if you keep it soaked in milk for a complete night you get a better taste. The longer it is left soaked, the better flavor you get.
Hot
Take 1/3 cup of muesli and 1/3 cup of milk or water. Add it to a pan and keep it on the gas stove. Keep on stirring. Bring the mixture to boil. Remove from heat and let it cool a little bit. Enjoy your healthy breakfast.
Hot from the microwave
Take 1/3 cup of muesli and 1/3 cup of milk or water. Microwave the mixture for two minutes. Your breakfast or snack is ready to consume.
Caution & Warnings:
The product may contain nuts, peanuts, sesame, soy, and milk.
Hence it should not be given to kids who might be allergic to either of the above-mentioned ingredients
Keep it in a cool and dry place away from sunlight

Name: Quest Protein Bars, Chocolate Caramel Pecan, 60g
Description:
Product Description:

Quest Protein Bars are a popular snack option designed for people following high-protein, low-carb diets (often associated with keto or low-carb lifestyles).
Each bar (60g) packs in a significant amount of protein (typically around 15-20 grams) with a relatively low amount of net carbs (usually around 3-5 grams).
The Chocolate Caramel Pecan flavor features a chocolate coating, a soft and chewy center with caramel flavor, and bits of pecan for added texture.

How to Use:

Quest Protein Bars are ready to eat on their own as a convenient, protein-rich snack.
You can also break them up and use them as an ingredient in yogurt parfaits, trail mix, or even baking recipes that call for protein bar pieces.

Warnings and Precautions:

While generally safe for most people, these bars may contain ingredients like milk, soy, nuts (pecans in this case), and artificial sweeteners that can cause allergic reactions in some individuals.
Be sure to check the ingredients list before consuming.
Due to the high protein content, excessive consumption may lead to bloating or discomfort, so moderation is key.
Drinking plenty of water is also recommended.

Ingredients:

The exact ingredients may vary slightly depending on the specific batch, but Quest Protein Bars, Chocolate Caramel Pecan, typically contain:

Protein Blend:

This is the main ingredient and could include whey protein isolate, milk protein isolate, or other protein sources.

Sweeteners:

These may include sugar alcohols like erythritol, allulose, or stevia to provide sweetness without adding significant carbs or sugar.

Fiber:

Often includes ingredients like soluble corn fiber or polydextrose to promote satiety and digestive health.

Fats:

May contain healthy fats like almonds, coconut oil, or cocoa butter to add texture and improve taste.
Flavorings:These could include natural and artificial flavors like chocolate flavoring, caramel flavoring, and salt.

Healthy Food

Name: Font Activ Complete Powder Vanilla Flavour 400 gm
Description:
Product Description:
FontActiv Complete is a complete, balanced instant powdered drink, providing patients with high energy and protein content.
It also provides prebiotics to help regulate bowel transit and restore a healthy intestinal microbiota, as well as essential Omega 6 and Omega 3 fatty acids (such as DHA) which are important for modulation of the inflammatory processes.
FontActiv Complete helps patients meet energy and nutritional needs when normal diet isn’t sufficient.
It may be used as the sole source of nutrition, or as a supplement to their usual diet.
Font Active Complete is used For the dietary management of patients suffering from:
Protein-energy malnutrition, Weight loss, Sarcopenia, Digestive disorders
FontActiv Complete is also designed for the daily dietary management of patients at risk of malnutrition.

FontActiv Complete dissolves easily into liquids such as water or milk.
To prepare a 240 ml drink, add 57 g of FontActiv Complete Powder to 200 ml of liquid.
As a supplement, recommended dosage is 1 to 3 servings per day.
Daily intake should be determined by a clinician or dietician according to individual requirements.
FontActiv Complete can also be used to enrich vegetable purees, soups, or desserts.

Name: Hydralyte Effervescent Berry Favor 20 Eff Tablets
Description:
Product Description:

Hydration at the speed of Lyte.
Every day, we lose fluids and electrolytes that water simply through urine, salivia, sweat, and our bodies can't replace on its own. HydraLyte uses a proprietary formula containing a precise amount of glucose and electrolytes to rehydrate you faster than water alone.
Our Formula is sweet on hydration not sugar.
We created the Lyte RH formula which uses a precise amount of water, electrolytes and a dash of sugar. Yes, sugar. An exact sugar (glucose) to electrolyte ratio that accelerates fluid absorption. However, unlike sports drinks, we use the optimal amount of sugar, not a gram more.

Suitable for :

Adults
Babies & Children
Pregnant Women
Elderly

What is Dehydration?

Mild to moderate dehydration is defined as the loss of 2-6% of your body weight through fluids.
75% of people are dehydrated everyday from losing water and electrolytes through sweat, saliva, urine and other bodily functions.
Water doesn't contain electrolytes which is why dehydration is so common.

Howd does an ORS solution work?

ORS contains specific amounts of glucose and electrolytes.
These components maximize fluid absorption in the gastrointestinal tract.
The gastrointestinal tract relies on sodium-glucose cotransporters (SGLTs), which are carrier proteins in the intestinal cells.
Cotransporters help move substances across membranes.

How To Use:

Fill cup with 200mL of fresh, cold drinking water. For babies under 6 months, use freshly boiled and cooled water.

Empty contents of one sachet into 200mL cup of water and stirr until the hydralyte powder has dissolved.
Sip slowly and frequently while symptomes persist
Discard unused solution after 2 hours or 24 hours if refrigerated
Do not mix Hydralyte with cordial, fruit juice, soft or sport drinks.

Ingredients:

Glucose: 1.62 g
Citric acid: 672 mg
Sodium from
Sodium chloride: 34.5mg
Potassium from
Potassium chloride: 78mg
Sodium from Sodium bicarbonate: 103.5mg

Mild to moderate dehydration is defined as the loss of 2-6% of your body weight through fluids.
75% of people are dehydrated everyday from losing water and electrolytes through sweat, saliva, urine and other bodily functions.
Water doesn't contain electrolytes which is why dehydration is so common.

Howd does an ORS solution work?

ORS contains specific amounts of glucose and electrolytes.
These components maximize fluid absorption in the gastrointestinal tract.
The gastrointestinal tract relies on sodium-glucose cotransporters (SGLTs), which are carrier proteins in the intestinal cells.
Cotransporters help move substances across membranes.

How To Use:

Fill cup with 200mL of fresh, cold drinking water. For babies under 6 months, use freshly boiled and cooled water.
Empty contents of one sachet into 200mL cup of water and stirr until the hydralyte powder has dissolved.
Sip slowly and frequently while symptomes persist
Discard unused solution after 2 hours or 24 hours if refrigerated
Do not mix Hydralyte with cordial, fruit juice, soft or sport drinks.

Ingredients:

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS (per 62.5 mL Ice Block):

Glucose monohydrate: 1 g
Citric acid monohydrate:300 mg
Sodium from Sodium chloride: 61.5 mg
Potassium from Potassium Citrate: 50 mg

Healthy Food

Name: Basix Whey Protein 14 Servings Strawberry Swirl Powder 454 g
Description:
Product Description:

Determining the best protein supplement usually depends on what you want to get out of it; and while each protein in the market today has its pros and cons, many studies have shown that Whey Protein is your best bet.
Although we believe that whey protein is the best choice, we have added other high-quality protein sources to fill your shaker with the best protein in the market today.
Whey concentrate, whey isolate, and soy isolate; each of which brings its own unique benefits while working together to provide you with the most complete protein supplement: Basix Whey Protein. So why do you “just whey” and live in the past while you can today put the future of protein in your shaker?
The idea of a Basix Whey Protein came about after our nutritionists and scientists had long thinking as to which protein source was best based on the different protein contents, different amino acid profiles and different Biological Values.
They then decided that by adding whey isolate and soy isolate to whey protein they could effectively get the nutritional benefits of all of them in one protein powder.

Ultra-Premium Formula

The key to any protein powder is looking at each protein source that makes it up and its unique nutritional benefits.
By combining whey concentrate, whey isolate, and soy isolate together, you get the best of each world.
Whey Protein Concentrate and Whey Protein Isolate are the kings of the protein world with great benefits for muscle development, maintenance, and growth, and soy protein isolate is considered an effective source of nitrogen, which fuels lean muscle building especially that it comes with a low content of cholesterol and saturated fat.

All Nine Amino Acids & more

Amino acids, often referred to as the building blocks of proteins, are compounds that play many critical roles in your muscles and body.
Unlike most other protein powders, Basix Whey Protein contains all nine essential amino acids and most of the non-essential amino acids which leads to maintain muscle mass, increase muscle strength and assist athletes with recovery from heavy workouts.

No Compromises on Taste

Basix Whey Protein was made especially for people who demand products rich in protein, but will not compromise on taste.

Name: Basix Whey Protein 14 Servings Vanilla Whip Powder 454 g
Description:
Product Description:

Determining the best protein supplement usually depends on what you want to get out of it; and while each protein in the market today has its pros and cons, many studies have shown that Whey Protein is your best bet. Although we believe that whey protein is the best choice, we have added other high-quality protein sources to fill your shaker with the best protein in the market today. Whey concentrate, whey isolate, and soy isolate; each of which brings its own unique benefits while working together to provide you with the most complete protein supplement: Basix Whey Protein. So why do you “just whey” and live in the past while you can today put the future of protein in your shaker?

The idea of a Basix Whey Protein came about after our nutritionists and scientists had long thinking as to which protein source was best based on the different protein contents, different amino acid profiles and different Biological Values. They then decided that by adding whey isolate and soy isolate to whey protein they could effectively get the nutritional benefits of all of them in one protein powder.

Ultra-Premium Formula

The key to any protein powder is looking at each protein source that makes it up and their unique nutritional benefits. By combining whey concentrate, whey isolate, and soy isolate together, you get the best of each world. Whey Protein Concentrate and Whey Protein Isolate are the kings of the protein world with great benefits for muscle development, maintenance and growth and soy protein isolate is considered an effective source of nitrogen, which fuels lean muscle building especially that it comes with a low content of cholesterol and saturated fat.

All Nine Amino Acids & more

Amino acids, often referred to as the building blocks of proteins, are compounds that play many critical roles in your muscles and body. Unlike most other protein powders, Basix Whey Protein contains all nine essential amino acids and most of the non-essential amino acids which leads to maintain muscle mass, increase muscle strength and assist athletes with recovery from heavy workouts.

No Compromises on Taste

Basix Whey Protein was made especially for people who demand products rich in protein, but will not compromise on taste. The good news is that new formulations and technology used in Basix Protein have resulted in the development of protein shake that actually taste really good, from chocolate chunk that tastes exactly like your favorite chocolate cookies to strawberry swirl that tastes like a yummy cheesecake to vanilla whip that is finger-licking good.
