Name: Bio Synergy Lean & Green Vegan Protein Butterscotch 908 G
Description:
Product Description:

Bio-Synergy award winning Lean & Green, plant based protein with no allergens.
Combining quality organic pea protein isolate and brown rice protein, Lean & Green® is a super high protein powder created specifically for those with allergies or vegan – and it’s completely free of soya, dairy and hemp.
Our unique blend of all-natural protein sources is packed with BCAAs and other essential amino acids, fuelling you with an impressive 22g of protein per 30g serving – perfect for all your performance goals. It’s also exceptionally rich in arginine, lysine, leucine, and branched chain amino acids, necessary for energy and wellbeing.
You’ll like Lean & Green® for its healthy and natural source of protein, but you’ll love it for its taste.

How to use:

Add 1 serving (30g scoop) to 200-300ml of water, smoothie or juice. Best enjoyed 20-30 minutes before training, post workout and in the morning. Take 2-3 servings per day for maximum results.

Caution & Warnings:

Not suitable for children or pregnant women. Food supplements should not be used as a substitute for a healthy lifestyle and balanced diet. If in doubt of the suitability of this product, consult your GP. Do not exceed the recommended daily dose.
Store sealed in a cool dry place out of direct sunlight and the reach of children.
THIS PRODUCT IS SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

Name: Cyclonecup Shaker Black 32 OZ
Description:
Product Description:

World's best shaker! a bold statement to make, yes, it is. That's because the cyclone cup is no ordinary cup! it's proven to mix better than today's leading shaker bottle, thanks to a revolutionary cyclone mixing technology that blasts through and mixes up the toughest ingredients with ease.
Thecyclone cup is perfect for in the house, at the gym or on-the-go! so go ahead, add your favorite pre-workouts, protein supplements, or meal replacements, and let the cyclone cup do the rest! guaranteed to beat up any shaker! through liquid simulation, the cyclone cup has proven to mix better than today's leading shaker bottle! the cyclone cup introduces patented cyclone technology crafted from the finest materials available.
Today's leading shakers utilize a free-floating mixing element, such as a wire whisk ball, and these flow with the fluid inside.
As a result, mixing is not as efficient.
The cyclone, however, is stationary and moves against the flow of your ingredients.
This maximizes the stream of Kinetic energy for superior mixing - every time! protein shakes, supplements, and meal replacements...
bring it on! store and go! when you're on the go, simply add your favorite protein, supplement or meal replacement into the removable 6 oz storage Capsule below, and you're set! it is capable of holding a full 6 Ozserving.
Then, when you need it the most, simply unscrew and add the contents to your cyclone cup.
Rather than turning to fast food, now you can refuel your body and mind with a healthy and smart source of energy anytime, anywhere.
Bpa-free, dehp-free, and more! concerned about harmful chemicals need worry.
The cyclone cup is 100% BPA/dehp-free, and crafted from environmentally friendly, non-toxic, and recyclable materials.
Safe for you. Safe for your family.

Name: Eric Favre Creatine Pro Zero 500 Gm
Description:
Product Description:

Creatine is an amino acid derivative found mainly in meat and fish. The body produces it according to its needs. Ninety-five percent of creatine is found in skeletal muscle and is synthesized in the kidneys, liver, and pancreas.
Creatine is widely used in the world of sports (bodybuilding, fitness), as it improves physical capacity in the case of successive series of very intense, short-duration exercises. The beneficial effect of consuming 3g of creatine a day
For longer, more intense training sessions, demanding athletes will choose Pure Creatine.
Pure creatine is of high quality, as it is micronized (200 mesh).
Micronization" is a physical process that reduces particle size, ensuring perfect solubility and better absorption and assimilation.

How to use:

Mix 1 serving in 200 to 250 ml of water. Blend vigorously and enjoy your drink.

Cautions and Warnings:

Do not exceed the recommended daily dose.
Keep it out of the reach of young children. To be used in parallel with a well-balanced diet and a healthy way of life.
Do not use it during pregnancy, with children, or during prolonged periods without consulting a doctor.
Drink at least 2 liters of water a day.

Ingredients:

Creatine monohydrate. Manufactured in factories likely to produce food based on milk, soy, gluten, eggs, peanuts, crustaceans, and sulfites.

Healthy Food

Name: Font Activ Diabest Powder Vanilla Flavour 400 gm
Description:

FontActiv DiaBest is a low glycemic complete food supplement, rich in a fibre blend (FOS and resistent dextrin).
It is recommended for adults suffering from diabetes or prediabetes.
FontActive DiaBest is rich in protein, which helps maintain muscle mass.
The carbohydrates source is isomaltulose that provides a slow energy release.
It also contains ALA (α-linolenic acid) and 28 vitamins and minerals.
The formula is enriched with chromium, magnesium and biotin.
Chromium contributes to maintaining normal blood glucose levels.
For the dietary management of patients suffering from protein-energy malnutrition associated with diabetes or glycemic disorders.
It is also suitable for digestive disorders.

How to use:

FontActiv DiaBest dissolves easily into liquids such as water or milk.
To prepare a 240 ml drink, add 52 g of powder to 200 ml of cold or warm liquid.
As a supplement, recommended dosage is 1 to 2 servings per day.
Daily intake should be determined by a clinician or dietician according to individual requirements

Caution & Warnings:

Must be used under medical supervision.
Not suitable as a sole source of nutrition.
Not suitable for children under 3 years old.

Name: Hydralyte Effervescent Colour Free Lemonade 20 Eff Tablets
Description:
Product Description:

Hydration at the speed of Lyte.
Every day, we lose fluids and electrolytes that water simply through urine, salivia, sweat, and our bodies can't replace on its own. HydraLyte uses a proprietary formula containing a precise amount of glucose and electrolytes to rehydrate you faster than water alone.
Our Formula is sweet on hydration not sugar.
We created the Lyte RH formula which uses a precise amount of water, electrolytes and a dash of sugar. Yes, sugar. An exact sugar (glucose) to electrolyte ratio that accelerates fluid absorption. However, unlike sports drinks, we use the optimal amount of sugar, not a gram more.

Suitable for :

Adults
Babies & Children
Pregnant Women
Elderly

What is Dehydration?

Mild to moderate dehydration is defined as the loss of 2-6% of your body weight through fluids.
75% of people are dehydrated everyday from losing water and electrolytes through sweat, saliva, urine and other bodily functions.
Water doesn't contain electrolytes which is why dehydration is so common.

Howd does an ORS solution work?

ORS contains specific amounts of glucose and electrolytes.
These components maximize fluid absorption in the gastrointestinal tract.
The gastrointestinal tract relies on sodium-glucose cotransporters (SGLTs), which are carrier proteins in the intestinal cells.
Cotransporters help move substances across membranes.

How To Use:

Fill cup with 200mL of fresh, cold drinking water. For babies under 6 months, use freshly boiled and cooled water.

Empty contents of one sachet into 200mL cup of water and stirr until the hydralyte powder has dissolved.
Sip slowly and frequently while symptomes persist
Discard unused solution after 2 hours or 24 hours if refrigerated
Do not mix Hydralyte with cordial, fruit juice, soft or sport drinks.

Ingredients:

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS (per tablet):

Glucose: 1.62 g
Citric acid: 672 mg
Sodium from
Sodium chloride: 34.5mg
Potassium from
Potassium chloride: 78mg
Sodium from Sodium bicarbonate: 103.5mg

Short Description:
Healthy Food

Additional Information:
Manufacturer: Hydralyte

Name: Basix Complete 10 Eaa + Glutamine Juicy Watermelon 405g
Description:
Product Description:

There are 20 amino acids in the human body that serve as protein building blocks, nine of which are referred to as essential amino acids (EAAs). If you’re wondering why they’re necessary, it’s because your body can’t produce them on its own. As a result, we need to replenish them with food and supplements. EAAs supplementations have been found in studies to be particularly advantageous to your muscles, as they can help you build more muscle and prevent muscle loss.
Basix Complete 10 Essential Amino Acids & Glutamine contains 9.4g of essential amino acids per serving, including 7g of BCAAs in a 2:1:1 ratio (3500mg L-Leucine, 1750mg L-Isoleucine, 1750mg L-Valine) & L-Glutamine. Combining vital amino acids with L-Glutamine can do wonders for your muscles, accelerating muscular growth and elevating your game.
Supports muscle building & recovery
Reduce fatigue and improve performance
Improves protein synthesis
Contains 2.5g of glutamine for the best results
Zero sugar, Zero carbs & Zero fat
Halal-certified product
Tested for athletes

How to use:

Add 1 scoop (13.5g) into 500ml of water and shake well. Consume before, during and post-workout or anytime during the day when amino acid intake is required

Caution & Warnings:

Description:
Product Description:

There are 20 amino acids in the human body that serve as protein building blocks, nine of which are referred to as essential amino acids (EAAs). If you’re wondering why they’re necessary, it’s because your body can’t produce them on its own. As a result, we need to replenish them with food and supplements. EAAs supplementations have been found in studies to be particularly advantageous to your muscles, as they can help you build more muscle and prevent muscle loss.
Basix Complete 10 Essential Amino Acids & Glutamine contains 9.4g of essential amino acids per serving, including 7g of BCAAs in a 2:1:1 ratio (3500mg L-Leucine, 1750mg L-Isoleucine, 1750mg L-Valine) & L-Glutamine. Combining vital amino acids with L-Glutamine can do wonders for your muscles, accelerating muscular growth and elevating your game.
Supports muscle building & recovery
Reduce fatigue and improve performance
Improves protein synthesis
Contains 2.5g of glutamine for the best results
Zero sugar, Zero carbs & Zero fat
Halal-certified product
Tested for athletes

Name: Basix L-Carnitine 64 Servings Fruit Burst Powder 480 ml
Description:
Product Description:

L-Carnitine is a non-essential amino acid that helps to maintain overall good health by facilitating the transfer of fatty acid groups into the mitochondrial membrane, where the cells breakdown these fatty acids as fuel for producing energy.
L-Carnitine supplements boost the body’s own liver and kidney-based production of a nutrient that can benefit muscle performance, burn fat, and reduce fatigue.
L-Carnitine supplements from Basix include 3500mg of the amino acid.
When used in conjunction with proper training and food, this supplement aids in weight loss and maintenance, as well as effective muscle growth and recovery, allowing you to achieve your desired fitness level.
Green tea extract and vitamin C are added to our mix to make it even better.

Product Benefits:

Clinical research has shown L-Carnitine supports athletic performance and endurance.
Accelerate the recovery time after physical stress.
Each serving contains 3500mg of L-Carnitine.
Each serving contains 50mg of green tea extract.
Suitable for vegans.
Halal-Certified.

How to use:

Shake well before using.
Consume one serving (7.5 ml, or half tablespoon) of L-Carnitine liquid daily.

Caution & Warnings:

Food supplements should not be used as a substitute for a varied diet.
Store in a cool, dry place.
Store out of reach of children.

Deionized Water, L-Carnitine, Malic Acid, Green Tea Extract, Natural Flavoring, Sweeteners (Sucralose), Preservatives (Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate), Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid)

Name: Basix The Shred Powder Sour Gummy Bear 300g
Description:
Product Description:

Basix – The Shred is a cutting-edge thermogenic fat burner that triggers your body's fat sensory receptors to restrict them in your cells from high-calorie consumption.
Its formula raises your metabolic activity to encourage fat burning while also regulating your feeling of hunger, it also assists in muscle recovery.
That is why it is advised to consume such a formula while having a healthy eating plan along with working out program.

Features:

Designed to aid in your weight loss efforts when used in combination with a healthy diet and regular exercise.
Contains 200 mg of caffeine to provide continuous energy during extended workouts, enhance metabolism, and aid fat loss.
Each scoop features a precise amount of l-carnitine, green tea, choline, l-tyrosine, and B- Vitamins.
Allows your Abs muscles to "Burst Out," allowing for deeper muscle definition and separation.
What makes The Shred unique is that it is a thermogenic supplement, which means that it aids in the process of producing heat into higher metabolic activity, therefore leading to an enhanced fat loss rate. Its uniqueness is further enhanced by the fact that it is a stimulant supplement, which means it increases your mental and physical performance by employing an active component such as caffeine.

Formula & key elements:

Basix – The Shred’s blend of pure components and cutting-edge technology is designed to assist you to achieve your fitness objectives, whether that means boosting your capacity in the gym or covering the deficiencies in your nutrition.
Acetyl L-Carnitine
It helps you perform harder, which eventually assists in calorie-burning & weight loss.
This component can also help with exercise recovery, allowing you to train at a higher intensity more frequently.
Green Tea
Green tea is high in antioxidants, which have been related to weight loss. Caffeine and catechins in it have been shown to help in calorie burning, fat loss, and metabolism.
Betaine Anhydrous
Betaine also helps to increase cellular hydration, energy and strength, and heart health.
Caffeine Anhydrous
Caffeine is a stimulant that offers you a surge of power, boosting your physical endurance and helping with weight loss. It adds so much to your concentration and focus while training.
L-tyrosine
The amino acid helps you lose weight by speeding up your metabolism. It also gives you more energy and stamina during your workouts.
Moreover, Basix-Shred includes many vitamins to help you maintain healthy body metabolism and take care of your immune system, such as vitamin C, vitamin B3+6, and vitamin B12.

How to use:

15-30 minutes before exercising, blend 1 serving = 10g in 200ml of cold water

Caution & Warnings:

If you are under 18 years, pregnant, or breastfeeding, or if you already have certainly known or suspected medical disorder(s) and/or are on any prescription or OTC medicine, see a certified health expert before using this product.
This product includes 200 mg Caffeine per serving (including Green Tea), so it should not be taken in conjunction with caffeine or other stimulants.
It should not be used to replace diversified meals.
Keep this product away from children in a cold, dry place.
Do not use more than the recommended amount

Ingredients:

Acetyl L-Carnitine, Betain Anhydrous, Citric Acid (Acidity Regulator), Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Green Tea 95% Polyphenols, Choline Bitartrate, L-Theanine, Gymnema Sylvestre Leaf Extract (containing 75% Gymnemic Acids), Taurine, L-Tyrosine, Sodium Bicarbonate, Caffeine Anhydrous, Natural Flavour, Natural Colour (Beetroot Red), Anti-Clumping Agents: (Silicon Dioxide, Calcium Silicate), Breathe Easy™ (Flavour), Pro GBB™ (Gamma-Butyrobetaine Ethyl Ester HCL), Sucralose (Sweetener), Vitamin B3 (as Nicotinamide), Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine Hydrochloride), Vitamin B12 (as Cyanocobalamin).
It has no allergic component

Healthy Food

Name: Basix Xtreme Pump Blue Razz Rush 315g
Description:
Product Description:

Xtreme Pump Pre-workout by Basix is a new stimulant-based pre-workout that was formulated using powerful clinically studied ingredients to boost exercise performance, enhance mental and physical energy levels, promote muscular pumps, and improve the mind-to-muscle connection.
This powerhouse formula can push you through the toughest workouts and is loaded with proven ingredients that can make you experience the most insane pre-workout you’ve ever had:
Contains 200Mg of caffeine. consuming caffeine before intense fitness training showed improved concentration with the ability to sustain high levels of exercise intensity.
4g of Citrulline Malate to increase Nitric Oxide (NO) content in the body which leads to promoting muscle pumps and performance for a longer duration.
Contains 3g of creatine in each serving. Creatine helps increase strength and endurance, allowing you to lift heavier, run faster & improve overall physical performance.
Contains 2g of beta alanine. Consumption of beta-alanine helps enhance the endurance during your workouts by keeping you active and energized for the longer duration.
Contains 100mg of Theacrine, B3 and B12 that can help you to feel sharper and more focused during your training sessions.
Contains 200mg of Taurine.
Taurine is a premium quality amino acid that helps maintain proper hydration & electrolyte balance in cells & improves athletic performance by helping muscles work harder and for a longer duration.

How to use:

Mix 1 serving 10.5g (1 level scoop) with 250ml of cold water and consume 15-30 minutes before exercise

Caution & Warnings:

Check with a qualified health professional before using this product if you are under the age of 18, pregnant or nursing a baby, or if you have any known or suspected medical condition(s) and or are taking any prescription or OTC medication(s).
Contains Caffeine (200mg per serving).
This product should not be used in combination with caffeine or stimulants from other sources.
Not to be used as a substitute for a varied diet and healthy lifestyle.
Store this product in a cool dry place, away from children.
Do not exceed the suggested use.

Ingredients:

Citrulline Malate, Creatine Monohydrate, Beta-Alanine, Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Taurine, Caffeine Anhydrous, TheaCrine, Natural Flavour, Natural Colour (Spirulina), Sweetener (Sucralose), Vitamin B3 (Nicotinamide), Vitamin B12 (Cyanocobalamin).

Name: C4 Orig Pink Lemonade 30Srv Id 12/Cs
Description:
Product Description:

Explosive energy heightened focus, and an overwhelming urge to tackle any challenge...that’s the C4 experience. Millions of people­—ranging from beginners all the way up to the elite competitors, have relied on C4 pre-workout to help them turn their ambitions into achievements.
As America’s #1 selling pre-workout, C4 Original lives up to its solid reputation with a classic formula for advanced energy, endurance, focus, and pumps! But with a new bottle design and more delicious flavor options for you to choose from, you’ll feel like it’s your very first time experiencing the C4 pre-workout you know and love.
Whether you’re just starting a fitness journey or you’re striving to reach that next level, C4 Original will help you unlock your full potential.
1.6g CarnoSyn® Beta-Alanine
1g Creatine Nitrate (NO3-T®)
150mg Caffeine
1g Arginine AKG

How to use:

Take one serving (1 level scoop) of C4® Original, mixed with 6 fl. oz of water 20-30 minutes before training.
Some individuals may experience a harmless tingling sensation, which is attributed to beta-alanine. Use only as directed.

Cautions & Warnings:

This product is only intended to be consumed by healthy adults, 18 years of age or older.
Do not use this product if you are pregnant, nursing, or are currently taking nitrates for chest pain or if you are taking medication used to treat erectile dysfunction such as PDE-5 inhibitors.
Before using this product, consult a licensed, qualified, healthcare professional, including but not limited to, if: you are taking antidepressants such as MAOI (Monoamine Oxidase Inhibitor) or SSRI, blood thinners, nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs, pseudoephedrine, or you are taking any other dietary supplement, prescription drug or over-the-counter medication; or if, you suspect you have or have been treated for, diagnosed with or have a family history of, any medical condition, including but not limited to: high or low blood pressure, diabetes, glaucoma, anxiety, cardiovascular, psychiatric or seizure disorders, cardiac arrhythmia, stroke, heart, liver, kidney or thyroid disease, or difficulty urinating due to prostate enlargement.
This product contains caffeine and should not be used by individuals wishing to eliminate caffeine from their diet or in combination with caffeine or stimulants from other sources including but not limited to, coffee, tea, soda, or other dietary supplements and medications.
Discontinue 2 weeks prior to surgery.
Immediately discontinue use and contact a medical doctor if you experience any adverse reaction to this product.
Do not exceed recommendations for Suggested Use.
Use only as directed.
Do not use if the safety seal is broken or missing.
Store in a cool dry place.
Keep out of reach of children.

Beta-Alanine
30 Servings

CarnoSyn® Beta-Alanine 1600mg

N-Acetyl-L-Tyrosine, Caffeine Anhydrous (150mg), Theacrine (as TeaCrine®)
† Daily Value not established.

World's best shaker! a bold statement to make, yes, it is.
That's because the cyclone cup is no ordinary cup! it's proven to mix better than today's leading shaker bottle, thanks to a revolutionary cyclone mixing technology that blasts through and mixes up the toughest ingredients with ease.

Description:
Product Description:

Dymatize ISO 100 Protein Isolate is simply muscle-building fuel. Known worldwide for quality, taste, and purity. If your goal is to gain muscle size and strength, then ISO100 Protein is your perfect workout partner. Loaded with muscle-building amino acids, ISO100 Protein can support even the most serious resistance-training programs.
Known worldwide for quality, taste, and purity, Dymatize ISO 100 Protein is produced to our highest quality standards. Dymatize ISO 100 Protein is formulated using a cross-flow microfiltration, multi-step purification process that preserves important muscle-building protein fractions while removing excess carbohydrates, fat, lactose, and cholesterol.
Dymatize ISO 100 Protein Isolate is made with pre-hydrolyzed protein sources to ensure fast digestion and absorption. One look at the facts panel will tell you that Dymatize ISO 100 Protein has a lot to offer:
25 grams of protein, 5.5 grams of branched-chain amino acids (BCAAs), and 2.7 grams of Leucine per serving
Fast digesting and absorbing protein, great before, during, or after workouts
Maintaining a positive nitrogen balance, which is critical during periods of intense training
Typical Amino Acid Profile**
25 g Total Amino Acids Per Serving
47% Essential Amino Acids (EAAs): 11.8 g
2:1:1 Ratio BCAAs - 5.5 g

Other EAAs - 6.3 g
27% Conditionally Essential Amino Acids (CEAAs): 6.8 g
Glutamine† - 4.4 g - Is Glutamine important? Yes! Glutamine supports muscle recovery after strenuous workouts.
Other CEAAs -2.4 g
26% Non-Essential Amino Acids (Non-EAAs): 6.5 g
Non-EAAs - 6.5 g - Why is non-essential... essential? Non-essential aminos are foundational building blocks of muscle!
Informed-Choice - Trusted by sport
Informed-Choice is a quality assurance program that certifies that all nutritional supplements and/or ingredients that bear the Informed-Choice logo have been tested for banned substances by the world-class sports anti-doping lab, LGC.

How to use:

Formulated for easy mixing. Add one scoop (included) to 5-6 oz (150ml-180ml) of water, milk, or your favorite beverage and mix thoroughly.
Enjoy prior to workouts, within 30 minutes after workouts, or anytime you desire a high-quality, high-protein drink.

Caution & Warnings:

Store in a cool, dry place.
Keep out of reach of children.
Sold by weight not volume.
Notice: Use this product as a Food Supplement only. Do not use it for weight reduction.

Hydrolyzed Whey Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Isolate, Cocoa Powder (processed with alkali), Natural and Artificial Flavor, Salt, Soy Lecithin, Potassium Chloride, Sucralose, Steviol Glycosides (Stevia)

Name: Muscletech Nitrotech Cookies And Cream 2.2lbs (998g)
Description:
MuscleTech Nitro Tech Performance Series

MuscleTech is a brand name synonymous with premium-quality, top-of-the-line products that span more than a decade, including Nitro-Tech, Cell-Tech™, NANO VAPOR®, MASS-Tech®, just to name a few.

With the powerful Nitro-Tech Protein formula, they succeeded, and now bodybuilders and other athletes have an advanced whey protein supplement that actually delivers superior muscle-building results. Nitro-Tech Protein Powder contains a research-proven 3-gram dose of creatine monohydrate, which combined with whey protein, helps to build more strength than regular whey protein.
Each scoop of Nitro-Tech Protein Powder contains 30 grams of protein, primarily from whey protein and isolate peptides, with only 4 grams of carbs, depending on the flavor, and no more than 2.5 grams of fat!

TESTED FOR QUALITY AND PURITY:

To ensure a high standard of quality and purity, the whey protein in Nitro-Tech has been filtered using multi-phase filtration technology.
Each batch of Nitro-Tech undergoes strict quality control and is third-party lab-tested and verified to ensure that each bottle meetsthe highest standards of purity, quality and consistency.

BEST IN CLASS TASTE:

At MuscleTech, we believe that you shouldn’t have to sacrifice macronutrients for results. That’s why our research team works closely with some of the top protein-flavoring professionals in the world, and each flavor of Nitro-Tech undergoes rounds of taste testing until perfect.

CONTAINS A CLINICALLY PROVEN DOSE OF PURE CREATINE MONOHYDRATE:

Each scoop supplies a full 3-gram dose of the most researched form of creatine available – creatine monohydrate.
Creatine, in combination with whey protein, has been clinically shown in a published study to be more effective for building muscle than whey protein on its own.

PROVIDES ALL ESSENTIALBCAAs:

The protein in Nitro-Tech provides a complete amino acid profile, which means that every serving of Nitro-Tech protein Powder delivers all the essential amino acids, including the 6.8 grams of BCAAs critical for building muscle.
Plus, you get the conditionally essential and dispensable amino acids, including 5 grams of glutamine and its precursor.

How to use:

Mix 1 serving (1 scoop) with 4 to 6 oz. (118-177mL) or mix 2 servings (2 scoops) with 8 to 12 oz. (236-354mL) of cold water or skim milk in a glass or shaker cup. Use between major meals and after exercise.
Drink 8 to 10 glasses of water daily. For maximum results, consume 4 scoops of NITRO-TECH® Performance Series daily for a minimum of six weeks.

Caution & Warnings:

Do not use if pregnant or nursing.
Consult a medical doctor before starting any diet or exercise program.
Discontinue use and consult a medical doctor if you experience unusual symptoms.
Do not use if packaging has been tampered with.
Store in a cool, dry place.

Name: Nupo Diet Meal Risotto 10 Servings
Description:
Product Description :

Nupo Diet is a diet developed to achieve fast, safe, and efficient weight loss.
The Nupo diet consists of 6 Nupo Diet products per day.
This gives you a minimal amount of calories as well as all the necessary nutrients, vitamins, and minerals that your body needs.
With the Nupo diet, you replace all yourmealswith 6 Nupo Diet products per day for a period of up to 8 weeks.
The Nupo diet gives you approx.
800 calories per day and is therefore considered a Very Low-Calorie Diet (VLCD).
The NUPO Diet consists ofNupo Diet Shakes, Meals, andSoups.

How To Use:

Add water and 1 sachet of Nupo in a shaker.
See amount of water on each sachet.
Shake thoroughly.
Drink cold when consuming shakes.
Heat up, either in a microwave or in a pot, when consuming soups or meals.
Mix and match all 6 servings per day.
It is important to follow the instructions for use.

Cautions And Warnings:

People who are allergic to any of the components of this product are not allowed to take it, in addition to pregnant and lactating women, children, those under the age of 18, the obese, those suffering from heart disease or metabolic disorders, or the elderly, except with the advice of a specialist physician.
The product may cause headache, dizziness or coldness, hunger, lack of attention, and more or less frequent visits to the toilet.
The symptoms or side effects that you will experience can occur with any strict diet, but these symptoms are not limited to the Nupo diet.

Ingredients:

Textured pea protein, rice (24%),SOYprotein,SOYlecithin, vegetable oil (soy, sunflower, flaxseed), minerals (potassium chloride, calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid, magnesium citrate, zinc sulphate, ferric pyrophosphate, manganese sulphate, cupric sulphate, potassium iodide, sodium selenite, sodium molybdate) and vitamins (L-ascorbic acid, nicotinamide, DL-alpha-tocopheryl acetate, calcium-D-pantothenate, riboflavin, pyridoxine hydrochloride, thiamin mononitrate, beta-carotene, pteroylmonoglutamic acid, phylloquinone, D-biotin, ergocalciferol, cyanocobalamin), dried mushroom (Boletus granulatus) (4%), polydextrose, flavouring, garlic (0,8%), salt, choline bitartrate, parsley (0,3%), white pepper, vinegar, psyllium husk powder (0,1%).. May contain traces of milk.

Name: Olimp Creatine Monohydrate 250 G
Description:
Product Description:

Olimp Creatine Monohydrate is a creatine supplement that comes in a 250 gram container.
Creatine is a substance found naturally in muscle cells that helps your body produce energy.
It's a popular supplement among athletes and bodybuilders because it may help improve muscle strength, power, and endurance.
Overall, Olimp Creatine Monohydrate is a safe and effective supplement for most healthy adults.
However, it's important to talk to your doctor before taking it to make sure it's right for you.

How To Use:

The recommended dosage of creatine is 5 grams per day.
However, some athletes take higher doses.
It's important to talk to your doctor before taking creatine, especially if you have any health conditions.

Warning and Precautions:

Here are some things to consider before taking Olimp Creatine Monohydrate:

Safety:

Creatine is generally safe for healthy adults when taken in moderate doses. However, it can cause side effects such as stomach cramps, diarrhea, and dehydration.
It's not recommended for pregnant or breastfeeding women, or people with kidney disease.

Efficacy:

There is some scientific evidence to support the use of creatine for improving muscle strength and power.
However, the results of studies have been mixed.

Ingredients:

Creatine Monohydrate 250

Short Description:
Healthy Food

Additional Information:
Manufacturer: Olimp
Categories: Shop By Goal > Healthy foods

Name: ON Micronized Creatine 300 gm Powder
Description:
Product Description:

Creatine monohydrate is one of the most effective sports nutrition ingredients. When used in conjunction with regular weight training and high-intensity activities. it has been shown to support strength, power and muscle size. One teaspoon of ON’s Micronized Creatine Powder provides five grams of 99.9 Percent pure creapure creatine monohydrate. This unflavored powder mixes easily into water, juice or your post-workout protein shake to help you meet ambitious weight room goals. It’s also micronized (to make the particles smaller), so our powder mixes easier and stays suspended in liquid longer than non-micronized creatine supplements.

Supports Muscle Strength & Power

Improves performance in high-intensity exercise

Enhance energy reserves in muscles while minimizing protein breakdown

Micronized Powder Mixes More Easily & Stays in Solution Longer Than Non-Micronized Powders

Unflavored for Stacking Versatility

How to use:

Add 1 rounded teaspoon of Micronized Creatine Powder with a glass filled with 8-12 oz of cold water or fruit juice. Then mix it up with a spoon.

Tip: Power-up protein, meal-replacement, and weight-gainer shakes with a rounded teaspoon of Micronized Creatine Powder .

Creatine Loading: Take 1 rounded teaspoon of Micronized Creatine Powder with morning, afternoon, and evening meals and 1 additional rounded teaspoon before going to bed for 4-5 days to help saturate your muscles with creatine.

Creatine Maintenance: Take 1 rounded teaspoon of Micronized Creatine Powder with a meal or immediately after training with your post-workout protein shake. TIP: Drink at least eight glasses of water daily when supplementing with creatine.

Consuming simple carbohydrates with creatine may help improve overall effectiveness.

Caution & Warnings:

Check with a qualified healthcare professional before using this product if you are under 18 years of age, pregnant or nursing a baby or if you have any known or suspected medical condition(s) and/or are taking any prescription or OTC medication(s).

Ingredients:

Creatine Monohydrate

Healthy Food

Name: R1 Creatine 75 Serv Unflavored
Description:
Product Description:

R1 Creatine 75 Servings - Fuel Your Workouts and Muscle Growth.

Features & Benefits:

Appeton Weight Gain Powder 450 gm Chocolate (Adult) is perfect weight gain powder to increase your body's mass.
It is filled with protein and amino acids, along with minerals and multivitamins of many kinds.
These nutrients are essential for tissue growth and have L-lysine that improves the Protein Efficiency Ratio.

it contain L-Arginine which stimulates the growth hormone to increase lean mass
The clinical study has shown that average weight gain for both male & female is 2kg after consumed Appeton Weight Gain 3 times a day, on top of the normal meal for 2 months.

Product Features:

Helps in increasing the mass of the body

It contains several kinds of amino acids, vitamins, and minerals
Filled with protein, carbohydrates, and healthy fats.
The PER Value of Appeton Weight gain Powder is 3:1. With the best amino acids,

Packed with a balanced set of nutrients
Comes in chocolate and vanilla flavor

Helps in gaining muscle mass
Used for Underweight/skinny adult, Convalescent, Athlete, Age group: 13 years old onwards.

 

How To use:

There is a particular way of consuming this product. It has to be strictly followed to get significant results.
Firstly, take three and a half to four scoops of the weight gain powder. It will approximately be equal to 40 grams.
Add it to 300ml of warm water. Stir very well to stop the formation of unwanted lumps.
If you want, you can also add this concoction into a mixer or a blender and blend it properly.
You can also strain it after you have taken it out of the mixer or the blender.
Do not add any sugar or salt or anything else into this milkshake.
Take the shake two to three times daily every day. Consume a shake a few minutes after each meal.
Maintain a regular diet and follow it properly to see results.

Caution & Warnings:

This product contains milk. Therefore, it is not suited for people who have lactose intolerance.

Please read the label carefully before consuming it.
Please make a list of all the ingredients used to make it not to have to face any allergic reaction to anything.

Do not rely on this product as the only source of nutrients.

Name: Basix Total Gainer Protein 23 Servings Chocolate Chunk Powder 6.8 Kg
Description:
Product Description:

If you have trouble getting the calories needed to support lean muscle or suffering from a fast metabolism, then a high calorie, high protein weight gainer may be the answer you need to gain weight and to build rock-solid lean muscle mass. Unfortunately, weight gainers, these days are just cheap protein powders loaded with sugar to up the calorie content.

Basix Total Gainer- Superfoods, Super Healthy, Super Size

While formulating Basix Total Gainer, the team of experts has decided to focus on quality, rather than decadent quantities. Let’s take a closer look. Unlike other weight gainers on the market, Basix Total Gainer does not consist of one cheap protein source but richly contains over 45g of whey protein concentrate, milk protein concentrate, and whey protein isolate. These proteins are considered the kings of the protein world with great benefits for muscle development, maintenance, and growth. It doesn’t stop here, while everybody knows that carbs are not created equal, Basix Total Gainer contains carbs only from the best sources in the world. We’re talking about 100% ultra-fine oat powder as the main source of carbs, maltodextrin, and dextrose. Sounds complicated! But really all you need to know is that the carbs coming from oats are extra healthy to your muscles and absolutely can’t be compared to sugar when you wish to get more calories.

Another bonus for oats: if you consume them as a post-workout meal, the carbs from our oats will really crank up your muscle gains. Finally, as fats are considered one of the main micronutrients in mass gainers, we’ve decided to go with the healthiest source of fats: MCT Oil. What makes MCTs a top source of essential healthy fats is that Medium-chain fats are digested easily directly to your liver, where they have the ability to positively alter your metabolism. This is one reason why many scientists claim that MCTs, are burned by the body for energy, or “fuel,” instead of being stored as fat. What does that mean? It means that you can ignore everybody saying that a mass gainer will make you gain unwanted body fat and rest assure that Basix Total Gainer will make you gain extra lean muscle mass.

No Compromises on Taste

Basix Total Gainer was made especially for people who demand products rich in protein, healthy carbs and fats but will not compromise on taste. The good news is that new formulations and technology used in Basix Total Gainer have resulted in the development of mass gainers that actually taste really good, from a chocolate chunk that tastes exactly like your favorite chocolate cookies to strawberry swirl that tastes like a yummy cheesecake to vanilla whip that is finger-licking good.

How to use:

300g (6 scoops) with 300ml of water or milk. For best results add 150g (three scoops) to 300ml of water, shake well and then add the remaining 150g (three scoops) and shake again. Consume immediately.

Caution & Warnings:

Keep out of the reach of Children.

Once mixed keep chilled and consume within 3 Hours.

Manufactured on equipment that processes Egg, Soya, and products derived from Crustaceans.

Close Pouch after use.

Store in a cool, dry place.

Ingredients:

Slow and fast release Carbohydrate Blend (Maltodextrin, Ultra-Fine Oats

Powder (Gluten), Dextrose), Protein Blend (Whey Protein Concentrate (Milk),

Milk Protein Concentrate (Milk), Whey Protein Isolate (Milk), Cocoa Powder, Creatine Monohydrate, MCT (Medium Chain Triglycerides -Coconut Oil), Flavouring,  Stabiliser (Xanthan Gum), Sweetener (Sucralose).

Short Description:
Healthy Food

Additional Information:
Manufacturer: Basix
Product form: Powder
Ingredients: Creatine, Whey Protein Concentrate
Flavor: Chocolate

Name: Basix Whey Protein 66 Servings Chociolate Chunk Powder 2.25 Kg
Description:
Product Description:

Determining the best protein supplement usually depends on what you want to get out of it; and while each protein in the market today has its pros and cons, many studies have shown that Whey Protein is your best bet. Although we believe that whey protein is the best choice, we have added other high-quality protein sources to fill your shaker with the best protein in the market today. Whey concentrate, whey isolate, and soy isolate; each of which brings its own unique benefits while working together to provide you with the most complete protein supplement: Basix Whey Protein. So why do you “just whey” and live in the past while you can today put the future of protein in your shaker?

The idea of a Basix Whey Protein came about after our nutritionists and scientists had long thinking as to which protein source was best based on the different protein contents, different amino acid profiles and different Biological Values. They then decided that by adding whey isolate and soy isolate to whey protein they could effectively get the nutritional benefits of all of them in one protein powder.

Ultra-Premium Formula

The key to any protein powder is looking at each protein source that makes it up and their unique nutritional benefits. By combining whey concentrate, whey isolate, and soy isolate together, you get the best of each world. Whey Protein Concentrate and Whey Protein Isolate are the kings of the protein world with great benefits for muscle development, maintenance and growth and soy protein isolate is considered an effective source of nitrogen, which fuels lean muscle building especially that it comes with a low content of cholesterol and saturated fat.

All Nine Amino Acids & more

Amino acids, often referred to as the building blocks of proteins, are compounds that play many critical roles in your muscles and body. Unlike most other protein powders, Basix Whey Protein contains all nine essential amino acids and most of the non-essential amino acids which leads to maintain muscle mass, increase muscle strength and assist athletes with recovery from heavy workouts.

No Compromises on Taste

Basix Whey Protein was made especially for people who demand products rich in protein, but will not compromise on taste. The good news is that new formulations and technology used in Basix Protein have resulted in the development of protein shake that actually taste really good, from chocolate chunk that tastes exactly like your favorite chocolate cookies to strawberry swirl that tastes like a yummy cheesecake to vanilla whip that is finger-licking good.

 

 

How to use:

Add 34g (one slightly heaped scoop) in 200ml of water or milk. Once mixed keep chilled and consume within 3 Hours.

 

 

Caution & Warnings:

Keep out of the reach of Children

Manufactured on equipment which also processes Egg and products derived from Crustaceans

Close pouch after use

Store in a cool, dry place

 

Ingredients:

Whey Protein Blend (Whey Protein Concentrate (Milk), Whey Protein Isolate (Milk)), Soy Protein Isolate (Soy), Flavouring, Stabiliser (Xanthan Gum), Sweetener (Sucralose).

Short Description:
Healthy Food

Additional Information:
Manufacturer: Basix
Product form: Powder
Ingredients: Isolated Whey Protein, Whey Protein Concentrate
Flavor: Chocolate

Name: Dymatize ISO-100 Hydrolyzed Protein 43 Servings Chocolate Powder 1.4 kg
Description:
Product Description:
Protein powder is essential during workouts. The Dymatize ISO 100 has a variety of flavors in protein powders. The flavor Gourmet Chocolate comes in a 3Lb tub containing 1.4 kg of protein powder. The protein powder contains 24 g of protein. It does not have any carbs or fat. The Dynamite’s formulation is such that it gives instant mixability. The product is gluten-free. The company regularly tests to ensure that it contains no banned substances. The protein-rich powder is a dietary supplement. The recommended serving portion is one scoop. It is for men and women. The primary ingredient is 100% whey protein isolate. It helps in healing your muscle and build endurance. The chocolate-flavored protein powder also contains essential and non-essential amino acids. These help in muscle recovery and act as building blocks for the muscle. Build that muscle while indulging in treats with this. Who doesn't like to build muscle and indulge in some tasty goodness in one go!
• The On Gold Standard contains 100% blended whey protein.
• The primary ingredient is whey protein isolate
• The protein is gourmet chocolate flavored
• It helps in muscle healing, gain, and endurance
• A 1.4 kg box contains 43 servings
• It mixes instantly.
• It is gluten-free.
• A scoop contains 32 g protein powder

How to use:

• Take one heaping scoop of protein powder and mix with 350 ml cold water or milk.

• The recommended time to consume it is after work-out. However, it can be taken before or during work-out for a boost of energy
• For best results, consume 2 – 3 servings daily
• Avoid consuming more than the recommended amount
Caution & Warnings:
• Avoid protein powder if allergic to gluten
• Read the list of ingredients to check for allergens
• Do not cook the protein powder. It is meant to be consumed in cold or room temperature beverages
• The protein powder is for adults. Strictly keep it away from children
• Do not consume the protein powder beyond its expiry date
• Keep the product away from the reach of children
• Do not consume more than 2 – 3 servings per day
• Store it away from sunlight in a cool, dry place
• Do not consume the protein powder if the box is not sealed
• Avoid touching the protein powder with unhygienic hands
• Inflammable - store the product away from a possible fire

Description:

Eric Favre's Iso Whey Vanilla is your tasty choice of protein source and muscle-building.
ISO ZERO is made up of over 85% whey protein isolate (WPH, WPI), one of the purest sources of protein.
The Eric Favre ® laboratory has selected it for its rapid assimilation allowing muscle anabolism.

Protein helps increase muscle mass.

How to use:

Snack: take 1 serving of 30 g as a snack at 10 am and at 4 pm.
Training days: take 1 serving of 30 g in the morning then after training to deliver to the muscles proteins to improve muscle building.
Days off: take 2 servings of 30 g a day, preferably in the morning and in the evening.

1 measuring spoon = 30 g Mix 1 serving of 30 g in 200 to 250 ml of water (according to the desired texture).

Description:

Name: Muscletech Nitrotech Cookies And Cream 4lbs
Description:
MuscleTech Nitro Tech Performance Series

MuscleTech is a brand name synonymous with premium-quality, top-of-the-line products that span more than a decade, including Nitro-Tech, Cell-Tech™, NANO VAPOR®, MASS-Tech®, just to name a few.

With the powerful Nitro-Tech Protein formula, they succeeded, and now bodybuilders and other athletes have an advanced whey protein supplement that actually delivers superior muscle-building results. Nitro-Tech Protein Powder contains a research-proven 3-gram dose of creatine monohydrate, which combined with whey protein, helps to build more strength than regular whey protein.
Each scoop of Nitro-Tech Protein Powder contains 30 grams of protein, primarily from whey protein and isolate peptides, with only 4 grams of carbs, depending on the flavor, and no more than 2.5 grams of fat!

TESTED FOR QUALITY AND PURITY:

To ensure a high standard of quality and purity, the whey protein in Nitro-Tech has been filtered using multi-phase filtration technology.
Each batch of Nitro-Tech undergoes strict quality control and is third-party lab-tested and verified to ensure that each bottle meetsthe highest standards of purity, quality and consistency.

BEST IN CLASS TASTE:

At MuscleTech, we believe that you shouldn’t have to sacrifice macronutrients for results. That’s why our research team works closely with some of the top protein-flavoring professionals in the world, and each flavor of Nitro-Tech undergoes rounds of taste testing until perfect.

CONTAINS A CLINICALLY PROVEN DOSE OF PURE CREATINE MONOHYDRATE:

Each scoop supplies a full 3-gram dose of the most researched form of creatine available – creatine monohydrate.
Creatine, in combination with whey protein, has been clinically shown in a published study to be more effective for building muscle than whey protein on its own.

PROVIDES ALL ESSENTIALBCAAs:

The protein in Nitro-Tech provides a complete amino acid profile, which means that every serving of Nitro-Tech protein Powder delivers all the essential amino acids, including the 6.8 grams of BCAAs critical for building muscle.
Plus, you get the conditionally essential and dispensable amino acids, including 5 grams of glutamine and its precursor.

How to use:

Mix 1 serving (1 scoop) with 4 to 6 oz. (118-177mL) or mix 2 servings (2 scoops) with 8 to 12 oz. (236-354mL) of cold water or skim milk in a glass or shaker cup. Use between major meals and after exercise.
Drink 8 to 10 glasses of water daily. For maximum results, consume 4 scoops of NITRO-TECH® Performance Series daily for a minimum of six weeks.

Caution & Warnings:

Do not use if pregnant or nursing.
Consult a medical doctor before starting any diet or exercise program.
Discontinue use and consult a medical doctor if you experience unusual symptoms.
Do not use if packaging has been tampered with.
Store in a cool, dry place.

Name: ON Optimum Nutrition Gold Standard 100% Whey 29 Servings Vanilla Ice Cream Powder 2 Lb
Description:
Product Description:
About Product : Optimum Nutrition ("ON"), a world leader in sports nutrition:
Optimum Nutrition is one of the leading sport nutrition companies in the world and produces the iconic 100% Whey Gold Standard, the highest selling protein powder on the international market.
ON's strict ingredients selection, quality control, lab testing and manufacturing processes are all done for one reason: to provide you with the highest quality sports nutrition products available.
Product Benefits:
Muscle-building fuel
Gain muscle size and strength
24 g of premium whey protein
5.5 grams BCAAs
29 Servings
one scoop prior to workouts & within 30 minutes after workouts
Description Whey Protein Isolates (WPIs) are the purest form of whey protein that currently exists.
That's why they're the first ingredient you read on the Gold Standard 100% Whey label.
By using WPI as the primary ingredient along with premium ultra-filtered whey protein concentrate (WPC), we're able to pack 24g blended protein consisting of whey protein isolate, whey protein concentrate, and whey peptides/hydrolysates to support lean muscle mass.
The primary protein source is Isolate, they don't call it the Gold Standard of quality for nothing. pack 24 grams of protein into every serving to support your muscle-building needs after training.
This superior quality powder has been proved to mix easily using a shaker cup or just a glass and spoon. There's no doubt that this is the standard by which all other whey proteins are measured.
Each serving of Gold Standard 100% Whey contains 24 g of premium whey protein to support muscle growth and recovery, 11 grams of naturally occurring EAAs, including 5.5 grams of naturally occurring BCAAs, and over 4 grams of naturally occurring Glutamine and Glutamic Acid in each serving to support endurance and muscle recovery.
Gluten-Free, suitable for Vegetarians
A great choice for female and male bodybuilders, athletes, or those on high protein diets
Contains 24 grams of protein into every serving to support your muscle-building needs
Higher pure protein percentage, nearly 79% protein concertation (24 g of protein per 30.4 g serving size)
More than 4 Grams of Glutamine & Glutamic Acid in Each Serving
More Than 5 Grams of the Amino Acids (BCAAs) Leucine, Isoleucine, and Valine in Each Serving
Quality powder that Mix easily with a spoon, blender, or a shaker cup
Naturally and artificially flavored with more than 15 tasty and delicious flavors to choose from
Pre-workout, post-workout, or even first thing in the morning
Country of Origin: USA
Banned Substance Tested highest quality control measures so you feel comfortable and safe consuming the product.
Informed Choice Certified. Trusted by the best athletes all over the world for the past 35 years.
How To Use:
SPOON STIRRED: Gold Standard 100% Whey is INSTANTIZED.
That means if you forgot your shaker cup or don't have time to get out of the blender, you can just add one rounded scoop of Gold Standard 100% Whey to a glass filled with 6-8 oz of water or your favorite beverage.
Then mix it up with a spoon. Stir for about 20 seconds or until powder is completely dissolved.
Adjust the intensity of your Gold Standard 100% Whey by varying the amount of liquid that you use to prepare it.
For a bolder flavor with slightly more body and sweetness, mix each scoop with 4-6 oz of water, milk, or your favorite beverage. For a milder tasting, less sweet shake, use 8-10 oz of liquid per scoop.
SHAKER: Bringing a shaker cup with you to the gym is the best way to get a powerful dose of protein immediately after your workout.
Just pour in 6-8 oz of your preferred beverage and then add one rounded scoop of Gold Standard 100% Whey to your shaker cup. Cover and shake for 25-30 seconds.
BLENDER: Add one rounded scoop of Gold Standard 100% Wheyâ„¢ to a blender filled with 6-8 oz of water, nonfat milk, or your favorite beverage. Blend for 20-30 seconds.
Then add 1 or 2 ice cubes and blend for an additional 30 seconds.
SHAKE UP YOUR SHAKE: By adding fresh or frozen fruits, peanut butter, flaxseed oil, coconut, and other high-energy ingredients, you can transform your shake into a delicious high-protein meal.
STACK YOUR SHAKE: You can make Gold Standard 100% Whey an even more powerful recovery product by adding supplements like creatine, BCAA, and concentrated carbohydrate powders.
THINK OUTSIDE THE GLASS:Gold Standard 100% Whey can be used for more than just protein shakes.
Try mixing a scoop into oatmeal, yogurt, or the milk that you pour over your morning breakfast cereal. Better yet, boost the protein content of muffins, cookies, brownies, etc. by adding a scoop or two to your baked goods recipes.
When To Use First thing in the morning, before or after exercise, between meals, with a meal, or any time of the day, where you need a protein boost to your balanced diet.
Suggested Use:
Add 1 scoop in 180-240 ml water, milk, or beverage of your choice. You can also add it to a smoothie or shake.
Consume approximately 1 gram of protein per pound of body weight per day through a combination of high protein foods and protein supplements.
For even the best results, consume your daily protein allotment over several small meals spread evenly throughout the day.
Warnings:
This product contains whey derived from dairy and lecithin (to improve mixability) derived from soybeans.
For use as a dietary supplement only.
Do not use it for weight reduction.

Name: Fontactiv Collagen Fruity Flavour 28 Sachets
Description:
Product Description:

Food supplement: Collagen powder from bovine source (63%) with fruity flavorand sweetener (stevia).

How to use:

Fill a large glass with 200 ml of water and add the content of 1 sachet (16 g).
Stir vigorously until the powder is completely dissolved.
It can also be mixed in juice, milk or yogurt. The recommended dose is one serving per day

Caution & Warnings:

Food supplements must not substitute a balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.
Suitable for low-sugar diets.
Suitable for people with lactose and gluten intolerance.
Do not exceed the recommended daily portions.
Do not exceed the recommended daily intake of collagen (10 g/day).
Store the product out of the reach of young children.
Use after consulting with doctor
Not suitable for people with phenylketonuria.
In case of renal and hepatic insufficiency, use under medical supervision.
In case of pregnant or lactating women, should be used under medical supervision.

Ingredients:

Food grade hidrolyzed collagen powder from bovine source (63%), minerals
(calcium phosphate, magnesium oxide), acidity regulators (E296: malic acid, E330: citric acid),
artifical flavour (fruits), maltodextrin (carrier), vitamins (C & D), beet powder (concentrated beet juice,
maltodextrin, citric acid), hyaluronic acid, sweetener: E960 (Stevia, 625mg/kg).

Name: Manukora Honey Mgo 1000+ 500gm
Description:
Product Description:

Raw Manuka Honey:

Manukora MGO 1000+ is carefully extracted to ensure all bioactive compounds are retained including; MGO, leptosperin, lepteridine.
Comes with a free wooden spoon, for a greater tasting experience.

AUTHENTIC & TRACEABLE:

Every Manukora product has a unique QR trace code to guarantee authenticity.

UMF & MGO CERTIFIED:

All Manukora products are UMF & MGO certified, batch results are available through our QR codes.

THE MANUKA EXPERTS:

Manukora Manuka honey is produced in the most remote locations to ensure it passes our strict quality standards.
All products are certified Halal, non GMO and spray free.

Best For:

Advanced Digestive & Immune Support, contains nutrients to:

Aid in optimal digestive health.
Support a healthy microbiotal balance in the gut.
Strengthen the immune system.

How to use:

Portion: One teaspoon.

Enjoy one teaspoon of Manukora Manuka honey, three times per day for optimal results.
For a refreshing and nutritious post-workout drink, mix one teaspoon of Manukora honey into a glass of cool water.
Substitute your usual sweeteners with Manukora to potentially reduce your intake of added sugars and benefit from its prebiotic properties, which may support gut health.
For a delicious and nutritious twist on your breakfast or snacks, incorporate Manukora honey into your yogurt, cereals, or smoothies. This versatile ingredient not only enhances flavor but also provides a natural source of energy and potential immune support.
To preserve the honey's unique flavor and beneficial properties, always close the cap firmly after enjoying.

Caution & Warnings:

Not suitable for children under 12 months.
Ideal storage: below 25°C (77°F) and out of direct sunlight.
This product may cause an allergic reaction, particularly in individuals with known bee allergies. Individuals with a history of allergies should consult a healthcare professional before using this product.
Discontinue use and consult a physician immediately if you experience any skin irritation or rash after using this product.

Ingredients:

100% New Zealand Manuka Honey.

Healthy Food

Manufacturer: Manukora

Name: Olimp R-Weiler Shot Pre Workout - Cola - (20 Ampoules)
Description:
Product Description:

Olimp R-Weiler Shot Pre Workout - Cola (20 Ampoules) is a pre-workout dietary supplement designed to enhance your performance during exercise.
Olimp R-Weiler Shot Pre Workout - Cola is a pre-workout option containing ingredients that may support exercise performance.
Aims to improve stamina, focus, and energy levels before a workout.
Comes in liquid form contained in 20 individual ampoules (60ml each).
Remember, it's not a substitute for a balanced diet and proper training plan.

How To Use:

The recommended daily intake is 20ml (1/3 of an ampoule), consumed about 30 minutes before training.

Warning and Precautions:

Safety:

Due to the presence of caffeine (193mg per serving), it's not recommended for pregnant women, children, or people sensitive to stimulants.

Regulation:

As a dietary supplement, consult a healthcare professional before use, especially if you have any underlying health conditions or take medications.

Ingredients:

Contains ingredients commonly found in pre-workouts, including:

Beta-alanine: Delays muscle fatigue.
Taurine: May improve athletic performance.
Caffeine: Boosts energy and focus.
L-tyrosine: May enhance mental alertness.
Cayenne pepper extract: May increase thermogenesis (heat production).

Healthy Food

Name: True Honey Manuka Honey 400+ - 500 Gm -Squeezy Bottle
Description:
product Overview:

True Honey Manuka Honey 400+ Mgo 500 Gm Squeezy Bottle.

Product Description:

The True Honey Co. Manuka Honey with 400+MGO (methylglyoxal) and 13+ UMF (Unique Manuka Factor) packed in an easy-to-squeeze bottle to kickstart your wellness journey with all the health benefits of manuka honey.
Manuka honey has antioxidant, healing, antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties to support better everyday well-being.
The True Honey Co. Manuka Honey is sourced from pristine New Zealand forests so remote, the only way in is via helicopter. Methylglyoxal (MGO) content in the manuka honey which sets it apart from other honeys and contributing to its unique profile.
Dihydroxyacetone (DHA) and methylglyoxal (MGO) are unique carbohydrate metabolites of manuka honey. Dihydroxyacetone (DHA) is found in the nectar of the mānuka flower and bees gather this nectar and fly to hives and this DHA is slowly converted into MGO over time. High levels of DHA indicate a long shelf life. The process of maturing each drop of Manuka honey takes years to get that perfection of high rated Manuka honey. The antibacterial property of manuka honey protects the body against damage caused by bacteria and supports better everyday wellbeing.
The True Honey Co. Manuka honey is designed to seamlessly integrate into your daily life.
Each 500g bottle contains 100 servings, perfect for adding a dash of natural sweetness to meals, snacks, drinks, and everything in between.
Whether on the breakfast table, in the pantry, or on the benchtop, this squeezy bottle makes maintaining a healthy routine simple, beneficial, and, most importantly, delicious. It’s designed for ease of use by everyone, from little hands to grown-ups, making wellness both fun and fuss-free.

product features:

Great for smoothies, glazing, preserves and baking
Helps boost your immune system and fight sickness
Provides a great antioxidant support
Helps to soothe a cough or sore throat
Promotes and enhances digestive health
Easy-to-squeeze bottle with no mess dispenser makes it perfect for family members of all ages to enjoy
Ideal for sweetening meals, drinks, or snacks
May help to prevent gastric ulcers

How To Use:

Simply squeeze into your hot drink, smoothie, meal or snack
Designed for ease of use by everyone, from little hands to grown-ups
Store at room temperature, around 20°C in a cool, dark place, with the lid properly closed
No need to keep it in the fridge except in very hot or humid climates.

Name: D-Cura 25000 IU 4 Oral Ampoules
Description:
Product Description:
D-Cura Oral Ampoule is a vitamin that helps you obtain your body's requirements of vitamin D.
Vitamin D and its other forms are extremely important for our bones, teeth, and Immunity as the Vitamin is responsible for regulating the metabolism of calcium in our bodies.
Vitamin D helps your body absorb calcium.
Used as a dietary supplement in people who do not get enough vitamin D in their diets to maintain adequate health.
Enhances body's immune functions to fight infections and viruses
Product Features:
Prevents Osteoporosis :
Important for keeping bones strong and preventing the bone disease osteoporosis.
Vitamin D helps your intestines absorb calcium from the food.
For Stronger Immunity :
Enhances body's immune functions through vitamin D receptors located on the most immune system cells
This helps to fight infections and viruses.
Strengthens Bones and Teeth :
Both by helping your body absorb calcium and by supporting muscles needed to avoid weakness.
During Pregnancy & lactation :
During pregnancy and lactation, mothers require significant amounts of calcium to pass on to the developing fetus and suckling neonate, respectively.
Frequent Fatigue :
Excessive fatigue and tiredness may be a sign of vitamin D deficiency.
This has a severe negative effect on the quality of life.
 Mood Swings Probability:
Common symptoms of nutritional deficiencies (such as vitamin D deficiency) include irritability, mood swings, fatigue & depression.
Keep normal vitamines and minerals levels to avoid this.
 Hairloss Problems  :
Hair loss can occur when your body lacks the recommended amount of vitamin D.
Vitamin D deficiency has been linked to alopecia, also known as spot baldness, and a number of other health conditions
 Obesity  and Vit D Shortage:
There is an increased risk of vitamin D deficiency in people who are considered overweight or obese based on their body mass index (BMI) measurement.
How to use:
2 ampoules of D-CURA 25,000 IU once weekly for 6-8 weeks
Followed by maintenance therapy (1400- 2000 IU once daily may be required), based on the advice of your doctor.
Caution & Warnings:
Keep out of reach of children
If any adverse reaction occurs stop taking the product and consult your doctor.
Pregnant or lactating women, diabetics, hypoglycemics, and people with known medical conditions and/or taking drugs should consult a physician prior to taking dietary supplements
Vitamin-D Deficiency Causes :
When usual intake is lower than recommended levels over time.
When exposure to sunlight is limited
When the kidneys cannot convert 25(OH)D to its active form.
When absorption of vitamin D from the digestive tract is inadequate

Nutritional Facts

Servings Per Container: 4

Name: JP Prima D3 Vitamin D 2000 IU 60 Capsules
Description:
Product Description:

Prima D3TM 2000 IU is recommended for use when you have a normal intake of dietary calcium.
Prima D3TM 2000 IU may be prescribed by your doctor to treat vitamin D deficiency.
Deficiency of vitamin D may occur when your diet or lifestyle does not provide you with enough vitamin D or when your body requires more vitamin D (for instance, when you are pregnant).
Prima D3TM 2000 IU may also be prescribed for certain bone conditions, such as thinning of the bone (osteoporosis), when it is given to you with other medicines.

How to use:

Take Prima D3 2000 IU exactly as directed by your doctor or pharmacist.
Normally, take one to two soft gel capsules daily with food during pregnancy and lactation for antenatal and/or postnatal care and/or treatment of vitamin D deficiency.
In cases of vitamin D3 insufficiency or as a maintenance dose for the treatment of vitamin D deficiency.

Cautions and Warnings:

Possible side effects

Like all medicines, this medicine can cause side effects, although not everybody gets them.

Uncommon (may affect up to 1 in 100 people):

Too much calcium in your blood (hypercalcemia)
Too much calcium in your urine (hypercalciuria)

Rare (may affect up to 1 in 1,000 people):

Skin rash
Itching
Hives

Not known (I do not know how often these happen):

Altered bowel movements.
Wind
Feeling sick (nausea)
Stomach pain.

Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol): 2000 IU

Name: D-Seul Vitamin D 50000 IU 20 Capsules
Description:
D-Seul 50000 I.U 20 Soft Gelatin Capsules

Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol)

1. What D-Seul® is and what it is used for

Pharmacotherapeutic group:

D-Seul® contains cholecalciferol (vitamin D3).

Vitamin D3 can be found in some foods and is also produced by the body when skin is exposed to sunlight.

Vitamin D3 helps the kidneys and intestine absorb calcium and it helps build bones.

Therapeutic indications:

D-Seul® is used:

To prevent vitamin D deficiency when there is a significant risk of deficiency or an increased demand for vitamin D.
With other medicine to treat certain bone conditions, such as thinning of the bone (osteoporosis).
To treat vitamin D deficiency that has been confirmed by laboratory tests.

2. How to take D-Seul®:

Always take this medicine exactly as your doctor or pharmacist has told you.
Check with your doctor or pharmacist if you are not sure.
The capsules should be swallowed whole with water.
You should take D-Seul® preferably together with a large meal to help your body absorb the vitamin D.
Prevention (Prophylaxis) vitamin D deficiency in children (018-):
4001000- IU/DAY (up to 4000IU/DAY) (duration varies according to cases)
25000 IU/ every 6 to 8 weeks

Prevention (Prophylaxis) vitamin D deficiency in adults:

Up to 2000IU/day
Up to 25000IU/month
Treatment of vitamin D deficiency in children:
Up to 2000IU/day for 6 weeks followed by maintenance dose.
Treatment of vitamin D deficiency in adults:
Up to 50000IU/week for up to 8 weeks followed by maintenance dose.
Follow-up measurements should be made approximately three to four months after initiating maintenance therapy to confirm that the target level has been achieved.

Use in children:

D-Seul® S.G Capsules are not recommended for children under 12 years for all strengths except D-Seul® 50,000IU not recommended for use in under 18 years

a. If you take more D-Seul® than you should

If you or your child take more medicine than prescribed, stop using this medicine and contact your doctor. If it is not possible to talk to a doctor, go to the nearest hospital emergency department and take the medicine package with you.

The most common symptoms of overdose are: nausea, vomiting, excessive thirst, the production of large amounts of urine over 24 hours, constipation and dehydration., high levels of calcium in the blood (hypercalcaemia and hypercalciuria) shown by lab test.

b. If you forget to take D-Seul®

Take the forgotten dose as soon as possible. Then take the next dose at the correct time. However, if it is almost time to take the next dose, do not take the dose you have missed; just take the next dose as normal. Do not take a double dose to make up for a forgotten dose. After that, take the next capsule in accordance with the instructions given to you by your doctor. If you have any further questions on the use of this medicine, ask your doctor or pharmacist.

c. If you stop taking D-Seul®

If you have any further questions on the use of this medicine, ask your doctor or pharmacist.

3. What you need to know before you take D-Seul®:

a. Do not take D-Seul® if

If you are allergic to vitamin D3 or any of the other ingredients of this medicine.
If you have high levels of calcium in your blood (hypercalcaemia) or urine (hypercalciuria)
If you have kidney stones (renal calculi)
If you have serious renal impairment
If you have high levels of vitamin D3 in your blood (hypervitaminosis D)
If you have pseudohypoparathyroidism (disturbed parathyroid hormone metabolism)
If you are pregnant for highest strength D-Seul® 50000IU S.G. Capsules.
If you are under 18 years of age for highest strength D-Seul® 50000IU S.G. Capsules
If any of the above applies to you, talk to your doctor or pharmacist before taking D-Seul®.

b. Take special care with D-Seul®

Talk to your doctor or pharmacist before taking D-Seul®:
Are undergoing treatment with certain medicines used to treat heart disorders (e.g., cardiac glycosides, such as digoxin);
Have sarcoidosis (an immune system disorder which may cause increased levels of vitamin D3 in the body).
Are taking medicines containing vitamin D3, or eating foods or milk enriched with vitamin D3.
Are likely to be exposed to a lot of sunshine whilst using D-Seul®.
Take additional supplements containing calcium. Your doctor will monitor your blood levels of calcium to make sure they are not too high whilst you are using D-Seul®.
Have kidney damage or disease. Your doctor may want to measure the levels of calcium in your blood or urine.
Children
This medicine is not suitable for use in children under 12 years for all strengths except D-Seul® 50,000IU not suitable for use in under 18 years

c. Taking other medicines, herbal or dietary supplements

Tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are taking, have recently taken or might take any other medicines. This is especially important if you are taking:
Medicines that act on the heart or kidneys, such as cardiac glycosides (e.g., digoxin) or diuretics (e.g., bendroflumethazide). When used at the same time as vitamin D3 these medicines may cause a large increase in the level of calcium in the blood and urine.
Medicines containing vitamin D3 or eating food rich in vitamin D3, such as, some types of vitamin D3-enriched milk.
Actinomycin (a medicine used to treat some forms of cancer) and imidazole antifungals (e.g., clotrimazole and ketoconazole, medicines used to treat fungal disease). These medicines may interfere with the way your body process vitamin D3.
The following medicines because they can interfere with the effect or the absorption of vitamin D3:
Antiepileptic medicines (anticonvulsants), barbiturates,
Glucocorticoids (steroid hormones such as hydrocortisone or prednisolone). These can decrease the effect of vitamin D3.
Medicines that lower the level of cholesterol in the blood (such as cholestyramine, or colestipol)
Certain medicines for weight loss that reduce the amount of fat your body absorbs (e.g. orlistat)
Certain laxatives (such as liquid paraffin).
Concomitant use of phenytoin or barbiturates may reduce the effect of vitamin D since the metabolism increases.
Glucocorticoid steroids may increase vitamin D metabolism and elimination. During concomitant use, it may be necessary to increase the dose of vitamin D.
Simultaneous treatment with ion exchange resins such as cholestyramine or laxatives such as paraffin oil may reduce the gastrointestinal absorption of vitamin D.

d. Taking D-Seul® with food and drink

D-Seul® Soft Gelatin Capsules should be swallowed whole with water, preferably together with a large meal to help your body absorb the vitamin D.

e. Pregnancy and breast-feeding

If you are pregnant or breast-feeding, think you may be pregnant or are planning to have a baby, ask your doctor or pharmacist for advice before taking this medicine. These formulations can be used during pregnancy but only if you have been diagnosed with vitamin D deficiency and following the advice of your doctor.

The high strength formulation D-Seul® 50,000 is not recommended for use in pregnant and breastfeeding women.

f. Driving and using machines

D-Seul® should not affect your ability to drive or operate machinery. There is limited information on the possible effects of this medicine on your ability to drive. However, it is not expected that it would affect your ability to drive or operate machinery.

4. Possible side effects:

Like all medicines, this medicine can cause side effects, although not everybody gets them. Stop taking D-Seul® S.G Capsules and seek immediate medical help if you experience symptoms of serious allergic reactions, such as:
Swollen face, lips, tongue or throat
Difficult to swallow
Hives and difficulty breathing.
Side effects with D-Seul® S.G Capsules may include:
Uncommon (may affect up to 1 in 100 people):
Too much calcium in your blood (hypercalcaemia). Symptoms include: nausea, vomiting, lack of appetite, constipation, stomach ache, bone pain, extreme thirst, a need to pass more water than usual, muscle weakness, drowsiness and confusion, too much calcium in your urine (hypercalciuria).
Rare (may affect up to 1 in 1,000 people):
Skin rash (pruritus, urticaria)
Itching.
Hives

5. How to store D-Seul®

Keep out of the reach and sight of children.
Do not store above 30oC, protect from light.
Do not use D-Seul® after the expiry date (Exp. Date) which is stated on the outer pack. The expiry date refers to the last day of that month.
Do not use D-Seul® if you notice description of the visible signs of deterioration.
Medicines should not be disposed of via wastewater or household waste. Ask your pharmacist how to dispose of medicines no longer required. These measures will help to protect the environment.

6. Further information

a. What D-Seul® Capsules contains:

The active substance is: Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol).
D-Seul® 2,000IU S.G. Capsules: Each soft gelatin capsule contains 2000 IU equivalent to 50 μg Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol).
D-Seul® 5,000IU S.G. Capsules: Each soft gelatin capsule contains 5000 IU equivalent to 0.125 mg Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol).
D-Seul® 10,000IU S.G. Capsules: Each soft gelatin capsule contains 10000 IU equivalent to 0.250 mg Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol).
D-Seul® 50,000IU S.G. Capsules: Each soft gelatin capsule contains 50000 IU equivalent to 1.25 mg Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol).
The other ingredients are:
D-Seul® 2,000IU S.G. Capsules: Arachis oil, Butylhydroxyanisole, Gelatin, FD & Blue No 1, Glycerin & purified water.
D-Seul® 5,000IU S.G. Capsules: Arachis oil, Butylhydroxyanisole, Gelatin, Ariavit quinoline yellow, Glycerin & purified water.
D-Seul® 10,000IU S.G. Capsules: Arachis oil, Butylhydroxyanisole, Gelatin, Red No 33, Glycerin & purified water.
D-Seul® 50,000IU S.G. Capsules: Arachis oil, Butylhydroxyanisole, Gelatin, Blue No 1, Glycerin & purified water.

b. What D-Seul® looks like and contents of the pack

Soft Gelatin Capsules

Physical Description:

D-Seul® 2,000 IU S.G Capsules: Greenish blue oval soft gelatin capsules. Contains pale yellowish oily liquid.
D-Seul® 5,000 IU S.G Capsules: Yellow oval soft gelatin capsules contains pale yellowish oily liquid.
D-Seul® 10,000 IU S.G Capsules: Pinkish red oval soft gelatin capsules contains pale yellowish oily liquid.
D-Seul® 50,000 IU S.G Capsules: Blue oval soft gelatin capsules contains pale yellowish oily liquid.
D-Seul® S.G. Capsules packed in HDPE jars with PP screw cap with induction sealing foil. With desiccant bag (silica gel granules) labeled with adhesive label in a carton box with a multi folded leaflet.

Pack size: D-Seul® is available in the pack size of 30 S.G. Capsules for all strengths except D-Seul® 50,000IU S.G. Capsules the pack sizes 8, 12 & 20 S.G. capsules are available.

Description:
Product Description:

Veggie vitamin D3 is a vitamin that helps you to obtain your body's requirements of vitamin D.

vitamin D3 is required for regulation of the minerals calcium and phosphorus found in the body, it also plays an important role in maintaining proper bone structure.

Combination of essential minerals like magnesium & zinc
Reduces tiredness and fatigue, contributes to the maintenance of normal bones
Suitable food supplement for vegetarians and vegans
Holland & Barrett Magnesium with Zinc Tablets are a food supplement that is suitable for vegetarians & vegans.
Magnesium contributes to a reduction of tiredness and fatigue, normal energy-yielding metabolism, normal functioning of the nervous system & normal muscle function.
Zinc contributes to the normal function of the immune system, normal fertility, reproduction, and maintenance of normal bones, and has a role in the process of cell division.
